name: Twin Disciplines
description: Give an ally +3|+0 or +0|+3 this round.
flavourText: "Never fear change. It will question you, test your limits. It is our greatest teacher." - Karma

name: Discipline of Fortitude
description: Give an ally +0|+3 this round.

name: Discipline of Force
description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.

name: Yasuo
description: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I deal 2 to it.
flavourText: "Death is like the wind..."

name: Yasuo
description: When you Stun or Recall an enemy, I strike it.
flavourText: "...always by my side."

name: Yasuo's Steel Tempest
description:
Stun an attacking enemy.
Create a Yasuo in your deck.
flavourText: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo

name: Keeper of Masks
description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+0 this round.
flavourText: "On this day, yours will become the face of discipline, training, humility, and balance. Today, you become Kinkou."

name: Herald of Spring
description: Support: Give my supported ally Lifesteal this round.
flavourText:
"During winter's reign, we heard the tread of
Footsteps 'cross the snowy floor. 
In its wake, new vine and leaf emerged to rearrange
The forest floor and herald season's change."
- Shon-Xan poem

name: Fae Bladetwirler
description: When you Stun or Recall a unit, grant me +2|+0.
flavourText: "Oh, so you think I'm 'cute'? 'Fuzzy'?? Let's see how 'adorable' you find THIS!"

name: Kinkou Lifeblade
flavourText: "Once, this place held our schools, our temples, our homes. Now, we are left to skulk about its shadow-infested ruins. Zed's Order has defiled the legacy of this sacred place--I will be sure they regret it."

name: Karma
description: Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
flavourText: "Through reflection, we can focus the mind, and find a path around any obstacle."

name: Karma
description:
Round End: Create in hand a random spell from your regions.
When you play a spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavourText: "We'll bring peace to Ionia, whatever the cost."

name: Karma's Insight of Ages
description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
Create a Karma in your deck.
flavourText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

name: Recall
description: Recall an ally.
flavourText: The wise combatant knows not only tenacity, but restraint. A successful retreat guarantees a chance to fight a better fight.

name: Zed
description: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats.
flavourText: "Balance is a fool's master. The shadows have shown me true power."

name: Zed
description: Attack: Summon an attacking Living Shadow with my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Few men think to look back at their shadow. It is their last mistake."

name: Zed's Shadowshift
description:
Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
Create a Zed in your deck.
flavourText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

name: Living Shadow
flavourText: A blade of shadow is as sharp as one of steel.

name: Greenglade Elder
description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in hand +1|+1.
flavourText: Ionian knowledge is outlined in the written word, but it is the tales and teachings of Ionia's venerated elders that give ancient text new life.

name: Nimble Poro
flavourText: "This might sound crazy, but the last thing I remember was a... fuzzy sensation...?" - Navori Brigand

name: Navori Conspirator
description: To play me, Recall an ally.
flavourText: "C'mon, we gotta get out of here! My name? I'll explain on the way, I promise...."

name: Jeweled Protector
description: Play: Grant an ally in hand +3|+3.
flavourText:
"In times of conflict, villagers sought the ancient guardian of Autumn Valley. Those who swayed her heart were granted blessings that could turn the tide of battle."
- Saga of the First Lands

name: Sown Seeds
description: Grant all allies in hand +1|+0.
flavourText: "Not just seeds, younglings. The legacy of the land itself, promises for our prosperous future." - Karma

name: Death Mark
description: Remove Ephemeral from an ally to grant it to an enemy.
flavourText: "I am the blade in the darkness." - Zed

name: Shadow Flare
description: Grant ALL battling followers Ephemeral.
flavourText: When the flows of magic are diverted from their balanced state, they surge from the spirit world into the mortal realm--often with startling results.

name: Inspiring Mentor
description: Play: Grant an ally in hand +1|+0.
flavourText: “Took years to cultivate this deadly physique! Tireless days of spotting birds, describing clouds, and lifting tray after tray of sweet buns! Who else has such dedication?”

name: Dawn and Dusk
description: Summon 2 exact copies of an ally. They're Ephemeral.
flavourText: "Shen is one man caught between the perils of two worlds, he will fail them both. I devote myself to Ionia alone." - Zed

name: Scaled Snapper
description: Play: Grant me +3|+0 or +0|+3.
flavourText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

name: Shadow Assassin
description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavourText:
Gracefully she glides
Noiseless steps in the shadows
Claws the only trace.

name: Scaled Snapper
flavourText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

name: Scaled Snapper
flavourText: One of the oldest inhabitants of the Greenglade, it has withstood the test of time through constant adaptation.

name: Shen
description: Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
flavourText: "Like hands clasped, the mortal and spirit realms intertwine..."

name: Shen
description:
Support: Give my supported ally Barrier this round.
When an ally gets Barrier, give it +3|+0 this round.
flavourText: "...Their actions exist in harmony, and under my watch, neither shall overtake the other."

name: Shen's Stand United
description:
Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
Create a Shen in your deck.
flavourText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

name: Shadow Fiend
flavourText: "What would you sacrifice for power? Your path begins with an oath, and ends only when it has taken all you have to give." - Zed

name: Rush
description: Give an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
flavourText: Combat is merely a race to take the life of another before they take yours.

name: Yone, Windchaser
description: Play: Stun 2 enemies.
flavourText: "When I was a child, I asked my brother: 'Does the wind flee, or does it follow?' He followed me then for guidance. I follow him now for justice."

name: Staggering Strikes
description: Stun 2 enemies.
flavourText: "Stand aside. I have come for the Unforgiven." - Yone, Windchaser

name: Zephyr Sage
description: Play: Create an exact copy of a card in hand other than Zephyr Sage.
flavourText:
"As the warrior wept for his loss, the elder consoled him: 'Seek the sage of the skies. Only he can return that which is lost to this world, but still held in memory.'"
- Saga of the First Lands

name: Greenglade Lookout
description: Strike: Reduce the cost of the most expensive unit in hand by 1.
flavourText: "Patrol, we've one... no... TWO massive furry creatures coming our way! Call for ba--Oh. Hold on. Scope's wrong way 'round again..."

name: Minah Swiftfoot
description: Play: Recall 3 enemies.
flavourText: "There we were, tearing across the meadow and suddenly, this KID just leaps out from nowhere and BAM, BAM, BAM--knocks the wind right outta us!" - Navori Brigand

name: Ritual of Renewal
description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 4. Draw 1.
flavourText: "Only when the mind is elevated can the body be made whole." - Karma

name: Stand United
description: Swap 2 allies. Give them Barrier this round.
flavourText: "With balanced steps, I go." - Shen

name: Ghost
description: Give an ally Elusive this round.
flavourText: "Stay hidden, and do not return until your task is finished." - Zed

name: Windfarer Hatchling
description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +2|+2 this round.
flavourText:
"Spring blooms first on Ionia's cliffsides, where the beating of newly formed wings bathes the land in the season's gentle breezes."
- Saga of the First Lands

name: Insight of Ages
description:
Create in hand another random spell from your regions.
Enlightened: Create 2 instead.
flavourText: “When your hope wavers, know that you are never alone. The past is always by our side. It has known myriad tomorrows and all the hope that they bring.” - Karma

name: Silent Shadowseer
description: Nexus Strike: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavourText: "Flesh is untrustworthy. Fragile. Delicate as the borders between light and shadow."

name: Cloud Drinker
description: Your Burst and Focus spells cost 1 less.
flavourText: Its songs could be heard from the villages--long, low waves of sound rippling from sky to hillside, each as formless and strange as the afternoon clouds.

name: Will of Ionia
description: Recall a unit.
flavourText: When invaders first set foot on Ionian soil, they found that conquering the land's inhabitants alone would not be enough.

name: Skyward Strikes
description: Recall 3 enemies.
flavourText: "We go FLYING and next thing I know I'm flat on my back!" - Navori Brigand

name: Navori Bladescout
description: When I'm summoned, give me Elusive this round.
flavourText: "I'll get the drop on him, no problem. Get me outta there and I'll split the loot with you, make it more than worth your while!"

name: Sparring Student
description: When you summon another ally, give me +1|+1 this round.
flavourText: "What's the point of fighting if there's no one to see your moves?"

name: Greenglade Duo
description: When you summon another ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavourText:
"Hey, watch those branches! Left, LEFT!" 
"When I'm on YOUR shoulders, Fuzzball, we can go wherever you want. 'Til then, I got this!"

name: Kinkou Wayfinder
description: Allegiance: Summon a 1 cost ally from your deck.
flavourText: Wherever she goes, she ensures that others can follow.

name: Yusari
flavourText: "Your order has thrust us from our lands. You've proved your power, Master Zed. Now let me prove that I too am worthy of your teachings."

name: Ren Shadowblade
description: Strike: Create a Shadow Fiend in hand.
flavourText: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”

name: Emerald Awakener
description: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavourText: "War is fostered by our basest instincts. But instinct has no power over our highest virtues: trust, patience, and contemplation."

name: Health Potion
description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavourText: Every generation, region, and family has its own home remedy--though some are undeniably more effective than others.

name: Deny
description: Stop a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill.
flavourText: No.

name: Navori Highwayman
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Navori Brigand with my stats.
flavourText: “I was a traveling musician, known in every village 'ere to the Placidium--until the Noxians came. Now I'm scraping by on stolen coin. Mother was right, should've been a healer... ”

name: Navori Brigand
flavourText: A bandit on the road means more in the brush.

name: The Empyrean
flavourText: "The sky itself heaved as coils of clouds and powerful winds flattened our brigade. We tried to follow it, but who can chase the wind?" - Legion General

name: Greenglade Caretaker
description: When an ally gets Barrier, grant me +2|+0.
flavourText: "The glade protects its own. And you--you are not from here..."

name: Steel Tempest
description: Stun an attacking enemy.
flavourText: "Hasagi!" - Yasuo

name: Spirit's Refuge
description: Give an ally Barrier and Lifesteal this round.
flavourText: "This blade was once my father's. May it bring you the strength that I once lacked." - Shen

name: Rivershaper
description: Strike: Draw a spell.
flavourText: "We are proud children of the First Lands, and the streams of her magic flow through our vastayan blood as they do through our realm."

name: Solitary Monk
description: Play: Recall all other allies.
flavourText: "Reflex and instinct are the only company I desire."

name: Shadowshift
description: Recall an ally to summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavourText: Do you face the enemy that you believe you see? Or is it a trick of the shadows?

name: Ki Guardian
description:
Grant Barrier to an ally in hand. 
Draw 1.
flavourText: "Those who keep the balance shall know the protection of the Kinkou." - Shen

name: Draven
description: When I'm summoned or strike: Create a Spinning Axe in hand.
flavourText: "You want an autograph? Get in line, pal."

name: Draven
description: When I'm summoned or strike: Create 2 Spinning Axes in hand.
flavourText: "WHAT'S MY NAME?"

name: Draven's Whirling Death
description:
A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
Create a Draven in your deck.
flavourText: "I have the best job." - Draven

name: Spinning Axe
description:
To play, discard 1.
Give an ally +1|+0 this round.
flavourText: "Yeah, his brother'd win one-on-one, but you see those axes spiraling... it's art, it is. Art." - Arena regular

name: Vladimir
description: Play: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
flavourText:
Vicious. Cold. Cruel. Intriguing. Perceptive. Charming.
Irresistible...

name: Crimson Pact
description: For each attacking ally on Vladimir's right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Delicious." - Vladimir

name: Crimson Pact
description: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
flavourText: "Delicious." - Vladimir

name: Vladimir
description:
Play: Deal 1 to any number of allies to deal that much to an enemy.
Attack: For each attacking ally on my right, deal 1 to it and drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Do you find my little fête banal, darling? Then let me give you a real show."

name: Vladimir's Transfusion
description:
Deal 1 to an ally and give another ally +2|+2 this round.
Create a Vladimir in your deck.
flavourText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

name: Culling Strike
description: Kill a unit with 3 or less Power.
flavourText: Everyone dies. The weak just die faster.

name: Crimson Curator
description: When I survive damage, create a random Crimson unit in hand.
flavourText: "Beloved companions!" "Were you? Well I received an invitation." "--Reveler's Ball! Yes!" "Then we must! I shall present my family." "Starters before dessert, my dear. And you, Kye? Will you attend?"

name: Darius
flavourText: "An iron will and a titan's strength. There is no finer general to lead the Trifarian Legion." - Swain

name: Arachnoid Host
description: When I'm summoned, grant other Spider allies +2|+0.
flavourText: A single glance and you're hers. A single bite and you're theirs.

name: Decisive Maneuver
description: Stun an enemy. Give all allies +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: "Any fool can throw overwhelming force at the enemy. It takes vision to conceal that force until the decisive moment." - Swain

name: Arachnoid Sentry
description: Play: Stun an enemy.
flavourText: "Oh, how she captivates me! Her endless legs, voice of paralyzing sweetness, and eyes red as the rose. To think, she chose to dine with me tonight!" - Hapless Aristocrat

name: Paralyzing Bite
description: Stun an enemy.
flavourText: It was not the kiss he had in mind.

name: Transfusion
description: Deal 1 to an ally to give another ally +2|+2 this round.
flavourText: "It's give and take, my dear. You give, and I take." - Vladimir

name: Legion Saboteur
description: Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Our Shieldbreakers can split a man in two. But the Legion has other talents at its disposal when it requires a more... discreet touch." - Swain

name: Darius
flavourText: "Stand in our way and I'll cut you down myself!"

name: Darius' Decimate
description:
Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Darius in your deck.
flavourText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

name: Brothers' Bond
description: Grant 2 allies +2|+0.
flavourText: "Bonds forged in war are just as strong as those of kinship. Indeed, blood is shared in both." - Legion Veteran

name: House Spider
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Spiderling.
flavourText: "My spiders love company. Shame that company never feels the same." - Elise

name: Crimson Disciple
description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Edvin! There you are, handsome. I was just thinking of you!" "Each of us can go, now…" "Escort me. I'll make it fun." "Or nothing at all?"

name: Arena Battlecaster
description: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+0 this round.
flavourText: He roared with glee. For a moment, the heart of the arena pulsed in time with his and the excitement of the assembled masses was clutched in his triumphant hand.

name: Legion Marauder
description: Attack: Grant allied Legion Marauders everywhere +1|+1.
flavourText: The Trifarian Legion is trailed by opportunistic brigands who prey on the weak and injured in its wake.

name: Crowd Favorite
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other ally you have.
flavourText: Some reckoners are adored for their charisma. Others, for their swift technique. Vessid possesses neither, but no one turns a rival to splatter with more efficiency.

name: Whirling Death
description: A battling ally strikes a battling enemy.
flavourText: "I have the best job." - Draven

name: Reckoning
description: If you have a 5+ Power ally, kill ALL units with 4 or less Power.
flavourText: "WHO'S READY TO REEEEEECKONNNNNN?!" - Arena Battlecaster

name: Sabotage
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Boom." - Legion Saboteur

name: Intimidating Roar
description: Stun all enemies with 4 or less Power.
flavourText: “He’s taking a deep breath - we might get a - yes, there we have it, folks! That’s Thunder’s famous war cry! We’re all shaking in our boots out here, Thuuuunder!” - Arena Battlecaster

name: Legion Veteran
description: When another ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0.
flavourText: He returned from the war on the brink of death, restored only by his husband's touch and the apothecary's balms. Noxus spared no expense to ensure his expert counsel, long after his fighting years.

name: Shiraza the Blade
description: I deal double damage to the Nexus.
flavourText: "He said what?! That man has bricks for brains. Can't fault those shoulders, though..."

name: Katarina
description: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand.
flavourText: "Nothing like a little Demacian target practice to sharpen the senses..."

name: Katarina
description:
When I'm summoned, Rally and create a Fleeting Blade's Edge in hand. It costs 0.
Strike: Recall me.
flavourText: "No sir! Just a flash of red. Next thing I know, I look up and it... it was like a slaughterhouse in there." - Demacian border guard

name: Katarina's Death Lotus
description:
Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
Create a Katarina in your deck.
flavourText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

name: Captain Farron
description: When I'm summoned, create 2 Decimates in hand.
flavourText: Deep in Zaun's Sump, young Benn Farron was labeled a menace. Unstable. Unacceptable. In the ranks of Noxus he was embraced. Awarded. Unstoppable.

name: Legion Rearguard
flavourText: In Noxus, where soldiers are revered for their audacity on the battlefield, rearguard duty is nothing short of a punishment.

name: Blade's Edge
description: Deal 1 to anything.
flavourText: "In the right hands, a blade can cut through anything... and I do mean anything." - Katarina

name: Legion Grenadier
description: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Every Noxian is taught that a life spent in service to the empire is well spent, but few spend their lives as spectacularly as the Legion's grenadiers.

name: Legion General
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each unit you've Stunned or Recalled this game.
flavourText: All Noxians know the three Principles of Strength, but if a soldier is to rise through the ranks, they must learn to master them.

name: Legion Drummer
description: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack this round.
flavourText: The Legion spread the empire's reach with every beat of her drum. Nothing could stop them. Nothing did.

name: Arena Bookie
description: Round Start: Discard your lowest cost card to draw 1.
flavourText: "...you bet on Shiraza as SOLE SURVIVOR, and that Ionian kid--sure he's missing an arm--but he ain't dead. Makes him a survivor, see? 'Course, you could always double down..."

name: Vision
description: When played or discarded, grant all allies +1|+0.
flavourText: "Those who cannot see the future have no place in it." - Jericho Swain

name: Trifarian Shieldbreaker
flavourText: "I don't have the patience for a siege. Send the Shieldbreakers." - Darius

name: Minotaur Reckoner
description: Round Start: Stun the weakest enemy.
flavourText: "I don't care who wronged you or what they did. You need me to make it right in the pit, you pay up front. There's no discount for sad stories."

name: Battering Ram
description: Attack: Grant me +4|+0.
flavourText:
"Sir, they're refusing to open their gates. They've demanded to speak with Darius, but he's two days' ride away. Should we send riders?"
"Oh, that won't be necessary."

name: Crimson Aristocrat
description: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and grant it +1|+0 and Overwhelm
flavourText: "Ah, you too? To the Reveler's B--" "How am I to tolerate mine?" "Respectfully, my dear, my father would disown me. ...perhaps we should wear matching dresses."

name: Trifarian Hopeful
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +2|+0 if you have another Noxus ally.
flavourText: "You'll earn the title when your axe is blunt with battle and your boots're sopped with blood." - Legion Veteran

name: Might
description: Give an ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavourText: "When I say subtlety is overrated, that doesn't mean it isn't good. It's just overrated." - Darius

name: Precious Pet
flavourText: She loves them all. She just loves this one more.

name: Death Lotus
description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavourText: "Dance with me!" - Katarina

name: Shunpo
description: Deal 2 to an enemy, then Rally.
flavourText: By the time you've seen the blade, it's far too late.

name: Trifarian Assessor
description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 for each 5+ Power ally you have.
flavourText: "It takes a ruthlessly discerning eye to select those worthy enough to become part of the Trifarian Legion, but she can sort the wolves from the sheep a mile away." - Legion General

name: Blood for Blood
description: Deal 1 to an allied follower. If it survives, create a copy of it in hand.
flavourText: Nothing is messier than a hemomancer's first lesson.

name: Savage Reckoner
flavourText: "Next up, CLAWS! Last time was a BLOODY takedown versus the Psycho Five... now the Psycho Three. Allllright! Takin' bets on today's victim! Four to one!" - Karl, Arena Bookie

name: Trifarian Gloryseeker
flavourText: Earning a place in the Trifarian Legion is good enough for most, but not all.

name: Decimate
description: Deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Sometimes, it takes tactical genius to break a fortress. Sometimes, you just have to hit it harder." - Darius

name: Basilisk Rider
description: Allegiance: Grant me +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavourText: This particular unit does use horses, just not for riding. The beasts find them delicious.

name: Affectionate Poro
flavourText: "Noxus has no room for... for weakn--Will someone get this DAMNED THING OFF ME?!" - Darius

name: Draven's Biggest Fan
description: When I'm summoned, move Draven to the top of your deck if you don't have him in hand or in play.
flavourText: "You want an autograph? Get... Get in line, pal!"

name: Reckless Trifarian
flavourText: "Recklessness is a fault. Tempered by the Legion, it becomes a tool." - Swain

name: Elixir of Wrath
description: Give an ally +3|+0 this round.
flavourText:
"When the open hand is declined, there's always the fist."
- Noxian axiom

name: Noxian Guillotine
description: Kill a damaged unit to create a Fleeting Noxian Guillotine in hand.
flavourText: To Darius, mercy is a deft blow.

name: Crimson Awakener
description: When I'm summoned, deal 1 to all other allies.
flavourText: "Even if I said 'no', you'd drag me along. So... sure."

name: Kato The Arm
description: Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 and Overwhelm this round.
flavourText: "Shiraza is a great girlfriend--I mean friend--and we are in no way dating. But if we were, I would like her to know that I wish her a happy anniversary. Thank you, no more questions."

name: Guile
description: Stun an enemy.
flavourText: "Allow your enemies enough rope to hang themselves and you'll save yourself the effort." - LeBlanc

name: Dawnspeakers
description: Round End: Grant other allies +1|+1 if an ally died this round.
flavourText: "Evil has taken the hour, but it will not win the day. Remember our fallen, and wear their memories like armor!"

name: Lucian
flavourText: "I'll be alright, Senna, long as I've got you."

name: Mobilize
description: Reduce the cost of all allies in hand by 1.
flavourText: "From the fields to the front in a fortnight. This is what we expect from each and every able body in Demacia." - Garen

name: Lux
flavourText: "I've always known there's something different about me... a light from within. I'm not sure what it is, but I have to find out!"

name: Lux's Prismatic Barrier
description:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Create a Lux in your deck.
flavourText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

name: Lux
description: Each time you play 6+ mana of spells, create a Final Spark in hand.
flavourText: "No more holding back!"

name: Final Spark
description: Deal 4 to an enemy. If there are no enemies, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: "I've hidden my light for my whole life. What would happen if they knew... if *I* knew what I could really do?" - Lux

name: Swiftwing Lancer
description: Last Breath: Create a random Elite in hand.
flavourText: "It takes a bold heart to trust their life to a silverwing, locked in combat far above solid ground. Bold, and highly durable." - Garen

name: Vanguard Defender
flavourText: "We didn't know who or what those creatures were. But we knew the faces of our fellow soldiers by our sides, and that was all we needed."

name: Battlesmith
description: When you summon an Elite, grant it +1|+1.
flavourText: Wars are won in the forge.

name: Tianna Crownguard
description: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavourText: “Our House has bled for this realm. You’ll not throw away this family’s honor for a few tricks of light.”

name: Garen
description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavourText: Training and resilience are the way of a soldier. Even in the face of great peril, we will not falter.

name: Garen
description:
When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
Round Start: Rally.
flavourText: "You think me rigid. Single-minded. Predictable. I am rigid, for nothing can sway me. I am single-minded, for I believe in Demacia. And I am predictable, for I will surely defeat you.”

name: Garen's Judgment
description:
A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
Create a Garen in your deck.
flavourText: Justice always comes full circle.

name: Stand Alone
description: If you have exactly 1 ally, grant it +3|+3.
flavourText: When others fail, it falls upon the shoulders of a true hero to find a path to victory.

name: Fiora
flavourText: "From arena to tournament, training ground to battleground, I long for a worthy opponent. I will not rest until I know I am the greatest."

name: Brightsteel Formation
description: When I'm summoned or Attack: Give all allies Barrier this round.
flavourText: "This formation is the basis of our tactics. It requires the faith of each soldier in their shield, and in the shields of their companions. So long as they stand, so too shall our realm." - Garen

name: Relentless Pursuit
description: Rally.
flavourText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

name: Lucian's Relentless Pursuit
description:
Rally.
Create a Lucian in your deck.
flavourText: "Everyone's gotta face their fears. Lucky you, here I am." - Lucian

name: Lucian
description: Each round, the first time an ally dies, Rally.
flavourText: "World's full of monsters. If you're lucky, they're the ones you can see. The worst are the ones that stay under your skin."

name: Detain
description: An ally Captures a unit.
flavourText: "Submit to us. We are the law and you are its subject. There is nothing more." - Mageseeker Persuader

name: Judgment
description: A battling ally strikes all battling enemies.
flavourText: Justice always comes full circle.

name: Laurent Duelist
description: Play: Grant Challenger to an ally in hand.
flavourText: "He seemed a preening fop with an expensive blade--turns out he really knew how to swing that sword! I'd demand a rematch, but I missed his name with that ridiculous accent." - Demacian ensign

name: Mageseeker Inciter
description: Grant me +2|+2 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavourText: "Long ago, the wild magicks of the Rune Wars brought all Runeterra to its knees. Thus, our order was created to protect our kingdom by ridding it of magic, whether abroad or within." - Mageseeker's Handbook

name: Vanguard Bannerman
description: Allegiance: Grant other allies +1|+1.
flavourText: "You must understand the weight of our banner. It flies for our king, our houses, our citizens. It is our unwavering belief in Demacia itself. Hold it high. Show them our pride." - Tianna Crownguard

name: War Chefs
description: Support: Give my supported ally +1|+1 this round.
flavourText: No one in the Demacian army should be trifled with.

name: Plucky Poro
flavourText: "New recruit has the kind of endurance and courage shown by our finest soldiers. Will he make it to the Vanguard someday? He's... smaller than the rest, but we'll see." - Vanguard Sergeant

name: Laurent Chevalier
description: Strike: Create in hand another random Challenger follower from your regions.
flavourText: "...Good grief." - Fiora

name: Remembrance
description: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this round. Summon a random 5 cost follower from Demacia.
flavourText: "Today we rise to right the injustices that felled those before us. The sacrifices of our comrades were not in vain." - Radiant Guardian

name: Fiora
description: When I've killed 4 enemies and survived, you win the game.
flavourText: "... and now I know."

name: Fiora's Riposte
description:
Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
Create a Fiora in your deck.
flavourText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

name: Redoubled Valor
description: Fully heal an ally, then double its Power and Health.
flavourText: In Demacia, to be as good as two of the enemy isn't just a boast.

name: Mageseeker Conservator
description: Last Breath: Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from a region other than Demacia.
flavourText:
"Arcane items have undeniable intrigue. But these objects of power are best left to the capable hands of our experts, and away from the well-meaning ignorance of our citizens."
- Mageseeker's Handbook

name: Silverwing Vanguard
description: Play: Summon an exact copy of me.
flavourText: They fell from the clouds like silvery bolts of lightning, swift and sure as they dove toward their targets. Then, as suddenly as they appeared, they were gone.

name: Laurent Protege
flavourText: "He did WHAT? I entrusted him with Pierre de Guillard's priceless dual-balanced sabre! He said it was only to be used for training!" - Laurent Bladekeeper

name: Succession
description: Summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
flavourText: Vestments of the Dauntless Vanguard are handed down from one soldier to the next, so that new recruits may feel the weight and pride of their responsibilities.

name: Vanguard Lookout
flavourText: Just because it's quiet doesn't mean it's safe.

name: Purify
description: Silence a follower.
flavourText:
"Your petricite Graymark is your primary safeguard against magic, a symbol of our responsibilities, and a reminder to others of our authority. Honor it above all else."
- The Mageseekers' Handbook

name: Dauntless Vanguard
flavourText: The Dauntless Vanguard are Demacia's most elite warriors, each a legend in their village or shire. But all of them seek to have their names known throughout the realm.

name: Mageseeker Persuader
description: Grant me +1|+1 and Challenger once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavourText: "Citizens of Demacia, it is my honor to keep you safe. But we must demand your unwavering support, for even within our high walls, mages still walk among us!"

name: Vanguard Squire
description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavourText: "Everyone I met, every journey I took taught me something new. But the more I learned and the stronger I became, the more I realized I had much further to go..." - Cithria, Vanguard Squire

name: Riposte
description: Give an ally +3|+0 and Barrier this round.
flavourText: "How appropriate--you fight like a poro!" - Fiora

name: Reinforcements
description: Summon 2 Dauntless Vanguards, then grant Elite allies +1|+1.
flavourText:
"Our rivals know that to strike at any of us is to strike at all of us."
- The Vanguard's Code

name: Radiant Guardian
description: When I'm summoned, grant me Lifesteal and Tough if an ally died this round.
flavourText: "Waves of cold undead hands pulled down her companions. Only she remained, a gleaming beacon of justice whose blade seemed to sing the names of the fallen with every swing." - Demacian ensign

name: Laurent Bladekeeper
description: Play: Grant an ally +2|+2.
flavourText: "Yes, they are beautiful. But like any fine instrument, they only reveal their true beauty in the hands of a master."

name: Single Combat
description: An ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavourText: "Save your words; we speak with blades." - Fiora

name: Prismatic Barrier
description: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavourText: "The world can turn its back on you when you're different. People say your differences make you weak--but they make us strong, compassionate. Even in the darkest times, I'll protect you!" - Lux

name: En Garde
description: Give all allies Challenger this round.
flavourText: "There's not a Demacian alive who would refuse a Laurent's lesson in swordsmanship. Or survived one, for that matter." - Fiora

name: Vanguard Sergeant
description: When I'm summoned, create a For Demacia! in hand.
flavourText: "He leads our drills from morning to night, and he's the first to head into the fray. Hard as steel, steady as stone--couldn't choose a finer leader." - Demacian ensign

name: Senna, Sentinel of Light
description: The first time an allied Lucian dies, grant me +1|+1 and Double Attack.
flavourText: "Our Sentinels are the first line of defense between the tide of restless undead and the realms of man. We hit first, hit hard, and NEVER back down when the lives of our companions are on the line."

name: Back to Back
description: Give 2 allies +3|+3 this round.
flavourText:
"Cover me, I'm going in!"
"Funny, I was about to say the same to you."
- Lorn and Dax of the Eastern Battalion

name: For Demacia!
description: Give all allies +3|+3 this round.
flavourText: “It is our homes, our families, our comrades in arms. It is our pride, our honor, our strength. And so, today, as we fight for its defense and its very existence, let us shout its name: DEMACIA!" - Vanguard Sergeant

name: Radiant Strike
description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
flavourText: "Undead fight like they've got no tomorrow. We'll make sure they won’t get one." - Lucian

name: Brightsteel Protector
description: Play: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavourText: "We are a prosperous nation because each warrior's fate is a coin we will never be content to spend." - King Jarvan III

name: Cithria of Cloudfield
flavourText: "Each night before bed, my mother would tell me stories of Demacia's greatest heroes as she sharpened her sword. My dreams were full of adventures, and today I'll begin a story all my own."

name: Vanguard Firstblade
description: Attack: Grant me +2|+2.
flavourText: The battle cry sounds, and my feet are already turning over the soil. I need nothing but my lady's order to know my destiny and enact her will.

name: Fleetfeather Tracker
description: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
flavourText: These relatives of the silverwing raptors have the predatory instincts of their cousins alongside a dogged unfamiliarity with their own comparatively diminutive size.

name: Vanguard Cavalry
flavourText: The Vanguard needed no drums, no music to keep time in their advance. Only the steady, even beat of hooves against soil.

name: Chain Vest
description: Grant an ally Tough.
flavourText: Demacian steel is known throughout the world for its superior strength. Its forging requires smiths of equal strength and repute.

name: Mageseeker Investigator
description: Create a Detain in hand once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavourText: "Forgive the intrusion, but we will require your full cooperation. We have been notified of some... 'unusual happenings'..."

name: Cithria the Bold
description: Attack: Give other attacking allies +1|+1 and Fearsome this round.
flavourText: "Legends, tales--they were never just fiction to me. They were adventure calling my name. I left Cloudfield to discover my own adventure, only to find I would have many. And they’re just beginning.”

name: Vanguard Redeemer
description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit if an ally died this round.
flavourText: "Our fallen shall be remembered in every battle cry, in every swing of our swords, and every crash of our shields! Today, we shall be victorious!"

name: Silverwing Diver
flavourText: Arrows rained down from the fortress walls in droves, but none could touch that fleck of silver darting through the sky.

name: Jinx
flavourText:
"What'samatter, Fishbones?"
"I'm worried about you, Jinx! Every time you get bored, you..."
"...want to blow something up! Great idea, Fishbones!"

name: Jinx's Get Excited!
description:
To play, discard 1. Deal 3 to anything.
Create a Jinx in your deck.
flavourText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
description: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus and 1 to all enemies.
flavourText: "See ya!" - Jinx

name: Jinx
description:
Round Start: Draw 1.
Each round, the first time I level up or you empty your hand, create a Super Mega Death Rocket! in hand.
flavourText: "It's all just fun and games until something gets blown up - then it's a PARTY!"

name: Teemo
description: Nexus Strike: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavourText: "Bandle Scout Rule 154: Never fear the unknown! Rule 276: Denizens of the woodlands are our friends! Rule 354: If it's fuzzy, it might be safe to pet but certainly isn't safe to eat! Rule 417..."

name: Teemo
description: Nexus Strike: Double the Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck (plants 5 minimum).
flavourText: "... make sure you're out of the blast zone!"

name: Teemo's Mushroom Cloud
description:
Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
Create a Teemo in your deck.
flavourText: First, the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

name: Heimerdinger
description: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. It costs 0.
flavourText: "Mad scientist? Pft! I'm clearly a very-stable-if-slightly-disorganized-and-eclectic scientist, thank you very much!"

name: Augmented Experimenter
description: Play: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
flavourText: His dreams cost him his hands, yet he persisted. Nothing would stand in his way.

name: Parade Electrorig
description: Support: Create 4 copies of the supported ally in your deck.
flavourText: The boom of the cannons drew crowds toward the plaza, eager to see the show. It would take them weeks to wash the last of the confetti from their hair.

name: Heimerdinger
description: When you play a spell, create a Fleeting Turret in hand with equal cost. Grant it +1|+1 and it costs 0.
flavourText: "PROGRESSSSS!"

name: Mk2: Evolution Turret
flavourText:
"Safety precautions for the laboratory! Recent postings have mentioned young Jayce's workshop was raided by thieves. Ha--local intruders, beware!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 2

name: Mk4: Stormlobber
flavourText:
"PROGRESS CONTINUES! I have finally found a way to combine the raw power of hexenergy with my ball tosser! I present, the STORMLOBBER! Now to sleep."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 4

name: Heimerdinger's Progress Day!
description:
Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
Create a Heimerdinger in your deck.
flavourText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

name: Mk3: Apex Turret
flavourText:
"Ah, the sweet smell of science! I have successfully upgraded my turrets! I must say... this model's appearance sends hypothermic waves through my vertebrae! Brr!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 3

name: Mk5: Rocket Blaster
flavourText:
"After a few production issues--propulsion and guidance, predominantly--I am ready to unveil my PROPELLED COMBUSTIBLES! ...must work on a better name."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 5

name: Mk7: Armored Stomper
flavourText:
"I dreamt of a great mechanical beast, obeying my every command! I MUST realize this vision. First, stability tests, then ordnance and armor evaluation..."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 7

name: Mk0: Windup Shredder
flavourText:
"TODAY I EMBARK UPON A NEW SCIENTIFIC ADVENTURE: AUTOMATONS! As the saying goes, it takes a great mind to create great things! Who said that, you ask? Why, ME!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Preface

name: Mk1: Wrenchbot
flavourText:
"It occurred to me earlier that--with only two hands--I can only maximally operate two wrenches! My solution: MORE HANDS. Oho! I jest. A WRENCHBOT!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 1

name: Mk6: Floor-B-Gone
flavourText:
"I seem to have misplaced my latest work. And my mezzanine. I'm concerned about my bot, but the shrieking from the ceramics research laboratory gives me hope!"
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 6

name: Academy Prodigy
flavourText: How does she aim? That's an excellent question.

name: Eager Apprentice
description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana.
flavourText: Not everyone is cut out to further progress in Piltover immediately. Some need a little guidance--those who look at invention through the wrong lens, for instance.

name: Puffcap Peddler
description: When you play a spell, plant 3 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavourText:
"These any good?"
"Of course! They're all top notch! Spoke to them myself!"
"Okay hand em--wait what?"
"Mmhmm! Getting married, this one!"
"How many have you had...?"
"--to a barnacle!"

name: Corina Veraza
description: Play: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
flavourText: "The narrow-minded Piltovans know only gears and metal, and cannot appreciate the delicate art in every stem, every petal, every cell of my cultivair. I will craft them an undeservedly graceful doom."

name: Magnum Opus
description: Obliterate the top 5 cards of your deck to deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus for each spell obliterated.
flavourText: "I told them that every achievement had its cost. I didn't tell them who would pay it." - Corina Veraza

name: Scrap Scuttler
flavourText: Everyone tries to chase it down. Poor little thing just wants to play in puddles!

name: T-Hex
flavourText:
"IT'S FINALLY COMPLETE! SIX-HUNDRED AND FIFTY-TWO FEET OF ROTARY-TEMPERED, HEX-PLATED, QUADRANIUM-CELL-POWERED STOMPING!!! My finest work, if I daresaysomyself."
- Heimerdinger's Lab Notes, Vol. 8

name: Poison Puffcap
description: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
flavourText:
"Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Ow ow ow, ow ow ow!
Pop goes the puffcap, pop goes the puffcap,
Down we go, down we go!"
- Zaunite nursery rhyme

name: Jury-Rig
description: When played or discarded, summon a Scrap Scuttler.
flavourText: With a handful of scrap and mere moments left, the young inventor recalled an unusual source of inspiration: a creature she once saw scuttling along the rivers of a distant jungle.

name: Rising Spell Force
description: Give an ally +4|+0 and Quick Attack this round.
flavourText: "It kinda tickles when it starts to glow. That's normal... right?" - Ezreal

name: Boomcrew Rookie
description: Attack: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText:
"You sure about this?"
"Nope."
"You were supposed to say 'yes'."
"You weren't supposed to ask."

name: Undermine
description: Deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Time to go!" - Boomcrew Rookie

name: Shady Character
description: Play: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
flavourText: "Hello, fellow Chem-Barons!"

name: Impersonate
description: Pick a follower. Transform me into an exact copy of it.
flavourText: Definitely not a pair of yordles in a suit.

name: Used Cask Salesman
description: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Caustic Casks.
flavourText: "Ziel sent ya? I told him, what's his is his. Can't refund somethin' I ain't ever seen before, can I? But, as it happens, I just received a batch of new casks I could be persuaded to part with..."

name: Sump Dredger
description: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
flavourText: In the Sump, waste is never wasted.

name: Ezreal
description: Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
flavourText: "Goggles? Check. Scarf? Check. Awesome gauntlet-with-magical-properties-that-I-totally understand? Check, check, aaaand check!"

name: Ezreal
description:
Nexus Strike: Create a Fleeting Mystic Shot in hand.
When you play a spell, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If it targeted an enemy, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: "Impossible is my favorite kind of possible!"

name: Ezreal's Mystic Shot
description:
Deal 2 to anything.
Create an Ezreal in your deck.
flavourText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal

name: Jae Medarda
description: When I'm targeted, draw 1.
flavourText: Heir apparent to Piltover's prestigious Clan Medarda, Jae preferred hunting ancient artifacts over managing the family business... much to his father's chagrin.

name: Mushroom Cloud
description: Plant 5 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavourText: First is the soft thump as the puffcap pops. Next, searing, debilitating pain. Finally, the distant sound of giggles...

name: Zaunite Urchin
description: Play: Discard a card to draw 1.
flavourText:
"You'd think the sumprats would look after their own."
"Too busy basking in their self-pity, brother."
"Shame. Ah... have you seen my purse?"

name: Reckless Research
description: Discard your hand. Draw 3. Deal 3 to an enemy.
flavourText: Progress, whatever the price.

name: Back Alley Barkeep
description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random card for each Back Alley Barkeep you've summoned this game.
flavourText: "Yeah mate, it's got a slight kick the same way the Sump's got a slight smell. Bucket's by the songspinner."

name: Trueshot Barrage
description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, 2 to another, and 1 to another.
flavourText: "When you've got talent, there's no such thing as a lucky shot." - Ezreal

name: Daring Poro
flavourText: Her first launch was pure accident: she slipped inside a Progress Day cannon while preening herself. Now she's the toast of Piltover, arcing across the sky to the adoring gasps of the crowds below.

name: Counterfeit Copies
description: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck.
flavourText: Imitation is the sincerest form of thievery.

name: Mystic Shot
description: Deal 2 to anything.
flavourText: "I. Never. Miss. But I have been known to fire a warning shot or two..." - Ezreal

name: Purrsuit of Perfection
description: If you've played 20 new cards this game, summon Catastrophe.
flavourText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan Project engineer

name: Catastrophe
flavourText: Your end is MEOW.

name: Hextech Transmogulator
description: Transform a follower into an exact copy of another follower.
flavourText:
"YOU KEPT SAYING YOU WANTED TO LOSE WEIGHT."
"SO YOU TURNED ME INTO A YORDLE?!"
"YOU LOST WEIGHT!"
"...I'M ALSO A YORDLE!"

name: Midenstokke Henchmen
description: Nexus Strike: Summon an exact copy of me.
flavourText:
"Mr. Berz, we found you asleep INSIDE the vault, covered in golden cogs and clutching the safe's broken door."
"Weren't me. Jus' some fella wot look like me."
"You're still holding the door."
"Prove it."

name: Statikk Shock
description:
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
Draw 1.
flavourText: "And that's how we discovered arc discharge! Of course, my predecessor had hypothesized such an event, but underestimated the arc's reach. Poor fellow..." - Heimerdinger

name: Golden Crushbot
flavourText: KILL. CRUSH. DESTROY. REPEAT.

name: Rummage
description: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Draw 1 for each card you discarded.
flavourText: "Oooooh, boy--FIVE ENFORCERS AND A GOLEM? Waitaminute! I have just the thing! Soooooomewhere..." - Jinx

name: Scrapdash Assembly
description: Summon 2 Scrap Scuttlers.
flavourText: Two gentle creatures, once separated by an impassable lane of land, were finally brought together in the tepid waters of the Sump.

name: Thermogenic Beam
description:
To play, spend all your mana.
Deal that much to a unit.
flavourText: "We've exhausted both our time and funds, and though the beam works, we haven't been able to regulate its energy consumption." - Zaunite experimenter

name: Astute Academic
description: When you draw a card, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavourText: Imagination is the spark of great invention. Yet, it is research that makes the spark a conflagration.

name: Unlicensed Innovation
description: Summon an Illegal Contraption.
flavourText: "Their mishaps come in countless flavors: tremors from distant explosions, putrid fumes from the fissures. Soon enough, one of those fools will tear our city down." - Piltovan philanthropist

name: Sumpsnipe Scavenger
description: Allegiance: Create a Sumpworks Map in hand. It costs 0 this round.
flavourText: The Zaunite kids soon started exploring the old mining tunnels and deeper levels of the Lanes. What a world they discovered. What friends they found.

name: Illegal Contraption
flavourText: "Absolutely NOT regulation hardware." - Safety Inspections Officer, Piltovan Bureau of Safety Inspections

name: Accelerated Purrsuit
description: If you've played 15 new cards this game, summon Catastrophe.
flavourText: "In the end, all of us who worked toward von Yipp's vision were deceived. We knew not what we wrought--what terrible power we would unleash." - Piltovan project engineer

name: Assembly Bot
description: When you play a spell, grant me +1|+1.
flavourText: "Any simpleton can build a machine, but it takes extraordinary acumen to infuse a mechanized mind with TRUE progress! Soon enough those damned bureaucrats will come crawling back..." - Klas Henwick

name: Chempunk Shredder
description: Play: Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavourText: "...his solo quickly plunges through a harmonic minor scale before arpeggiating--yes that's a word--into the bridge's transposition. You likely can't even comprehend his work." - Max Bliff, gatekeeper

name: Eminent Benefactor
description: Play: Manifest a random Epic card from your regions.
flavourText: "I was an angry man, then, and broke my competitors as I accrued money and fame. I now direct my fortune toward altruism, and hope that my penitent winter will absolve me of my misdeeds."

name: Funsmith
description: All of your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavourText: "You want extra boom, do ya? Well, you've come to the right place!"

name: Face-Melter
description: Deal 1 to all enemies.
flavourText: "Let the show begin!" - Chempunk Shredder

name: Professor von Yipp
description: When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +2|+2.
flavourText: "Today I present to the committee my newest invention, as demonstrated by my esteemed colleague..."

name: Unstable Voltician
description: Grant me +4|+0 and Quick Attack once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavourText: Name: Klas Henwick, Age: 51, License Type: Class 2 Conditional, Status: Revoked, Comments: Ignored repeated warnings to reduce output following lab explosion (Case 13X764NM). DO NOT PERMIT ENTRY.

name: Progress Day!
description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
flavourText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!

name: Plaza Guardian
description: I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
flavourText: You have twenty seconds to comply.

name: Clump of Whumps
description: When I'm summoned, create a Mushroom Cloud in hand.
flavourText: "Mhm, that's right! Clumps of 'em, sneakin' around! They SEEM crazy, but you just don't see. Not like me! They've big plans! Big plans. Puffcaps. Cheese... sorbet. Where was I?" - Puffcap Peddler

name: Flame Chompers!
description: When I'm discarded, summon me.
flavourText: "GET 'EM, CHOMPIES!" - Jinx

name: Get Excited!
description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 3 to anything.
flavourText: "FIRE IN THE CABOODLE!" - Jinx

name: Flash of Brilliance
description:
Create in hand a random 6+ cost spell from your regions.
Refill your spell mana.
flavourText: It only takes one epiphany to launch a legacy.

name: Chump Whump
description: When I'm summoned, create 2 Mushroom Clouds in hand.
flavourText: "Seen a big 'un, mmhmm! She's heavy as a horse and crafty as a krug. Gotta keep yer eye on her, I tells ya. That ol’ tomato’s the queen of the clump for a reason!" - Puffcap Peddler

name: Amateur Aeronaut
flavourText: "Personal flying machines? A pipe dream! I just had my apprentice throw the latest prototype out, in fact. Now, where is he?" - Piltovan engineer

name: Intrepid Mariner
description: Support: Give my supported ally Elusive this round.
flavourText: For many Piltovans, the great unknown is explored through science and invention, safe within their City of Progress. But a handful embark for the horizon to discover a much greater unknown: the world.

name: Sumpworks Map
description: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavourText: "Pilties always think they know everything, but their maps only show the places we told 'em about! Nothing like local knowledge. Which you can have... for a price." - Ajuna Lem, Sumpsnipe Scavenger

name: Chempunk Pickpocket
description: Nexus Strike: Create in hand an exact copy of a random spell from the enemy deck.
flavourText: Those cast below the City of Progress were expected to turn on each other. But instead they bonded, found their feet as one, and created a new home. It wasn't much, but it was theirs. Zaun.

name: Caustic Cask
description: Last Breath: Deal 1 to EACH Nexus.
flavourText: “I’d tell ya to wear a suit, but it gets muggy as a whump’s armpit down there. Gloves though, eh? An’ if you get that gunk on ya’, pray it don’t touch nothin’ important.” - Ziel, Zaunite foreman

name: Anivia
description:
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
flavourText: "I was born from this hard land, and it is mine to safeguard. Time, war, even death itself will not stop my vigil."

name: Glacial Storm
description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: The storm that comes before the calm.

name: Anivia's Harsh Winds
description:
Frostbite 2 enemies.
Create an Anivia in your deck.
flavourText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

name: Anivia
description:
Attack: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
Last Breath: Revive me transformed into Eggnivia.
flavourText: "Cease your march and turn back your armies. The eye of winter has spied your conquest, and its icy claw closes tight about your treasonous hearts."

name: Glacial Storm
description: Deal 2 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: The storm that comes before the calm.

name: Eggnivia
flavourText: In the depths of winter's cold embrace, the Freljord's guardian awaits the hour of her return.

name: Tryndamere
flavourText: "Do not die for your cause. Live for it..."

name: Tryndamere's Battle Fury
description:
Grant an ally +8|+4.
Create a Tryndamere in your deck.
flavourText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

name: Tryndamere
flavourText: "...And make THEM die for it."

name: Iceborn Legacy
description: Grant an ally and all allied copies of it everywhere +2|+2.
flavourText: "We few are Iceborn, our bloodlines infused with the Freljord's magic. Our ancestors locked away an ancient evil, and now we few stand guard to defend against its return." - Gregor the Guardian

name: Omen Hawk
description: When I'm summoned, grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavourText: "Three times our reavers reached Avarosan gates, and three time they were met with ready bows. What trickery warns them of our attacks?" - Scarthane Steffen

name: Harsh Winds
description: Frostbite 2 enemies.
flavourText: "You'd challenge me on my own lands? You're ill-prepared, little one." - Anivia

name: Braum
description: The first time I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
flavourText:
“Papa, tell the one about Braum and his door!”
"Or when his fall split a mountain in two!"
"Oh! Whattabout when he saved the tavern from the rampaging yeti?!"

name: Rimefang Wolf
description: Strike: If I struck a unit with 0 Power, kill it.
flavourText: Predators of the northern reaches have learned that the easiest prey are those already crippled by winter's bite.

name: Avarosan Marksman
description: Play: Deal 1 to an enemy.
flavourText: In the Freljord you can hunt, or you can starve.

name: Scarthane Steffen
description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavourText: "I sealed my oath to the Winter's Claw when Sejuani gave me my first scar. Every scar since has been earned in her service."

name: Lonely Poro
description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
flavourText: "A lifetime in the Freljord, and still nothin's more chillin' than the sight of this sad little fellow." - Poro Herder

name: Jubilant Poro
description: When I'm summoned, create another random 1 cost Poro in hand.
flavourText: "Oho, there's a good lad! Even the coldest winter melts into spring." - Poro Herder

name: Shatter
description: Deal 4 to an enemy if it has 0 Power. Otherwise, Frostbite it.
flavourText: "When Winter rides across the land, she humbles the strong and fells the weak." - Scarthane Steffen

name: Ashe
description: Attack: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
flavourText: "When I look out over my home, I see what it is, but also what it could be. Prosperous and plentiful, not only for my people, but for all those who seek peace. The Freljord, united."

name: Crystal Arrow
description: Frostbite an enemy and all other enemies with 3 or less Health. Draw 1.
flavourText: "All the world on one arrow." - Ashe

name: Ashe
description:
Attack: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
Enemies with 0 Power can't block.
flavourText: "You are not our enemy. Our true foe is the long, lawless winter. We are all people of the Freljord, and this land belongs to all of us!"

name: Ashe's Flash Freeze
description:
Frostbite an enemy.
Create an Ashe in your deck.
flavourText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

name: Entreat
description: Draw a champion.
flavourText: "Reavers approach! Sound the call and light the fires, we'll need all the help we can muster!" - Avarosan Sentry

name: Unscarred Reaver
description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavourText: "Avarosans nurture their young to grow old, soft, and unprepared for the heat of battle. Ours are born in the fires of war itself." - Scarmother Vrynna

name: Enraged Yeti
flavourText: Yetis? I just don't think they exi--AUGHHH!

name: Avalanche
description: Deal 2 to ALL units.
flavourText: The soul of every avalanche is a pebble that would not stay put.

name: Yeti Yearling
description: Last Breath: Create 2 Enraged Yetis in your deck.
flavourText: "It was so tiny and peaceful! Hard to believe it would grow up to be... well... a yeti." - Avarosan Trapper

name: Stalking Wolf
description: When I'm summoned, your opponent summons a Snow Hare.
flavourText:
"You cannot make a wolf from a hare."
- Winter's Claw proverb

name: Avarosan Outriders
description: Allegiance: Grant the top ally in your deck +3|+3 and Overwhelm.
flavourText: As the rows of reinforcements crested the ridge, the Outriders bowed their heads to the warmother. For with her--their Avarosa in the flesh, their queen Ashe--came the promise of peace.

name: Braum
description: When I survive damage, summon a Mighty Poro.
flavourText: "Listen closely, 'n I'll tell you about Braum and the mightiest of his poros!" - Ingvar the Elder

name: Braum's Take Heart
description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Create a Braum in your deck.
flavourText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

name: Alpha Wildclaw
flavourText: The power of a warhorse, the thoughtless savagery of a cat.

name: Brittle Steel
description: Frostbite an enemy with 3 or less Health.
flavourText: "Chilly? Ha! Let us hope that your spirits are sturdier than your summerland steel!" - Braum

name: Scarmother Vrynna
description: When I survive damage, grant me +3|+0.
flavourText: "I would die shivering in the cold before sharing a hearth with Ashe's weaklings. But if they desire warmth, I will give it to them.”

name: Winter's Breath
description: Kill all enemies with 0 Power, then Frostbite all enemies.
flavourText: Warmother Winter is the first and last foe faced by any who would invade the Freljord. Her bloodsworn are the merciless wind and the biting frost.

name: Avarosan Hearthguard
description: When I'm summoned, grant all allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavourText: "Many tribes under one banner! Perhaps one day all the Freljord will fight side by side."

name: Poro Herder
description: When I'm summoned, draw a Poro if you Behold a Poro.
flavourText: A herd needs just two things: love, and company. Anything else is just fluff.

name: Scarmaiden Reaver
flavourText: "The weak harvest, but the strong take. The little Avarosans will learn which they are!"

name: Tarkaz the Tribeless
description: Attack: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavourText: "Tarkaz fought harder and better than most. He took his defeat gracefully, I thought. Well, mostly..." - Tryndamere

name: Tarkaz's Fury
description: Deal 1 to ALL battling units.
flavourText: "... Maybe not that gracefully after all." - Tryndamere

name: Heart of the Fluft
description: Play: Combine your Poro followers into a Fluft of Poros, and grant it their stats and positive keywords.
flavourText:
"One more story, but keep quiet or mother will come!"
"Long ago, raiders attacked Avarosa's village. Her forces were few--all seemed lost. But a poro appeared and offered Avarosa its help..."

name: Snow Hare
flavourText:
"Wolf or hare, winter makes prey of us all."
- Avarosan proverb

name: Wyrding Stones
description: Round Start: Get an extra mana gem this round.
flavourText: "These ancient cairns are reminders that we are but the latest in a long line of tribes to brave these untamed lands." - Ashe

name: Icevale Archer
description: Play: Frostbite an enemy.
flavourText: Avarosans take pride in their harsh seasons and icy lands. Their keen-eyed defenders even take it a step further.

name: Kindly Tavernkeeper
description: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3.
flavourText: "This fine old establishment's the Tipsy Owl! We've got stews and brews a'plenty to chase away the chill. Hurry on inside!"

name: She Who Wanders
description: Play: Obliterate ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
flavourText: "I dug myself out from the rubble to find a scar seared into the land around me. Smoldering ash lay where my companions had stood, and in the distance a looming form moved on..." - Bjerg the Wanderer

name: Balesight
description: Obliterate ALL units with 4 or less Power in play and in hands.
flavourText: “Unearthly light flooded the valley as a piercing wail rattled the rocks from the cliffs, my sinews from their bones, the very thoughts from my mind! Then... silence.” - Bjerg the Wanderer

name: Poro Snax
description: Grant Poro allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavourText: "They gobble 'em up, then look at you, tongues out, happy as sheared 'nuks in the thaw askin' for more! You try sayin' no." - Avarosan treatmaker

name: Battle Fury
description: Grant an ally +8|+4.
flavourText: “I've been told I have a... temper.” - Tryndamere

name: Warmother's Call
description: Summon the top ally from your deck now and EACH Round Start.
flavourText: There will come a day when an unmistakable call will resound through the Freljord. On that day, all will rise to answer it, for it announces that our ancient enemies have emerged once again.

name: Feral Mystic
description: Enlightened: I have +4|+4.
flavourText: “Those who learn to roar as beasts soon forget their native tongue.” - Anivia

name: Icy Yeti
description: When I'm summoned, Frostbite enemies with 3 or less Health.
flavourText: "AaaaaaaAAaaaAaaaaah!" - Bjerg the Wanderer

name: Bull Elnuk
flavourText: Avarosan folk tales speak of "Old Uncle Elnuk", a stubborn old grouch who wanted nothing more than a warm patch of grass and an argument to dig his heel into.

name: Pack Mentality
description: Give all allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
flavourText: A lone howl echoed through the night, followed by another, then another. Within moments, the pack howled as one--a chorus of frenzied voices calling out for blood.

name: Elixir of Iron
description: Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
flavourText: "Rough out there, eh? Not to worry, the 'Owl serves up a special brew so strong it'll pull the chill outta y'bones 'n grow hair on the chest of a newborn!" - Kindly Tavernkeeper

name: Avarosan Trapper
description: When I'm summoned, create an Enraged Yeti in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavourText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."

name: Troop of Elnuks
description: Play: For the top 6 cards in your deck, summon each Elnuk and place the rest into your deck.
flavourText: "Avarosans are like elnuks--dull-eyed grass-eaters easily felled by the unscarred. It is by numbers alone that they stay alive." - Scarmother Vrynna

name: Take Heart
description: Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
flavourText:
"... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!"
- The Tale of Braum

name: Catalyst of Aeons
description: Get an empty mana gem and heal your Nexus 3.
flavourText: Neither ruby nor sapphire surpass the luster of the aeon stone--a brilliant gem with legendary restorative properties.

name: Rimetusk Shaman
description: Round Start: Frostbite the strongest enemy.
flavourText: "To become one with the wild we must not hide from the cold, but revel in its savagery."

name: Ancient Yeti
description: Round End: Reduce my cost by 1.
flavourText: "What was that? Sounded like a sneeze. Do glaciers... sneeze?" - Bjerg the Wanderer

name: Bullseye
description: Deal 1 to an enemy.
flavourText: Gotcha.

name: Mighty Poro
flavourText: "Ol' Longhorn here lost an eye defending the Poro King himself from an ornery wildclaw! After all, it's not the size of the hammer but the size of the heart that matters." - Poro Herder

name: Bloodsworn Pledge
description: Grant 2 allies +0|+3.
flavourText: "I will be a torch in your heart, a shield at your side. Let me find strength to protect us and our kin, and may our lives flow together as the blood that seals this oath." - Tryndamere

name: Flash Freeze
description: Frostbite an enemy.
flavourText: The cold strikes without warning, rendering even the strongest warrior helpless.

name: Fluft of Poros
description: Last Breath: Summon a Heart of the Fluft.
flavourText:
"... At first she didn't know what the little ones could do. But then another appeared, and another, 'til the hall was full of them! And every poro gathered--" 
"Bedtime! If you two aren't asleep in five minutes...!"

name: Starlit Seer
description: When you play a spell, grant the top ally in your deck +1|+1.
flavourText: "Grant them keen ears to hear the wind's approach, light feet to cross the coming snows, and sharp eyes to see beyond the veil of winter."

name: Tall Tales
description: If you have a Yeti, summon an Enraged Yeti. Otherwise, create it on top of your deck.
flavourText: "... and this one has a mouth fulla big jagged teeths an' smashy fists an super an-ger-y eyes an a HUUUGE TREE-SHAKING ROAR! Uncle Bjerg told me so!" - Ingvar the Younger

name: They Who Endure
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each ally that has died.
flavourText: "Ah, old Bjerg's been through a bit. Lost his crew up north, returned pale an' gibberin' months later. Now, it's just "giant beasts" this and "huge claws" that. That poor man..." - Kindly Tavernkeeper

name: Babbling Bjerg
description: When I'm summoned, draw a unit with 5+ Power.
flavourText: "Y-You've gotta believe me! It was huge, I tell you, HUUUGE!"

name: Avarosan Sentry
description: Last Breath: Draw 1.
flavourText: "Once I sought my place on distant battlefields. Now, I've found it beside my kin, my homestead. My eyes are theirs, and their safety is in my hands."

name: Phantom Prankster
description: When another ally dies, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Her cruelest trick wasn't slaughtering the soldiers who trusted the cries of a little girl, but sowing doubt in the survivors who returned home and ignored the pleas of their daughters.

name: Glimpse Beyond
description: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavourText: "I have erred. We were not meant to peer beyond the pale curtain. Whatever insight lingers there comes at far too great a cost." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator

name: Elise
description: Attack: Summon an attacking Spiderling.
flavourText: Once the head of a powerful Noxian house, Elise's dark ties to the Shadow Isles granted her unnatural youth and beauty in exchange for a few unwitting souls offered in sacrifice. An easy decision.

name: Elise's Crawling Sensation
description:
If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
Create an Elise in your deck.
flavourText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

name: Spider Queen Elise
description: Other Spider allies have Challenger and Fearsome.
flavourText: Beauty is in the many eyes of the beholder.

name: Ancient Crocolith
description: To play me, kill 2 allies.
flavourText:
"Put 'em in the cage, tum-te-dum... 
Pluck up every soul, one by one...
Never let ‘em go, no! No sir…
Else them spirits make quite a stir..."

name: Soul Shepherd
description: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, grant it +1|+1.
flavourText: Only the fallen knew that she did not walk alone. Only they could see the countless companions she led down the path to lands beyond.

name: Onslaught of Shadows
description: Summon 2 Spectral Riders.
flavourText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.

name: Hecarim
description: Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
flavourText: That's not thunder. The Shadow of War is on the horizon.

name: Hecarim
description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "Ephemeral allies have +3|+0".
Attack: Summon 2 attacking Spectral Riders.
flavourText: Listen. Hear him ride. The trampling of hooves. The creak of armor, long-worn and rusted. The ghostly cries of soldiers, echoes of the past. The resounding silence that follows.

name: Hecarim's Onslaught of Shadows
description:
Summon 2 Spectral Riders.
Create a Hecarim in your deck.
flavourText: They live now as they died then: loyal 'til the very end.

name: Fresh Offerings
description: If 3+ allies have died this round, summon Vilemaw.
flavourText: "Kneel before your fanged god. Better yet, die before it." - Elise

name: Vilemaw
description: Other Fearsome allies have +1|+0.
flavourText: "Who is your god? What can your god do? Will he let you wither and die defending him? Or will he give you life and vitality like no mortal has ever known? Why serve a god who won't serve you?" - Elise

name: Cursed Keeper
description: Last Breath: Summon an Escaped Abomination.
flavourText: Madness and time. Never was there a more terrible pair.

name: Scribe of Sorrows
description: When I'm summoned, create a copy in hand of an ally that died this game.
flavourText: "Little did our author know that soon the Ruinatio--the Ruin--no, no, no, that's not right, the ink's spilled again! Little did our author--no, no, no!"

name: Kalista
flavourText: In life, she was a general, a protector, a hero. But as flesh gave way, she was left with naught but the blazing fires of retribution--an undying spirit of vengeance.

name: Kalista
description: Each round, the first time I attack revive an attacking Ephemeral copy of the strongest dead allied follower. This round, we're bonded and it takes damage for me.
flavourText: "The wronged shall have their vengeance!"

name: Kalista's Black Spear
description:
If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
Create a Kalista in your deck.
flavourText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

name: Rhasa the Sunderer
description: Play: Kill the 2 weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
flavourText: "We were told... they called it a legend's journey. We were going to... for Demacia's future. We sailed with such hope. But all... all those lives... for what?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

name: Night Harvest
description: Kill the 2 Weakest enemies if an ally died this round.
flavourText: Thin the herd.

name: Spiderling
flavourText: "What are you afraid of? It's just ONE little spider." - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

name: Spectral Rider
flavourText: No longer bound by flesh, rider and beast became one, determined to race mindlessly into battles they no longer understood.

name: Scuttlegeist
description: I cost 1 less for each ally that died this game.
flavourText: Once a beast of burden for a kingdom long forgotten, this monster now scavenges across forgotten battlefields, adding scrap to its shell, and the souls of the dead to its core.

name: Sinister Poro
flavourText: I mean, there are worse ways to die.

name: Escaped Abomination
flavourText: Time may have stopped, but madness remains.

name: Thresh
flavourText:
"Cling clang, go the chains, someone's out to find you,
Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you..."

name: Commander Ledros
description:
Play: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
Last Breath: Return me to hand.
flavourText: Most spirits lost themselves as the passing years eroded their memories. But anguish anchored Ledros to his past. Some things, even time cannot absolve.

name: The Harrowing
description: Revive the 6 strongest allies that died this game and grant them Ephemeral.
flavourText: On certain nights, a tide of hungry spirits swells the Black Mist. It carries them across the seas to prey on the living, and feed the growing darkness with foul new unlife.

name: The Undying
description: Last Breath: Revive me at the next Round Start and grant me +1|+1 for each time I've died.
flavourText: The old martyr remembered rallying his comrades to their doom. But it had been years since he could remember why...

name: Absorb Soul
description: Drain 4 from an ally.
flavourText: "What kills you only makes me stronger." - Thresh

name: Crawling Sensation
description: If an ally died this round, summon 2 Spiderlings.
flavourText: That creeping feeling on your skin isn't nearly as unsettling as the one underneath it.

name: Tortured Prodigy
description: When an ally dies, refill your spell mana.
flavourText: He toiled night and day, perfecting his composition. Then, in the blink of an eye, a dark silence blew through him. Others screamed and ran for their lives. He noticed nothing.

name: Oblivious Islander
description: Play: Grant an ally in hand Ephemeral and reduce its cost by 1.
flavourText: Oh, the poor lad...

name: Thresh's The Box
description:
Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
Create a Thresh in your deck.
flavourText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

name: Thresh
description: The first time I attack this game, summon another attacking champion from your deck or hand.
flavourText: "You're mine. Forever."Cling clang, oh the chains, the Warden's right behind you...

name: Iron Harbinger
description: Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally you have.
flavourText: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.

name: Black Spear
description: If an ally died this round, deal 4 to a unit.
flavourText: "Our spear sings for the fallen." - Kalista

name: Hapless Aristocrat
description: Last Breath: Summon a Spiderling.
flavourText: "L-Lady Elise? Where... where did you go?"

name: Stirred Spirits
description: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+0 and Ephemeral.
flavourText: Some look at the Ruination and only see the destruction and misery. Others see the glass half full.

name: Haunted Relic
description: Summon 3 Unleashed Spirits.
flavourText: These ancient artifacts are treasured both by the living hungry to claim them, and the dead desperate to retain them.

name: Unleashed Spirit
flavourText: ...each spirit another victim of the relic's allure. They seethe in silence as they await the arrival of the next greedy fool.

name: Frenzied Skitterer
description: When I'm summoned, give other Spider allies +1|+0 and enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavourText: "They can spin a web the size of a man in less than a minute... would you like a demonstration?" - Elise

name: Vengeance
description: Kill a unit.
flavourText: The betrayed invoke Kalista on their dying breath, hoping her spear brings them vengeance.

name: The Box
description: Deal 3 to each enemy that was summoned this round.
flavourText: "Nobody escapes." - Thresh

name: Ravenous Butcher
description: To play me, kill an ally.
flavourText: You are what you eat.

name: Mistwraith
description: When I'm summoned, grant other allied Mistwraiths everywhere +1|+0.
flavourText: These specters of the Isles shed their identities long ago to become amalgamations of pure, unappeasable hunger.

name: Mark of the Isles
description: Grant an ally +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavourText: Power, but at what cost?
