name: Possession
description: Steal an enemy follower this round. (Can't play if you have 6 allies or landmarks already.)
flavourText: He woke to find his hands glistening red and the camp unusually quiet.

name: Blade of Ledros
description: Deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to half its Health, rounded up.
flavourText: Half a blade for half a man. A weapon broken as its wielder's vow, broken as the king it was sworn to protect, broken as the kingdom of shadow that once was blessed.

name: Splinter Soul
description: Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral and 1|1.
flavourText: "I lifted the body from the water to identify the poor soul. As I laid my hand upon its shoulder, it turned and showed its face. It was... me?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

name: Atrocity
description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to anything.
flavourText: Killing means nothing to those who cannot know death.

name: Mist's Call
description: Revive a random ally that died this round.
flavourText: "The Mist severs spirit from flesh, leaving behind a foul parody of life. I have seen it corrupt my lands, so I go now to those cursed isles, to end this." - Arie Wrence, Dauntless vindicator

name: Brood Awakening
description: Summon 3 Spiderlings, then grant Spider allies +1|+0.
flavourText: They're hungriest when they hatch.

name: Wraithcaller
description: Allegiance: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavourText: She appears without a sound. The terrors that follow her are far less subtle.

name: Shark Chariot
description: Last Breath: The next time an Ephemeral ally attacks, revive me attacking.
flavourText: "She saw what? I see. Madness is a cruel mistress, apothecary. At least the others make some degree of sense." - Demacian surgeon

name: Chronicler of Ruin
description: Play: Kill an ally, then revive it.
flavourText: There was a time when she sat with her father--a lord curator--as he studied the dusty tomes. He hoped one day she would take on the mantle. But not like this.

name: Ethereal Remitter
description: Play: Kill an ally to summon a random follower that costs 2 more.
flavourText: Spirits, lend your voices to mine! Together, we will call down a darkness unending!

name: Grasp of the Undying
description: Drain 3 from any unit.
flavourText: The dead want nothing more than to silence the ceaseless pulse of the living.

name: Spectral Matron
description: Play: Pick an ally in hand. Summon an exact copy of it. It's Ephemeral.
flavourText: The Ruination corrupted all those caught in its path. The kind became cruel. The brave became brutal. Reason gave way to resentment.

name: Arachnoid Horror
flavourText: Some malevolent spirits take inspiration from local fauna, twisting the familiar into the nightmarish.

name: The Rekindler
description: When I'm summoned, revive the strongest dead allied champion.
flavourText: What use does a dying candle have, other than to light its successor?

name: Withering Wail
description: Deal 1 to all enemies. Heal your Nexus 3.
flavourText: That which kills us makes them stronger.

name: Darkwater Scourge
flavourText: Some fleeing the Ruination tried diving beneath the waves, believing the corruption wouldn't seep into the depths. They were wrong.

name: Warden's Prey
description: Last Breath: Create in hand another random Last Breath follower that costs 3 or less.
flavourText: He held his breath as best he could, praying the warden would move on. Little did he know, this pursuit would just be the beginning of Thresh's delighted torments…

name: Vile Feast
description: Drain 1 from a unit to summon a Spiderling.
flavourText: "My... my lady! I didn't realize you were such an... an arachnophile! Could you perhaps call them away from me? L-Lady Elise? Please?" - Lord Sassen, Hapless Aristocrat

name: The Ruination
description: Kill ALL units.
flavourText: To think something so pure as love could cause something so cruel and inescapable.

name: Soulgorger
flavourText: "As our ships near those haunted lands, I ponder this: did those nightmarish creations originate on these twisted shores? Did they ever truly live?" - Arie Wrence, Demacian soldier

name: Fading Memories
description: Pick a follower. Create an Ephemeral copy of it in hand.
flavourText: For a moment, she remembered. Dappled sunlight dancing across her skin, plump dewberries bursting between her teeth, and the glade’s fragile melody drifting over her on the breeze. Then... it was gone.

name: Subpurrsible
description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Then, if you've played at least 10 other new cards this game, grant me +4|+0.
flavourText: Nothing could stop his escape from those simpering humans. Not even a little water...

name: Veteran Investigator
description: When I'm summoned, ALL players draw 1.
flavourText: Some officers rely on their instincts to crack a case. Others lean on their contacts. But Officer J.S. Harknor's strength is pure diligence, and paperwork. Lots and lots of paperwork.

name: Gotcha!
description:
When drawn, I cost 2 less this round.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavourText:
"Mind trying on these handcuffs, Mr. Berz?"
"What's in it for me?"
"You can keep them."
"...A'right then."
"You're under arrest. Take him away!"

name: Vault Breaker
description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
flavourText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi

name: Insightful Investigator
description: When you play a 2 cost card, draw 1 and grant it Fleeting.
flavourText: "All detectives respond, but a good detective anticipates, and an exemplary detective prevents." - The Warden's Handbook

name: Chief Mechanist Zevi
description: When you draw a card, grant it Fleeting and create an exact copy of it in hand.
flavourText: At age five, she made the world's first multi-frequency sonic knife. While not very practical (she mostly used it to slice sandwiches), it set her on her way to the Wardens' elite Armaments Department.

name: Vi
description: While I'm in play or in hand, grant me +1|+0 when you play another card (max +8|+0).
flavourText: "Enforcer Vi, please! Think of the people! The collateral damage! The PAPERWORK FOR INJURY CLAIMS!" - Insightful Investigator

name: Trail of Evidence
description: Create in hand a random 2 cost card from your regions. It costs 2 less this round.
flavourText: "And thus," Officer Harknor announced, "the trail leads us to..."

name: Suit Up!
description:
When drawn, I cost 2 less this round.
Grow an ally to 4|4.
flavourText: "Trouble at the docks! Take these, and give them my regards." - Chief Mechanist Zevi

name: Vi
description: When I strike a unit while attacking, deal 5 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "So! Looks like your buddies are all tuckered out. You wanna tell me where you hid the hextech, or d'ya wanna make friends with the wall, too?"

name: Vi's Vault Breaker
description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Create a Fleeting Vault Breaker in hand.
Create a Vi in your deck.
flavourText: "I let my hands do the talking." - Vi

name: Patrol Wardens
description: When I'm drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
flavourText: Warden Mir's sprinting technique was a running joke among the other enforcers. Warden Kepple didn't get it.

name: Shellshocker
flavourText: "MY GRATEST STRENF IS PREBABLE MY COMAND OF DA COMON PEEPUL AN ALSO APPARENLY MY SPELING IS RELLY GUD TO" - Note scribbled in sand

name: Slippery Waverider
flavourText: "Swear I seen the strangest things over them reefs, Cap'n. Wha's that lunk put in 'em oranges? Tha's what I wanna know..." - Petty Officer

name: The Beast Below
flavourText:
"Fear not the blasted beast ye know,
For some survive their thunder,
But what of them that broke the bow,
An' took them poor souls under?" - Found scratched into a Bilgewater tavern beam

name: Prowling Cutthroat
flavourText: "...and the idiot said I had hips that 'rolled like the waves'. I told him to cut the flattery, or I'd cut out his tongue."

name: Monkey Idol
description: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and summon a Powder Monkey.
flavourText: "This one's a... souvenir. The crew nabbed it from a crazy old rival of mine. Turns out the fool's ramblings about 'ancient, mysterious powers' weren't too far from the truth..." - Miss Fortune

name: Powder Monkey
description: Last Breath: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Mischievous little scamps, ain't they? More help than they seem, but word is they've got explosive tempers..." - Syren deckhand

name: Devourer of the Depths
description: Play: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavourText:
"I was sailing just the other day,
Out beyond Bilgewater Bay,
When, from the depths, she came my way,
the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady..." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"

name: Devour
description: Obliterate an enemy with less Health than me.
flavourText:
"She swallowed me whole, me skiff and me soul,
So I'm singin' this song in her belly,
And now I must wait 'til I meet my fate,
In the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady." - "Ballad of the Wing-Eared Sunken Lady"

name: Crackshot Corsair
description: When allies attack, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Being short gives you a surprising advantage in a fight. Turns out, nobody ever thinks to look down."

name: Yordle Grifter
description: Allegiance: Nab 1 and create a Warning Shot in hand.
flavourText: "Y'know, friends love to help friends out. And you? I like the shine in your eye and the glint on your cutlass! It is a really, really nice cutlass."

name: Shipwreck Hoarder
description: When I'm summoned, Toss 2 and create 2 Treasures in your deck.
flavourText: "These days, there's more treasure 'neath the waves than above 'em, I wager. Would be easy enough pickins, if 'tweren't for her." - Jagged Butcher

name: Keelbreaker
description:
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
Deal 5 to ALL units.
flavourText: The deckhands roared as one and hauled the chains, their treasure now just below the calm waters. Little did they know the Seascraw's legendary cannon had one final act in store.

name: Treasure Trove
description:
Create 5 random cards in hand. They cost 0 and are Fleeting.
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
flavourText: Captain Finn roared out "Ye earned this, boys! Told ye the Tithe was nothin' but coward feed!" Some cheered, but not all. The waters seemed to still, save for the bubbles around the Rancour's hull.

name: Vicious Platewyrm
flavourText: The terrifying beasts burst through the waves and split the hull with vice-like jaws. Though the sailors begged the Bearded Lady for mercy, their captain's greed had already sealed their fate.

name: Platewyrm Egg
description:
If I'm Tossed, draw me instead.
Summon 3 Vicious Platewyrms.
flavourText: The grizzled captain held his shining quarry aloft and roared out "This'll keep us fer life!" Heady cheers rang out from the crew, while around their brig, the waters began to churn...

name: Bubble Bear
flavourText: Lively currents of magic weave through Serpent Isles' reefs, nourishing the sea's extraordinary inhabitants.

name: Brash Gambler
description:
To play me, discard 2.
Attack: Draw 2 and grant them Fleeting.
flavourText: "Ain't nothing to it, most o' the time. Tables are full of fools too busy singing 'emselves hoarse to focus on the game. Not that I mind none. Coin's coin, and it's better in my pocket than theirs."

name: Coral Creatures
description: When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavourText: Most shallows teem with all kinds of marine life, but none compare to the reefs of the Azure Way. The Way is a magical, otherworldly place, full of wonder.

name: Jagged Taskmaster
description: Plunder: Grant 1 cost allies everywhere +1|+0.
flavourText: Once she fires, the Hooks have to move fast. Blood in the water brings all manner of company... and none of it is welcome.

name: Citrus Courier
description: Plunder: Heal allies and your Nexus 3, then Rally.
flavourText: "All sailors think they so tough! Grr this. Yarr that. Yes yes. Very good. But you still need orange! Make skin pretty, make teeth stay, and make me happy. So you eat, or you swim. Easy."

name: Zap Sprayfin
description: When I'm summoned, draw a spell that costs 3 or less from your deck.
flavourText: Zap once completed the Azure Way circuit in just under three minutes. She even had to dodge the Jilldaw's shattered hull near the end! The currents that day were AWESOME.

name: Razorscale Hunter
description: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavourText: "I've heard he'll swim miles to find his mark, 'n when he finds 'em, he never misses his shot. Not sure if he's a man or a fish, but it's clear he knows these waters far better'n we do." - Jagged Butcher

name: Sheriff Lariette Rose
description: When I'm summoned, grant all enemies Vulnerable.
flavourText: There may be no law in Bilgewater, yet a handful of brave souls within the city's boisterous walls are unafraid of enforcing their own idea of justice.

name: Jagged Butcher
description: Plunder: Grant me +1|+1.
flavourText: Entry into the Jagged Hooks is a bloody affair. Sailors must prove they know their way around a ship, a fight, and a butcher's block. The most unsavory candidates hit all three marks in a single scrap.

name: Riptide Rex
description: Plunder: Play Cannon Barrage 7 times on randomly targeted enemies.
flavourText:
"Sail past the sailors, sail past the wreck,
The battle's already over.
The smoke's cleared the water, their captain's met Rex,
And their ship's ripped an' torn timber." - "Home With You, Sally"

name: Cannon Barrage
description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: Gangplank's cruelty doesn't end with those who wrong him. To make an enemy of the Saltwater Scourge is to bring death upon everyone you hold dear.

name: Abyssal Eye
description: Nexus Strike: Draw 1.
flavourText:
"Aye aye, they cried, and set off away,
To see to trouble in fair Nashramae,
But nature, she turned, and many did die,
An' the rest are off to see the all-seein' eye!" - "The All-Seeing Eye"

name: Petty Officer
description: Play: Summon a Powder Keg or a random 1 cost follower.
flavourText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

name: Petty Officer
description: Play: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavourText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

name: Petty Officer
description: Play: Summon a Powder Keg.
flavourText: Few things, he learned, could motivate a slacking sailor as promptly as a lit fuse.

name: Dreg Dredgers
description: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavourText: It takes a special sort to make complete garbage of perfectly seaworthy gear. But if there's one thing they're good at, it's that. Just that.

name: Dreadway Deckhand
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
flavourText: "Aye, we could fight 'em at dawn, when their crew's awake and their cannons are primed. Or we could leave 'em a gift tonight, nice and quiet-like..."

name: The Dreadway
description: When I'm summoned, draw a Gangplank. Double all damage dealt by your spells, Skills and allies.
flavourText:
"Ohhhh, best say yer farewells and draw down the sails,
For the Dreadway's a-comin'.
We're off to the deep, where graves're replete,
'Cuz the Dreadway's a-comin'!" - "The Dreadway's a-Comin'"

name: Slotbot
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Grant me +0|+1 for each card you drew last round, then shuffle my stats.
flavourText: One prototype spun three bombs and then exploded. Later models had this early "feature" removed.

name: Hunting Fleet
description: When I'm summoned, your opponent summons a Golden Narwhal.
flavourText: The gold that glitters beneath the waves is neither coin nor ingot, but the lustrous horn of the Slaughter Fleet captain's clever adversary.

name: Smooth Soloist
description: Plunder: Reduce the cost of allies in hand and deck by 2.
flavourText: "Come with us on a musical journey! Enjoy tunes from across Runeterra! Just remember--coin's required for entry, and tips are deeply appreciated..." - Show promoter

name: The Syren
description:
When I'm summoned, draw a Miss Fortune.
While I'm attacking, all your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavourText: There's no mistaking the Syren. Her broad pearly sails and polished woodwork leave her as sleek and decorated as the captain at her helm.

name: Plunder Poro
description: Plunder: Grant me 2 random keywords.
flavourText: "His picture's been on the Bounty Board longer'n most, for he's a greedy, ruthless devil that won't let anyone or anything stand in his way. Worst of all? He's... He's cute, damn it." - Gangplank

name: Pool Shark
description: When I'm summoned, draw 1 at the next Round Start and grant it Fleeting.
flavourText: "It don't make no sense to me. I was knocking 'em in easy, but the last one just... wouldn't go. Not my day, I s'pose..." - Brash Gambler

name: Hired Gun
description: When I'm summoned, grant the strongest enemy Vulnerable.
flavourText: "This your picture? Oof, you're even rougher on the eyes than advertised--let's hope your head's worth my while."

name: Jaull Hunters
description: When I'm summoned, create a random Sea Monster in hand.
flavourText: The lure of fortune pulls countless crews out beyond the shallows. Those poor souls soon discover how terrifying the waters can be, and why so few return.

name: Mystifying Magician
description: Play: Transform an ally into a random 5 cost follower.
flavourText:
"Marvolio? Where... Where are my hands?"
"I will-a now make-a them appear! Tadaa! Ahem. Ta... daa...!"
"...WHERE ARE MY HANDS?!"
"OKAY, TIME-A TO GO! THANK-A YOU ALL SO VERY MUCH!"

name: Golden Narwhal
flavourText: Legends say a pale, horned whale once stole from the Bearded Lady. As punishment, the Lady covered the greedy creature in glittering gold, so it would forever tempt the avarice of others.

name: Black Market Merchant
description:
When you draw an enemy card, reduce its cost by 1.
Plunder: Nab 1.
flavourText: "If you want it, I've got it! Even got some 'special stock'.... Just remember, you didn't get it from me!"

name: Crackshot
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Captain's orders: bullet to the face!" - Crackshot Corsair

name: Gangplank
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Powder Keg.
flavourText: "Don't stare too long, lest he catches you lookin'. And don't speak ill of him, for he hears all Bilgewater's whispers. Here he comes. Chin low. Eyes lower." - Dreadway deckhand

name: Gangplank's Parrrley
description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
Create a Gangplank in your deck.
flavourText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.

name: Gangplank
description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Summon a Powder Keg.
Attack: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Seen his eyes enough to know. Ain't nothin' but pure anger there. Someday, the boss'll do to Bilgewater what it did to him." - Petty Officer

name: Powder Keg
description:
Powder Kegs stack.
All of your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
Destroy me when your spell or skill damages enemies or the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Where there's a keg, there's a way." - Bilgewater saying

name: Powderful Explosion
description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Blow 'em to the depths!" - Gangplank

name: Miss Fortune
description: When allies attack, deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "'Miss' Fortune? Out here, you call me 'Captain'."

name: Miss Fortune's Make it Rain
description:
Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
Create a Miss Fortune in your deck.
flavourText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune

name: Miss Fortune
description: When allies attack, deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Most people don't get close enough to see the craftsmanship on these guns. Lucky you."

name: Bullet Time
description: Deal 1 three times to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Even if you fail to hear the bawdy cries of her crew, there's no way you'll miss her laughter...

name: Love Tap
description: Deal 1 to all battling enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "A little something to remember me by." - Miss Fortune

name: Fizz
description: When you play a spell, stop all enemy spells and Skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
flavourText: Of all Bilgewater's legendary figures, Fizz is the most mercurial. Some sailors curse him for the countless brutal wrecks littering the coast...

name: Fizz
description:
When you play a spell, stop all enemy spells and Skills targeting me and give me Elusive this round.
Nexus Strike: Create a Chum the Waters in hand.
flavourText: ...while others insist he's just a playful child who safeguards others on their journeys home.

name: Longtooth
flavourText: Though there may be ambiguity surrounding Fizz's temperament and intentions, there's absolutely none when it comes to Longtooth.

name: Fizz's Playful Trickster
description:
Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
Create a Fizz in your deck.
flavourText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz

name: Twisted Fate
description: Play: Play a Destiny Card.
flavourText: "Now, watch the hands, count the cards, and try to keep up. And just remember..."

name: Gold Card
description: Deal 2 and Stun the strongest enemy.
flavourText: "All that glitters..." - Twisted Fate

name: Twisted Fate
description: Each round, the first 3 times you play a card, I play a Destiny Card.
flavourText: "...it ain't gamblin' if you can't lose."

name: Twisted Fate's Pick a Card
description:
To play, place a card from hand into your deck.
Draw 2 at the next Round Start and grant them Fleeting.
Create a Twisted Fate in your deck.
flavourText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate

name: Blue Card
description:
Refill 1 spell mana.
Draw 1.
flavourText: "Blue as the Serpentine." - Twisted Fate

name: Red Card
description: Deal 1 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Somethin' for everyone." - Twisted Fate

name: Nautilus
flavourText: "'Twas an anchor what broke the Rancour. Pulled Finn down, an' all. Just a handful of us left now, but night's coming... and the cold. I'm sorry, Ma. You were right. The Titan lives." - Recovered note

name: Nautilus' Riptide
description:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
Create a Nautilus into your deck.
flavourText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus

name: Nautilus
description: Sea Monster allies cost 4 less.
flavourText: All pay the tithe, one way or another.

name: Pocket Aces
description:
When drawn, I cost 1 less this round.
Grant an ally +2|+1.
flavourText: "Ain't nothin' like a hot streak to keep the chips comin'." - Twisted Fate

name: Double Trouble
description: Summon 2 random 1 cost followers.
flavourText:
"Oi, Gav--ain't that the fella we're after? Looks like he found a friend."
"Is that... Is that a shark-man, Baz?"
"It's also a bunch more gold, mate. Come on..." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

name: Strong-arm
description: Plunder: Recall ANY follower into your hand.
flavourText: "Yer workin' fer us now!" - Petty Officer

name: Chum the Waters
description: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and summon Longtooth.
flavourText: "Shark!" - Fizz

name: More Powder!
description: Summon 2 Powder Kegs.
flavourText: "Barrel!" - Gangplank

name: Parrrley
description:
Deal 1 to anything.
If this kills it, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Gangplank's version of mediation is often brief, and always bloody.

name: Jailbreak
description: Summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavourText:
"Whatcha think, Baz? He don't look so tough."
"Ya sure, Gav? He broke out of prison..."
"Means he's wily, not tough. Come on!" - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

name: Pick a Card
description:
To play, place a card from hand into your deck.
Draw 2 at the next Round Start and grant them Fleeting.
flavourText: "I make my own luck." - Twisted Fate

name: Playful Trickster
description: Remove an attacking ally from combat to Rally.
flavourText: "One jump ahead of you!" - Fizz

name: Riptide
description:
Stun an enemy.
Place that unit into the enemy deck if you have a Nautilus.
flavourText: "Drag them down..." - Nautilus

name: Mind Meld
description: This round, grow all allies' Power and Health to the number of other spells you've played this game.
flavourText: The currents and tides around Bilgewater are rightly feared for their strength and sudden turns. But no sailor knows the true power within those waters.

name: Scrapshot
description:
Toss 3.
Deal 7 to a unit.
flavourText: "If it sinks 'em, it was worth it." - Bilgewater saying

name: Lure of the Depths
description:
Reduce the cost of Sea Monster allies everywhere by 1.
Draw a Sea Monster.
flavourText: Sailors speak in hushed tones of dark days to come; when the seas churn and boil, and unspeakable horrors rise from the waves.

name: Double Up
description:
Deal 2 to an enemy.
If this kills it, deal 4 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "I always shoot first." - Miss Fortune

name: Salvage
description:
Toss 2.
Draw 2.
flavourText: Flotsam doesn't stay afloat for long. Any seafarer worth their salt has to be able to quickly discern valuable cargo from common junk...

name: Pilfered Goods
description:
Nab 1.
Plunder: Nab 1 more.
flavourText: What's mine is mine, and what's yours is... also mine.

name: Ye Been Warned
description: Give an enemy Vulnerable this round. If it dies this round, draw 1.
flavourText: "Keep yer chin up and yer spirits high, boy! If the cap'n sees ya saggin', he'll hoist ya up, cut y'open, an' feed ya to the gulls. Now, move yer arse!" - Dreadway deckhand

name: Sleight of Hand
description: Plunder: Draw a random non-champion card from the enemy hand.
flavourText: "Cards ain't about luck. It's about people. You get the folks across the table to doubt themselves? Might as well take all they've got there and then." - Twisted Fate

name: Make it Rain
description: Deal 1 to three different randomly targeted enemies or the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Guns blazin'!" - Miss Fortune

name: Warning Shot
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Yer supposed to fire w' the rest of us, lad! That's what a salvo is!" - Petty Officer

name: Jettison
description: Toss 4.
flavourText: "If it ain't worth its weight, it goes over. Same goes for you lot, 'n all. Now back ta work!" - Petty Officer

name: Island Navigator
description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Scout.
flavourText:
"Lift the light from Mother Serpent
To the clouds, up from the waves.
The sky looks down, with gray eyes earnest,
A calm reflection of her gaze.
She smiles, is at peace..."
- prayer to Nagakaborous

name: Wolfrider
description: Plunder: Get an empty mana gem.
flavourText: The young riders of the Winter's Claw are given a wolf pup the moment they can hold a weapon. Their upbringing is devoted entirely to battle--the wolf trained to savage and maim, and the rider to pillage and steal.

name: Caught in the Cold
description: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
flavourText: "These warmbloods wouldn't last a single day in the Freljord!" - Sejuani

name: Sejuani
description: Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
flavourText: While her flail of True Ice is formidable, Sejuani herself is the weapon--forged in the bitter cold of the Freljord and tested against the freezing climes.

name: Ember Maiden
description: Round Start: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavourText:
"They will till their fruitful fields,
They will weakly sow their seeds.
We will set 'most all aflame, 
Winter's Claw takes what it please!" - a Winter's Claw children's rhyme

name: Ursine Spiritwalker
description: Plunder: I transform into Stormclaw Ursine.
flavourText: The Ursine begin as humans, but give up the familiar trappings of their mortal lives for the feral, savage power granted by the great spirit of the Volibear.

name: Stormclaw Ursine
description: Other allies with 5+ Power have Overwhelm.
flavourText: Fully unleashed, the Ursine shed their humanity and take on the power of the storm. They tear across the frozen steppes, their roars echoing like peals of thunder.

name: Shared Spoils
description:
Grant the top 3 units in your deck +1|+1.
Plunder: Draw 1 of them.
flavourText: "Share and share alike." - Ruthless Raider

name: The Tuskraider
description:
When I'm summoned, Draw a Sejuani.
Plunder: Double the Power and Health of allies in your deck.
flavourText: "When Spring brings weather just warm enough for us to plant, it also brings longboats... and the grain that started plentiful grows sparse." - Avarosan Hearthguard

name: Sejuani's Fury of the North
description:
Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
Create a Sejuani in your deck.
flavourText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani

name: Sejuani
description:
Play: Give an enemy Frostbite and Vulnerable this round.
Each round, the first time you damage the enemy Nexus, Frostbite all enemies.
flavourText: "Lay them low! Show them the Freljord belongs to the Winter's Claw!"

name: Fury of the North
description: Give an ally +3|+4 this round.
flavourText: "Embrace the beast within!" - Sejuani

name: Ruthless Raider
flavourText: The Winter's Claw has no equal in the Freljord, and all know the ferocity of these merciless raiders. Once their bloodlust takes over, one can only pray for a quick death.

name: Aurora Porealis
description: Create 2 random Poros and 2 Poro Snax in hand.
flavourText:
"When you wish upon a poro,
An' look at da night sky,
You'll see da snax among da stars,
All sparkly in our eyes" - Ingvar the Younger

name: The Leviathan
description:
When I'm summoned, draw a Swain.
Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus twice.
flavourText: When the Ionian locals saw it looming on the horizon, they thought it a monster. They were not far from the truth--the steel warship is terrifying, the greatest feat of Noxian naval engineering yet.

name: Swain
description: Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "A power beyond mortal understanding gave me the vision to see what most cannot. I peer through the darkness others fear."

name: Swain
description:
When you deal non-combat damage to the enemy Nexus, Stun the strongest backrow enemy.
Nexus Strike: Deal 3 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "No sacrifice is too great to see my vision for Noxus fulfilled."

name: Swain's Ravenous Flock
description:
Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
Create a Swain in your deck.
flavourText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.

name: Citybreaker
description: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: The elder’s voice was surprisingly calm. “What, pray tell,” he inquired, “is the point of gathering stones to build higher walls, when the Noxians always manage to toss them back over?”

name: Aurok Glinthorn
description: Attack: Stun all damaged enemies.
flavourText: “For generations, we have been subjugated. It was not until Noxus took our lands that we finally understood true freedom. That is why I fight for the empire.”

name: Ravenous Flock
description: Deal 4 to a unit if it's damaged or Stunned.
flavourText: Listen. Can you hear them? The thunder of a thousand beating wings.

name: Imperial Demolitionist
description: Play: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Quick and quiet, 'til the boom."

name: Noxian Fervor
description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to anything.
flavourText: "Sacrifices must be made." - Jericho Swain

name: Armored Tuskrider
description: Enemies with 4 or less Power cannot damage me.
flavourText: "There's no stopping a warbeast once it's in motion--best just to get out of the way." - Basilisk Rider

name: Black Powder Grenade
description: Deal 1 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: The hazards of using black powder are a small price to pay for tactical victory.

name: Death's Hand
description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Try to die with dignity." - Swain

name: Iron Ballista
flavourText: "A siege is easy, if you've the tools. The 'breakers bring 'em out, and the ballistae bring 'em down." - Siege Engineer

name: Loyal Badgerbear
flavourText: It's true what they say--pets look like their owners.

name: Greathorn Companion
flavourText: A ranger recruit spends months in the forest with their companions, learning to predict their stag's every move. They must be patient, but once the two have bonded, nothing can come between them.

name: Greenfang Warden
flavourText: "I swore an oath to protect this forest, and all who seek shelter within it."

name: Quinn
description: When I'm summoned, summon Valor.
flavourText: "She's always been a fearless ranger-knight, our Quinn--and with Valor by her side and in the skies, the two are unstoppable." - Genevieve Elmheart, ranger-knight

name: Quinn's Blinding Assault
description:
Summon Valor.
Create a Quinn in your deck.
flavourText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

name: Valor
flavourText: Those who meet him swear they see a glimmer of something more in those sharp eyes, a shrewd intelligence that far surpasses any ordinary bird of prey.

name: Quinn
description: Attack: Summon Valor Challenging the strongest enemy.
flavourText: "I'll follow your lead, Valor!"

name: Grizzled Ranger
description: Last Breath: Summon a Loyal Badgerbear.
flavourText: Betrand got his start in the Bandle Scouts. He got all the badges except for 'Cheerful Demeanor'."

name: Unyielding Spirit
description: Grant an ally "I can't take damage or die".
flavourText: Ignoring the pain of her wounded leg, the ranger stood once more, sword aloft. It was not just her own resolve that kept her standing, but the resolve of Demacia itself.

name: Blinding Assault
description: Summon Valor.
flavourText: "He's in my hair! HE'S IN MY HAIR!" - Legion Marauder

name: Genevieve Elmheart
description: When I'm summoned, give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavourText: To see the rangers of Demacia in battle is inspiring. They fight as one--human and animal, side by side, fiercely determined and utterly inseparable.

name: Ranger's Resolve
description: Give all allies Tough this round.
flavourText: "When the enemy draws near, do not let fear into your hearts, for the trees themselves protect us." - Greenfang Warden

name: Concerted Strike
description: Pick an enemy. 2 allies strike it one after another.
flavourText: "With me, as one!" - Greenfang Warden

name: Sap Magic
description:
Toss 3.
Heal all allies 3.
flavourText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai

name: Deadbloom Wanderer
description: When I'm summoned, Toss 3.
flavourText: "The great treant has continued showing... creatures. This one... to spread life as she wanders... remarkable such... here. These are Blessed Isles indeed!" - Recovered journal

name: Maokai
description: Each round, the first time you summon another ally, Toss 2 and summon a Sapling.
flavourText: These cursed lands would not break Maokai. The treant's commitment ran too deep, and his fury burned too bright, for anything to stand in his way.

name: Sapling
flavourText: "Life here… so effortless. Verdant forests... to sprout overnight… quite exquisite. What a treasure this land is. Must preserve… generations." - Recovered journal

name: Maokai's Sap Magic
description:
Toss 3.
Heal all allies 3.
Create a Maokai in your deck.
flavourText: "These Isles will be cleansed." - Maokai

name: Maokai
description:
When I level up, Obliterate the enemy deck, leaving 4 non-champions.
Round Start: Summon a Sapling.
flavourText: He would destroy the blight within these isles, and restore its long-lost life.

name: Thorny Toad
description: Last Breath: Toss 2 and heal your Nexus 2.
flavourText: "...remarkable species… same creature I found as a child... not a day older! I wonder… next town. Perhaps these wonderful fellows will live forever!" - Recovered journal

name: Terror of the Tides
description:
Sea Monster allies have Fearsome. 
Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: They realized the danger too late. The titanic beast opened its gaping maw and surged toward them. The hunters could only wait for death as the endless teeth slowly crunched through their ship.

name: Neverglade Collector
description: When another ally dies, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Bumped into Niven this... the new ferryman! He rowed us... to... He can certainly hold a tune! Before... must invite him to supper soon." - Recovered journal

name: Overgrown Snapvine
description: When you play a follower, kill it to summon an Overgrown Snapvine.
flavourText:
"Today... another remarkable... surfaced around... children quite scared. But... posed no threat. Nuzzled... quite a trusting creature. Must forage them more berries!"
- Recovered journal

name: Blighted Caretaker
description: Play: Kill an ally to summon 2 Saplings.
flavourText: "Every heart is a garden where roots may take hold!"

name: Barkbeast
description: The first time an ally dies, grant me +2|+2.
flavourText: The creatures of the Shadow Isles shed sentimentality long ago. They all must eat.

name: Sapling Toss
description: Summon a Sapling at the next Round Start.
flavourText: "Wheeeeeeee!" - Sapling

name: Sonic Wave
description:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
flavourText: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin

name: Resonating Strike
description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: "...master the enemy." - Lee Sin

name: Scales of the Dragon
description: When I'm summoned, create a Dragon's Protection in hand.
flavourText: "A student must act with compassion, for the Dragon nurtured the First Lands, and graced them with warmth and life." - Teachings of the Dragon

name: Dragon's Protection
description: Grant an ally +0|+3.
flavourText: "The Dragon will keep you safe." - Scales of the Dragon

name: Lee Sin
description:
When you play a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you play another, give me Barrier this round.
flavourText: "The Dragon aids the worthy. To the weary, it gives vigor. To the sick, comfort. To the lost, light. To the shaken, balance..."

name: Lee Sin's Sonic Wave
description:
Give an ally Challenger this round.
Create a Fleeting Resonating Strike in hand.
Create a Lee Sin in your deck.
flavourText: "Master yourself..." - Lee Sin

name: Lee Sin
description:
When you play a spell, give me Challenger this round.
If you play another, give me Barrier this round.
I Dragon's Rage enemies that I Challenge.
flavourText: "...But for the tyrant, the Dragon breathes fire."

name: Dragon's Rage
description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking both.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
flavourText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

name: Horns of the Dragon
flavourText: "A student must strive with all their might, for the Dragon pulled the earth from beneath the waves, and gave us a land to call home." - Teachings of the Dragon

name: Eye of the Dragon
description: Round Start: Flow: Summon a Dragonling.
flavourText:
"A student must think with clarity, for the Dragon draws the sun across our skies, and reveals the world around us."
- Teachings of the Dragon

name: Dragonling
flavourText: "The spirit gives to those who listen." - Eye of the Dragon

name: Claws of the Dragon
description: While I'm in hand, summon me when you play 2 spells in a round.
flavourText: "A student must listen with focus, for the Dragon roared the first sounds, and blessed our young spirits with the gift of magic." - Teachings of the Dragon

name: Concussive Palm
description: Stun an enemy to summon a Tail of the Dragon.
flavourText: "You did not see me leave, nor will you see me return." - Tail of the Dragon

name: Retreat
description: Recall an ally to create a Fleeting Return in hand.
flavourText: The first Noxians to set foot on the Ionian beaches found a weak and unprepared enemy. Countless were slaughtered, but a handful managed to make their way to safety...

name: Dragon's Rage
description:
An ally kicks an enemy into the enemy Nexus, striking the enemy then the enemy Nexus.
If the enemy survives, Recall it.
flavourText: "The Dragon must be unleashed, or it will consume me from within." - Lee Sin

name: Tail of the Dragon
description: When I'm Recalled, transform me into Concussive Palm.
flavourText: "A student must move with grace, for the Dragon's breath created the wind and waves which brought motion to our world." - Teachings of the Dragon

name: Return
description: Summon an ally that costs 3 or less from hand.
flavourText: ...and how they rallied. The survivors soon gathered their forces, found their center, and showed the invaders the resilient spirit of the First Lands.

name: Deep Meditation
description:
Flow: I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 other spells.
flavourText: Meditation is a journey with no destination--a path that can only be followed by getting lost along the way.

name: Hunt the Weak
description: Your opponent discards the weakest follower from hand.
flavourText: "The frail have no place in this world. Each day brings them new torment, another turn of the vise. I do not deal in death, I deal in mercy." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Wild Claws
description: An ally strikes an enemy. If it has Overwhelm, deal excess damage to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Oooh the wildman's looking EXTRA savage today! Stay clear of those claws, folks!" - Arena Battlecaster

name: Riven
description: When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
flavourText: "I will not run from what I was. I made a promise to mend what I have broken..."

name: Heavy Blade Fragment
description: Give an ally Overwhelm this round.
flavourText: "A warrior must know the weight of their weapon, burdened heavy with guilt." - Riven

name: Riven's Weapon Hilt
description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
Create a Riven in your deck.
flavourText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Blade of the Exile
description: Grant an ally +2|+0, Overwhelm, and Quick Attack.
flavourText: "But a warrior is more than their weapon alone. They must know power, but also consequence, forgiveness, and redemption." -  Riven

name: Keen Blade Fragment
description: Give an ally Quick Attack this round.
flavourText: "A warrior must know the sharpness of their blade, an edge that cuts both friends and foes." - Riven

name: Riven
description:
When I'm summoned, if you have the attack token, or when you gain the attack token, Reforge.
Each round, the first time you increase my Power, grant me that much Power.
flavourText: "...and I will not run from those who would break me."

name: Glinting Blade Fragment
description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: "A warrior must know their weapon's history... every bloody piece." - Riven

name: Weapon Hilt
description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. Reforge.
flavourText: "To know your enemy, first know their weapon. It will tell you how they move, how they think, when they'll strike. It is the purest expression of its wielder." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Arrel the Tracker
description: Round End: If you played a spell on me this round, I strike the weakest enemy.
flavourText:
"Hide, we will find you. 
Breathe, we will hear you.
Run, we will kill you."

name: Apprehend
description:
Stun an enemy.
If you have a Darius, Rally.
flavourText: "I'll handle this myself." - Darius

name: Wrathful Rider
flavourText: "There is nothing like hunting another soldier. To track them, you must think and feel as they do. To catch them, you must fear them as they fear you. It is a bond that few will know, but one I savor above all others."

name: Basilisk Bloodseeker
description: Play: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavourText: The basilisk trainers withhold live food from the beasts in the days leading up to battle. By the time the creatures are unleashed, they do not distinguish friend from foe, and are utterly indomitable.

name: Gouge
description: Deal 1 to an ally and an enemy 4 times.
flavourText: "It's not the sharpness of the claws you've got to look out for, it's the appetite of the beast that's grown 'em." - Basilisk trainer

name: Survival Skills
description:
Allies can't drop below 1 health this round.
When discarded, your strongest ally can't drop below 1 health this round.
flavourText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Sharpened Resolve
description: Give an ally +3|+2 this round.
flavourText: "Yeah, I'll mend your weapons, and tend to the mounts, and cook your bloody food. What else am I good for, eh?" - Erath, Blade Squire

name: Blade Squire
description: Last Breath: Reforge.
flavourText: "Like the huntresses said--a hundred days and nights. A hundred blisters on these feet, a hundred bugs in my breakfast, a hundred 'blade'-this and 'vengeance' that. And well more than a hundred brow-beatings from those three, I'll tell you..."

name: Runeweaver
description: When I'm summoned, Reforge.
flavourText: "Most weapons are crude tools, no better than the hands that wield them. But a weapon infused with runic magic is so much more than mere steel."

name: Brutal Hunter
description: When I'm summoned, give me Quick Attack this round.
flavourText: "There you are. We KNEW you wouldn't come without a fight! Or so we hoped."

name: Jack, the Winner
description: Round Start: Create a Sleep with the Fishes in hand.
flavourText: Years in the boxing ring taught Jack valuable lessons. He learned that if his opponent can bleed, they can fear. He learned the power of a silent stare. He learned the power of uncontrolled violence.

name: Bayou Brunch
description: An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
flavourText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench

name: Sunk Cost
description: Place a unit or landmark into its deck.
flavourText: "Now, I delivered to you exactly what you wanted, friend. I never said it would last forever." - Tahm Kench

name: Tahm Kench
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create an An Acquired Taste in hand.
flavourText: "My friend, I know that expression. I can see you feelin' like the cards you're holdin' ain't the ones you deserve. You got a desire for the finer things, don'tcha? Perhaps you'll allow me to satisfy your hunger, let you savor all that you ever desired. All I need is your name, scratched on my paper... and you, my friend, will be satisfied for life."

name: An Acquired Taste
description: Tahm Kench swallows an enemy unit. It strikes him, then he Captures it.
flavourText: "You had a chance to walk away. Instead, you're the fool who let me in..." - Tahm Kench

name: Tahm Kench
description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create an An Acquired Taste in hand.
Attack: Obliterate my Captured enemies and release my allies.
flavourText: "You struck a deal, my friend, and though you will undoubtedly bask in its benefits, remember... there will be a time when I get my fill, too."

name: Tahm Kench's Bayou Brunch
description:
An ally Captures another ally and gains the captured ally's stats.
Create a Tahm Kench in your deck.
flavourText: "Step inside, friend, and all that you desire shall be yours in perpetuity." - Tahm Kench

name: Lounging Lizard
description: Round Start: Deal 2 to me.
flavourText: "Ah, people are stupid! Give them cold drink and warm chair, and they tell all kinds of secrets to friendly faces. And who has friendlier face than young Leonard, hmm?" - Fortune Croaker

name: Monkey Business
description:
Summon a Powder Monkey.
Plunder: Summon another at the next Round Start.
flavourText: "Aw... d'ye think they're cute? WELL, THEY'RE NOT. They get into everything, they're messier than a seasick courier, an' THEY WON'T BLOODY SHUT UP. NO MONKEYS ON THE SHIP. THAT'S THE END OF IT." - Petty Officer

name: Boxtopus
description: Play: Deal 3 to me.
flavourText: "Sure, Pablo might be in a bit of a 'dry patch'--heh--and, yeah, he's taken his fair share of punches... but ya know what? Ain't nobody else around here getting octokills, pal." - Wise Fry

name: Sleep with the Fishes
description: Deal 2 to an ally to deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Daub 'em with your blood, and set the sharks loose." - Jack, the Winner

name: Boomship
description:
Deal 1 to a unit.
Summon Powder Kegs equal to the amount of damage dealt.
flavourText: "Young Gerent raised the alarm right afore the first one blew. Our hull rocked, the jib caught flame, but the Jilldaw held. Thought that was that, but as I followed Gerent's gaze out to sea, I saw me four more rowboats comin' our way, all loaded with powder." - Jilldaw survivor

name: The Slaughter Docks
description: Round Start: Toss 1. If you are Deep, destroy me to summon a random Sea Monster.
flavourText: Every day, locals wander through the Slaughter Docks to see the horrors Bilgewater's hunters have hauled up from the depths. The beasts are usually dead. Usually.

name: Crusty Codger
description: Play: Deal 2 to me.
flavourText: "RING THE BELL, WILL YA?! AH'LL SHOW THAT POINTY FART WHY AH'VE GOT ALL MA NICKNAMES, AYE. 'EIGHT PUNCH PABLO', 'THE CRACKIN' KRAKEN', 'THE TENTACLED TERROR'! YOUR WEE STINGER'S GONNA BE CRYING FOR YA MAMMIE BY THE TIME AH'M DONE WI' YA!" - Boxtopus

name: Wise Fry
description: Play: Deal 1 to all other allies and grant me +1|+0 for each of them.
flavourText: The rise to power is often a violent business... but it's not normally this freakin' sloppy.

name: Wiggly Burblefish
description:
I cost 1 less for each spell you've played this game.
When I'm summoned, create in hand a random 1 cost spell from your regions.
flavourText: "Stand stwait, noobie! Your mishun is to infiltrate behind emenee lines, plant as many bubbels as you can, an' tell us evewythin' you SEE! E-VE-WEE-THIN'. DO YOU UNNASTAN'?!" - Admiwal Shelly, Shellshocker

name: Fortune Croaker
description: Play: Deal 1 to me and an ally to draw 1.
flavourText: "Ol' Babs has had a few mishaps. Killed a few locals in her time, but I s'pose it helps lend her an air of authenticity." - Lounging Lizard

name: Powder Pandemonium
description: Summon a Powder Monkey for each time you've activated Plunder this game.
flavourText: "Oh, those little sootballs aren't so bad. Here's a tip for you--they like fireworks. So, you take out an enemy's gunpowder stores, and the monkeys, well, they'll do the rest." - Miss Fortune

name: Shakedown
description: Deal 2 to an ally to grant 2 enemies Vulnerable.
flavourText: "You gonna tell me where you got those 'extra kegs', Slim? Huh? Otherwise, we could play a lil' tug-of-war between your tongue and Jimbo's arm. And buddy... I ain't bettin' on you." - Wise Fry

name: The Grand Plaza
description: When an ally is summoned, give it +1|+1 and Challenger this round.
flavourText: Tianna looked out over the assembly, assessing the gathered ranks. The only sound in the square was her banner snapping in the breeze. She gave a curt nod of approval, then lifted the banner with a shout. "Who among you is ready to fight for Demacia?" The resounding cry from all those assembled shook the very mountains.

name: The Howling Abyss
description: Round Start: Create in hand a random level 2 champion that's not in hand, deck, or play.
flavourText: Heroes come to the bridge, called to it by something from the unknown. They brave its bitter cold and crumbling deck to see what lies beyond--victory, or death.

name: Divergent Paths
description: Draw a landmark or destroy a landmark.
flavourText: Targon is a capricious place, where the unbreakable is broken, and the broken made whole.

name: Path of Discovery
description: Draw a landmark.
flavourText: Beyond each summit loomed yet another, but their spirits pushed them onward. They would surmount the peaks of Targon.

name: Vaults of Helia
description: Round Start: If you can, kill your most expensive ally to summon an ally from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavourText: What could better lure a soul to this wretched place than the promise of eternal life, and endless riches?

name: Monastery of Hirana
description: Round Start: Create a Sanctuary in hand.
flavourText: The Ionian mountains hide a handful of sanctuaries for those looking to center themselves and gather their spirits.

name: Sanctuary
description: Recall an ally.
flavourText: "The monastery welcomes all who seek refuge." - Elder Souma

name: Scorched Earth
description: Kill a damaged unit or destroy a landmark.
flavourText: "The drakehounds have the scent. They will find her, and we will finish this. There is no other way." - Arrel the Tracker

name: Noxkraya Arena
description: Round End: Your strongest ally and the weakest enemy strike each other.
flavourText: "Hey there, rrrrreckoner fans, are you ready for a night of scorchin' hot THRILLS in the RING OF FIRE?! Wuh-oh, looks like Tiny Trik drew the SHORT straw today. He's up against the mighty, fight-y, GRANAAAAK the Great! Get those medics ringside, it's gonna be a quick one!" - Arena Battlecaster

name: Path of Destruction
description: Destroy a landmark.
flavourText: Each summit gave way before them, emboldening their climb and filling their hearts with determination. They would scale Targon.

name: Captain Arrika
description: Play: Capture a unit or landmark.
flavourText: As a child, Arrika saw firsthand the devastation Noxus could inflict as it laid waste to her home. When she enlisted in the military, she vowed never to let the Noxian flag fly over Demacian land, or leave another child orphaned.

name: Claim
description: Capture a unit or landmark.
flavourText: "Take back what is ours!" - Captain Arrika

name: Homecoming
description: Recall an ally unit or landmark to Recall an enemy unit or landmark.
flavourText: "Trevvvvorrrrrr, come baaaack..." - Trevor's house

name: Star Spring
description: Round End: Heal damaged allies 1. Then, if I've seen you heal 22+ damage from allies, win the game.
flavourText:
"Up to the sacred falling flow,
Deep into pools, the healing springs
Shining light, water all aglow,
Listen to how the river sings,
High on the crystal mountain."
- Ottrani verse

name: Targon's Peak
description: Round Start: Reduce the cost of a random card in ALL players' hands to 0 this round.
flavourText: Standing watch at the gate to the Celestial Realm is Targon's crystalline guardian. Things fall away in it's presence - hope, doubt, fear. Its trials strip all mortal concerns, and lays bare the essence of the climber's soul. It is on this that they are judged, for the guardian is the great arbiter.

name: Crumble
description: Kill an ally to kill a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavourText: Nothing lasts on these haunted isles. All will end.

name: The University of Piltover
description: Round Start: Discard your hand. Create 3 random cards in hand and grant them Fleeting.
flavourText: The inventions of Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger made him famous, but it was his animated lectures and notoriously unpredictable classroom demonstrations that earned him a lasting impression on Piltover's brightest minds.

name: It That Stares
description: Play: Obliterate ALL landmarks or deal 3 to ALL other units.
flavourText: "There was no time to gather our things or warn the others. We could only run for the forest and watch as it leveled our homes." - Avarosan Hearthguard

name: Extinguishing Ray
description: Deal 3 to ALL other units.
flavourText: The people shall perish.

name: Destructive Ray
description: Obliterate ALL landmarks.
flavourText: The earth shall break.

name: Rahvun, Daylight's Spear
description:
Daybreak: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
It's always Day for us.
flavourText: "Keep your faith, Ra-Horak, and our light shall never falter!"

name: Crystal Ibex
description: Play: Grant an ally Overwhelm.
flavourText: Those seeking to scale Targon would do well to befriend the local fauna. No creature is more familiar with Targon's perilous gauntlet, and none can travel more swiftly across its icy terrain.

name: Behold the Infinite
description: Invoke.
flavourText: The heavens hang over you, a tapestry of black lit with twinkling stars. You are small and dim against its vastness. Where will you turn your gaze first?

name: Meteor Shower
description: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to another.
flavourText: "Forging stars is a messy business, I'm afraid. You never know where those little rocks will land. I am so terribly, terribly sorry if they happen to fall on you. And crush you. Oh so violently." - Aurelion Sol

name: The Immortal Fire
description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
The first time I would die, fully heal me instead.
flavourText: "For ages, the Immortal Fire flew alone, till one day she saw a young bird with fiery golden wings like hers. She rejoiced, for she had never known another like herself. But as years passed, the young bird grew old and flickered out. The Immortal Fire grieved, for she had never known death. And so she wept sparks and sighed herself ablaze, till she emerged, renewed in body but burdened with knowledge." - Shuriman folk tale

name: Moonsilver
description: Reduce the cost of a card in hand by 1.
flavourText: "Each full moon bathes our world in Her silver glow, revealing paths not yet trod, stories not yet told." - Lunari Priestess

name: Living Legends
description: Fill your hand with random Fleeting Celestial cards. Refill your mana to full.
flavourText: "They say that some constellations were once mortals whose exceptional exploits earned them a place amongst the stars." - Mountain Scryer

name: Falling Comet
description: Obliterate a unit or landmark.
flavourText: "I will drive the stars themselves through this insufferable place. It will be GLORIOUS." - Aurelion Sol

name: The Great Beyond
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game.
flavourText: "Oh yes, my favorite constellation. I like to think it will be the first to rain down upon this forsaken mountain." - Aurelion Sol

name: The Messenger
description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavourText:
"As leaves unfurl from barren branches, the Lady of Spring sends her messenger to inform the Lord of Winter of the changing season. The messenger's bark startles the stars into new places in the sky, while his loyal heart warms the land." 
- Song of the Seasons

name: The Charger
flavourText: "The gold of the sun adorns his horns, and its fire lights his heart. Let the thunder of our shields ring out like the thunder of his hooves across the horizon!" - Solari battle prayer

name: The Traveler
description: Play: Invoke.
flavourText: "We were always one and the same--we were separated only by the mountain, the journey, and a sea of stars."

name: The Golden Sister
description: When I'm summoned, summon The Silver Sister.
flavourText:
"From the heavens
Two beings came:
One was robed in silver's glow,
The other clad in golden flame..."
- Hymn of the Hours

name: Starshaping
description: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more, then heal an ally or your Nexus 5.
flavourText: "Look to the stars. If you're lucky, I'll look back." - Aurelion Sol

name: The Fangs
description: Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavourText:
"Mother Moon, show me the way,
Tear the sky open,
Show me beyond."
- Lunari Prayer

name: The Serpent
flavourText:
"During Targon's first equinox, the people of the mountain attempted their first truce. But as their leaders laid their weapons down, one suddenly cried out in pain! Soldiers drew their spears, and all thoughts of peace were lost. Little did they know the true betrayer was a serpent hidden beneath their feet, forevermore a sign of violent times." 
- Targonian folk tale

name: The Scourge
description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game. 
Attack: Give other allies +2|+2 and Overwhelm this round.
flavourText: Legends speak of a Scourge that lurks at the furthest reaches of the Celestial Realm. Here, it awaits the time-at-the-end-of-time, when it will wield the power of the stars to shatter the foundations of the world.

name: Moonglow
description: Grant an ally +0|+2 and SpellShield.
flavourText: "Bathe in Her gentle glow and receive Her blessing." - Lunari Priestess

name: Written in Stars
description: Draw a champion. Reduce its cost by 1 and grant it +2|+2.
flavourText: "The vastness of the night sky represents the gulf between humanity below and the divine above. But there are some mortals who strive to achieve a higher purpose, and if the mountain deems them worthy, they may rise to become one with the stars themselves." - Mountain Scryer

name: Supernova
description: Obliterate 2 enemy units or landmarks.
flavourText: Dying stars create explosions so bright and powerful that even other stars, still lively and burning, are easily outshone.

name: The Destroyer
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 for each Celestial card you played this game.
flavourText: "To safeguard the spaces between land and sky, a horned guardian was placed in the stars over the mountains. Sturdy and swift, it traverses the night sky in search of intruders, whom it greets with an impact that sends shudders through earth and sky alike." - The Minotaur Histories

name: Equinox
description: Silence a follower.
flavourText: In the space between the stars, there is absolute silence.

name: Cosmic Inspiration
description: Grant allies everywhere +2|+2.
flavourText: "Look to the night sky. Take in the stars' brilliance, and let them suffuse you with their healing light." - Soraka

name: Cosmic Rays
description: Obliterate enemies with 3 or less Power.
flavourText: In the dark beginning, a spark of creation rippled through the universe. What sound it made, what light it shone, we will never know, for there were not yet then words to describe, nor yet ears or eyes to perceive it.

name: The Warrior
flavourText: The strongest star in the night's sky, they say, is that of the warrior. An ancient being, thought immortal, who descends from the stars to prove his worth in combat. Never has he been beaten, but all stories must end, and all stars must die.

name: Crescent Strike
description: Stun 2 enemies.
flavourText: "Even the moon's glow can be blinding." - Diana

name: The Trickster
flavourText: "So, there I was going 'bout my day, when in struts this fella packed to the gills with gold. Easy mark, eh? I sidle over, amp up the charm, and amp up the price. It's only when I put my coins away I realize the little scamp's paid me with my OWN money! The Trickster was shining bright that night, I tell ya." - Yordle Grifter

name: The Silver Sister
flavourText:
"...Though both were formed of cosmic light,
They fought, for they were too alike.
And so these two split night from day,
So each could always have their way..."
- Hymn of the Hours

name: Crushed Egg
description: Grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavourText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Hatched Egg
description: Draw 2 different Dragons.
flavourText:
Dragon egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco murmurationis)
Notes: Shell weakened on last turning. Increased movement inside. Cracks on surface superficial?
Scribbled Notes: EGG HATCHING!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Paddle Star
description: Deal 5 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
flavourText: "KaBOOMey!" - Zoe

name: Lunari Duskbringer
description: When I'm summoned, create a Duskpetal Dust in hand.
flavourText: "Duskpetals bloom at night, and then only under a full moon. A proud symbol of the Lunari, we have used their dust for centuries, as only we know how to harvest them safely."

name: Duskpetal Dust
description: The next card with Nightfall you play this round costs 1 less.
flavourText: The fragrance of the duskpetal is like none other. Sweet and strange, but fleeting, it is delicate as moonlight itself.

name: The Skies Descend
description: I cost 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have. Deal 15 to all enemies.
flavourText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol

name: Aphelios
description:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
flavourText: "With every conflict, we show the Solari we are worthy of respect. We have taught them that the moon's light is equal to their sun's, we have taught them not to disregard that which they did not know. And of the lessons they are yet to learn..." - Lunari wanespeaker

name: Crescendum
description: Summon a random 2 cost follower from your regions. Phase Calibrum or Severum.
flavourText: "A crescent path opens before us." - Alune

name: Infernum
description: Give an ally +2|+1 and Overwhelm this round. Phase Crescendum or Calibrum.
flavourText: "The moon grows in flame." - Alune

name: Aphelios' Gifts From Beyond
description:
Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Create an Aphelios in your deck.
flavourText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune

name: Severum
description: Give an ally +1|+2 and Lifesteal this round. Phase Gravitum or Infernum.
flavourText: "From darkness, light." - Alune

name: Calibrum
description: Deal 3 to a follower. Phase Severum or Gravitum.
flavourText: "Move sure as the moon, Brother." - Alune

name: Aphelios
description:
Nightfall: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards or Round Start: Create the Phased Moon Weapon in hand if you don't already have one.
Your Moon Weapons cost 1 less.
flavourText: "...it is Aphelios and Alune who will best teach them.." - Lunari wanespeaker

name: Gravitum
description: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start. Phase Infernum or Crescendum.
flavourText: "Doubt weighs heavy on their minds." - Alune

name: Sun Guardian
description: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Grant me +1|+1.
flavourText: "Shining guardian, your wrath burns like the noonday sun. Come forth and punish those who would trespass on this sacred place." - Sun Guardian's inscription

name: Diana
description: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me Challenger this round.
flavourText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in silver and blue, her eyes like stars. As the moon rose and shone down on her, each of the Lunari gathered there closed their eyes in silent prayer for her safety, and in gratitude.

name: Diana
description: Nightfall or when you activate another Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Challenger this round.
flavourText: Diana raced down the mountain, sword drawn and coated with duskpetal dust. She knew Leona would find her--she was counting on it. Her heart fluttered with anxious anticipation, and she breathed deeply to still it. This time upon their meeting, she would have the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.

name: Diana's Pale Cascade
description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
Create a Diana in your deck.
flavourText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana

name: Resplendent Stellacorn
description: Play: Heal an ally and your Nexus 3.
flavourText: "See that star moving across the night sky? That's a grown stellacorn. While the young ones lend us their healing magic until they can be returned to the sky, grown stellacorns can wield that power on their own. It is considered very lucky to see one and know it for what it is. Luckier still to care for one." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars

name: Supercool Starchart
description: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavourText: "And these three EXTRA sparkly stars I call... 'The Celestial Jump Rope'! Or is it more of an upside down happy face?" - Zoe

name: Cygnus the Moonstalker
description: Nightfall: Give an ally Elusive this round.
flavourText: The Lunari waited for nightfall and the safety it assured. The path ahead seemed deserted, but Cygnus knew the Solari camp lay just beyond. He gestured, and the others quietly fell in line behind him.

name: Lunari Shadestalker
description: Nightfall: Grant me Elusive.
flavourText: "Let us cast our eyes toward the heavens, toward the sun, toward our lady's li-- Wait... What...? What is that...?" - Solari Priest

name: Blessing of Targon
description: Grant an ally +3|+3.
flavourText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric

name: Mountain Goat
description: Strike: Create a Gem in hand.
flavourText: The goats of Mount Targon are even more dangerous than their ordinary cousins, for the gems that make up their horns embed painful shards upon impact.

name: Broadbacked Protector
description: Round Start: Heal your Nexus 3. Deal damage to me equal to the amount healed.
flavourText: "Nobody knows the paths of Targon like I do, so I get stuck with some of the, uh, willful stellacorns. Good thing they've got me to look after them!"

name: Sneaky Zeebles
description: Play: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavourText: Through the crystalline silence of the mountainside came the tinkling sounds of falling ice and, far above them, what the travelers could have sworn was... laughter.

name: Soraka
description: Support: Heal me and my supported ally 4.
flavourText: "Healing is, by its very essence, selfless. You need not draw the power from them; they give it willingly. Show them compassion, and you will see how they shine."

name: Soraka
description:
Each round, the first time you heal a damaged ally, draw 1.
Support: Fully heal me and my supported ally.
flavourText: "What you give of yourself to help others will be returned to you a hundredfold. This is the power of giving. Generosity is a gift that heals the giver as well, in mind, body, and spirit."

name: Soraka's Wish
description:
Fully heal damaged allies.
Create a Soraka in your deck.
flavourText: "For life!" - Soraka

name: Gift Giver
description: When I'm summoned, create a Gem in hand.
flavourText: "They say the Protector blessed these gems. Wear them, and he shall be with you in spirit."

name: Morning Light
description:
Give allies +1|+1 this round.
Activate an ally's Daybreak effect.
flavourText: "We rise with the dawn! March into the light!" - Leona

name: Taric
description: Support: Give me and my supported ally Tough this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
flavourText: "Taric's gentle kindness inspires all who meet him, galvanizing them to find the warmth within to bolster themselves on even the coldest of nights." - Mountain Scryer

name: Giddy Sparkleologist
description: Play: If you Behold a Celestial card, grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavourText: "...and then a sparklefly is like stardust that falls down to the ground and then flies back up and they're amazing and I saw one last night that was so pretty and I'm hungry and it flew up all the way to the STARS and then..."

name: Sparklefly
flavourText: "Hope is a delicate thing that flies ever higher, and should never be caught." - Lunari Priestess

name: Spacey Sketcher
description: Play: Discard 1 to Invoke a Celestial card that costs 3 or less.
flavourText: "This one's my favorite! I call it 'Metaphysical Identity of the Conscious Psyche'. Unless you tilt your head like this... then it kinda looks like two spoons."

name: Startled Stomper
flavourText: "Aww, big Stomper don't wanna go through the wittle portal? That's okay, we can-- HAHAHAHA! Just kidding. OUTYOUGO!" - Zoe

name: Leona
description: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavourText: She stood amidst them as she prepared for battle--radiating light, bedecked in crimson and gold, her eyes like embers. As the rising sun crowned her head in light, each Solari present lowered their eyes, not in shame, but in deference to their shining leader.

name: The Cloven Way
description: Nightfall: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
flavourText:
"Mother Moon, our night is set,
May we halt those who would harm us,
And teach them regret."
- Lunari Prayer

name: The Infinite Mindsplitter
description:
Play: Pick 2 enemies.
Round Start: Stun them.
flavourText: Travelers who lock eyes with the creature are said to be struck by a knowledge so profound, an insight so awesome, that their minds crumble beneath its gaze.

name: Inviolus Vox
description: Each round, when an ally with Fury kills an enemy for the first time, create a random Dragon follower in hand.
flavourText: "Look to the heavens, and see as I do! First the signals, for by night they shine. Then the fury, for by day all burns. You will see! We will all see!" - Herald of Dragons

name: Moonlight Affliction
description:
Silence 2 enemy units this round.
Nightfall: They can't block this round.
flavourText: "Those unaccustomed to the moonlight must learn to see by it, or they will see nothing at all." - Diana

name: Zoe
description: Nexus Strike: Create a Supercool Starchart in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 1.
flavourText: "Hey hiiiiiii! Whatcha doin'? Is that a CARD GAME? Can I play too? What?! I'M in YOUR game? Ha! What a silly dimension..."

name: Zoe's Sleepy Trouble Bubble
description:
Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
Create a Zoe in your deck.
flavourText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe

name: Zoe
description:
When I level up, grant your Nexus "When you summon an ally, grant its keywords to all allies."
Nexus Strike: Create a Behold the Infinite that costs 0 in hand.
flavourText: "Ah, the vastness of space and a myriad realities stretched, squished, and squeezed out before us! Maaaaaybe we'll even see my favorite space doggy!"

name: Aurelion Sol
description:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
flavourText: "I don't care what you write about me, you middling creature! Just make sure I'm described as handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very intelligent. Can you spell that?"

name: Aurelion Sol
description:
Play: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 7 or more.
Round Start: Create a random Celestial card in hand.
Your Celestial cards cost 0.
flavourText: Aurelion Sol is handsome. And magnificent. And also very, very inteligent.

name: Aurelion Sol's The Skies Descend
description:
I cost 2 less for each Dragon or Celestial ally you have. Deal 15 to all enemies.
Create an Aurelion Sol in your deck.
flavourText: "When the time comes, I think I'll make an example of Runeterra. Perhaps I'll drag its smoldering husk around with me for all eternity. Like a toy. A dead, worthless toy. I don't know. I've not really thought about it much." - Aurelion Sol

name: Bastion
description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and SpellShield.
flavourText: "Honor the mountain." - Taric

name: The Flight
description: Nexus Strike: Draw 1 and place me into the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavourText:
"Mother Moon, gift me confidence,
Fill me with The Flight's conviction,
Set me on my path."
- Lunari Prayer

name: Tyari the Traveler
description: Support: Grant my supported ally +0|+2.
flavourText: In traveling, you must be open to the journey, which will inevitably change you. In traveling, you take something new with you... and you leave something of your old self behind.

name: Wish
description: Fully heal damaged allies.
flavourText: "For life!" - Soraka

name: Sunburst
description:
Deal 6 to a unit.
Daybreak: Instead, Silence it this round and deal 6 to it.
flavourText: Few things survive a gaze as unflinching as the sun's.

name: Astral Protection
description: Heal an ally 4 and grant it +0|+4.
flavourText: "You thought you'd beaten us? Ha! We're just getting started." - Broadbacked Protector

name: Spring Guardian
description: When I'm summoned, create a Spring Gifts in hand.
flavourText: "Mostly, I mind the springs, but a shepherd's responsibility is first and foremost to their flock. Priorities have been known to collide."

name: Spring Gifts
description: Fully heal an ally.
flavourText: "Let the springs soothe that which ails you." - Spring Guardian

name: Spell Thief
description: Manifest an enemy spell played this game.
flavourText: "Oh, that was uh-MAZING! But how much better would it be if I did it instead? 'Kaythanksbyeeee!" - Zoe

name: Solari Sunforger
description: Daybreak: Give me Lifesteal this round.
flavourText: The Sunforger held up his focus as light streamed into the room. The Solari artifact harnessed the sun's brilliant rays into a powerful enchantment for his weapon.

name: Mentor of the Stones
description:
Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2.
Last Breath: Create 3 Gems in hand.
flavourText:
"Did you catch anything he said in there?"
"Not a word. Seemed nice, though."
- Emir and Haley, Mountain Sojourners

name: Zenith Blade
description:
Grant an ally +1|+2. Give it Overwhelm this round.
Daybreak: Draw a Zenith Blade.
flavourText: "Let the sun imbue you with Her strength!" - Solari Priest

name: Solari Priestess
description: Daybreak: Invoke a Celestial card that costs 4, 5, or 6.
flavourText: The Solari look to the stars for guidance as much as any other Targonian, for the star dearest to their faith is the sun.

name: Solari Shieldbearer
description: Daybreak: Give me +0|+4 this round.
flavourText:
"Foolish, not to come under the cover of night." The Shieldbearer straightened. "Lay down your arms, and come peacefully."
The Lunari crouched in silence, readying her curved blades once more. 
So be it. 
The Solari readied herself in turn, lifting her shield to reflect the rays of the rising sun.

name: Crescent Guardian
description: Nightfall: Grant me +2|+0.
flavourText: "Stoic guardian, the gentle touch of the full moon restores your strength. Awaken and safeguard us from those who would trespass upon this sacred place." - Crescent Guardian's inscription

name: Solar Flare
description: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavourText: "The closer they stretch toward the heavens, the more the sun will burn them." - Leona

name: Leona
description: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy and give me Barrier this round.
flavourText: This was what Leona had prepared for. She knew she would find Diana fleeing down the mountain, retreating before the light of the sun. She breathed deeply to still her fluttering heartbeat, willing it silent with grim resolve. This time upon their meeting, she had the upper hand; this time, she would face her old friend head-on.

name: Leona's Morning Light
description:
Give allies +1|+1 this round.
Activate an ally's Daybreak effect.
Create a Leona in your deck.
flavourText:
"She is our unflinching leader in the heavens, the blinding flash of our weapons at noon, and the unquenchable fire that burns in our hearts." 
- Solari Priestess

name: Guiding Touch
description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2. Draw 1.
