flavourText: Stellacorns shine brightest when they are happy.

name: Mischief
description: Stun enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavourText: "Hahahaha, lookit 'em GO!  They're just. So. Fast! Is your head spinning too?!" - Zoe

name: Dragon's Clutch
description: Draw 2 different Dragons or grant Dragon allies +1|+1 and Overwhelm.
flavourText: "Their cry sounds like a raspy cat. If you ever hear it, you're to turn tail, and find the nearest guard. You hear? Because where there's dragon eggs, there's dragons." - Targonian forager

name: Sunblessed Vigor
description: Grant an ally +0|+2.
flavourText: "Our shield is our conviction, our resolve, our trust in the light!" - Solari Shieldbearer

name: Gifts From Beyond
description: Pick a Moon Weapon to create in hand.
flavourText: "Reach out, Aphelios..." - Alune

name: Moondreamer
description:
Play: Invoke.
Nightfall: Reduce that card's cost by 1.
flavourText: "Look at all our friends out in the sky tonight! See that extra bright star? That's the Messenger's eye staring down at us! That dim cluster way out there? It is the Trickster hiding behind clouds! And that one over--KULUN, SHH! You cannot paw those down...!"

name: Eclipse Dragon
description:
Daybreak: The next Dragon or Celestial unit you play costs 2 less.
Nightfall: Create a random Dragon and Celestial follower in hand.
flavourText:
Dragon scale (Eclipse Dragon, Draco Obscuratus)
Notes: Scale has incredible optical properties. Highly reflective under direct sunlight.
Scribbled: IT ALSO GLOWS AT NIGHT!
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Mountain Scryer
description:
Your Celestial cards cost 1 less.
Allegiance: Invoke.
flavourText: "There is much to learn from the stars, from their guidance. For us, they are a constant, a way to chart our path."

name: Taric
description: Support: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you played on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).
flavourText: "Why should Taric show his fellow man kindness? Well, he came to Targon a broken man, intent on climbing the mountain to atone for his sins... and he succeeded. Nobody knows better that all broken things can be made beautiful again." - Mountain Scryer

name: Taric's Blessing of Targon
description:
Grant an ally +3|+3.
Create a Taric in your deck.
flavourText: "A little something from Targon." - Taric

name: Star Shepherd
description: When you heal a damaged ally, grant me +2|+0.
flavourText: "Ever since I first saw one streak across the night sky, I've loved stellacorns. If only I'd known then that I'd meet so many!"

name: The Veiled Temple
description: Each round, the first time you play 2 other cards, refill 2 mana and grant your strongest ally +1|+0.
flavourText: It is here, in the Spirit Realm, that Alune communes with her brother Aphelios. It is she who speaks words of comfort to the silent assassin, and who reaches through the veil to hand him his weapons of retribution.

name: Gem
description: Heal an ally 1 and grant it +1|+0.
flavourText: "You don't need to see to believe. Just have a little faith." - Tyari the Traveler

name: Starry Scamp
description: I cost 2 less if you Behold a Celestial.
flavourText: "Adults are LAME. The only cool kids around here are Zoe and her buddies. I learn a lot from them, y'know? Not like that stupid high radiance priestess lady. I mean UGHHHH."

name: Fledgling Stellacorn
flavourText: "Like any fledgling, young stellacorns must eventually take their first faltering flight. In this, they are just like other stars in the night sky, for they fall just as readily. Luckily, we are here to catch them, and when they are ready, return them." - Lidari, Keeper of the Stars

name: Whiteflame Protector
flavourText: It was the children of Targon who first befriended the younger, more peaceful dragons. Perhaps these juvenile creatures could sense the children's innocent curiosity, and chose, instead of causing them harm, to offer them protection.

name: Herald of Dragons
description: Dragon allies cost 1 less.
flavourText: The clouds twisted around their massive forms, and the sky itself seemed to shake with their keening wails. She knew what was to come, and yet felt not fear but the warm embrace of destiny.

name: Out Of The Way
description: For the rest of the game, allied buffs (except Barrier) are permanent. Draw 1.
flavourText:
"You know I mean everything that I say
When you see me coming get out of the way
I came to slay I came to slay
Back and I’m better and ready to stay."
- Kai'Sa, 'THE BADDEST'

name: Messenger's Sigil
description: Create 5 The Messengers in your deck.
flavourText: "Time passes, skies turn--the Serpent moves aside and the Messenger takes its place overhead. A season of abundance awaits..." - Lunari Priestess

name: Shards of the Mountain
description: Fill your hand with Gems.
flavourText: "Turn a gem just so, and it glimmers in the light. Like mortal lives, each has its own inner fire." - Taric

name: Sky Charge
description: Stun an enemy. If it's a follower, Stun it again at the next Round Start.
flavourText: The Solari did not believe that another light could blind--a lesson the Lunari would readily teach.

name: The Sky Shadows
description: When I'm summoned, refill 2 spell mana if you Behold a Nightfall card.
flavourText:
"Mother Moon, allow me to remember,
That though I stand in solitude,
Your children dance above,
And I am not alone."
- Lunari Prayer

name: Arbiter of the Peak
description: I cost 1 less for each time you've targeted or supported allies this game.
flavourText: The Arbiter is the mountain's final test, for only the guardian sees beyond the climber's deeds, and into their spirit.

name: Hush
description: Silence a unit this round.
flavourText: "They will know serenity." - Soraka

name: Mountain Sojourners
description: Support: Grant my supported ally +2|+2. If it has Support, grant its supported ally +2|+2 and continue for each supported ally in succession.
flavourText: Every person who braves Mount Targon has their reason to climb. Some do it to prove themselves in the eyes of their peers. Others, to prove something to themselves.

name: Stargazer
description: When you heal a damaged ally, give it Elusive this round.
flavourText: "Stars stay with us for only so long. Once they have been tended to, I return them to the sky in a sudden blaze of starlight... and flailing hooves."

name: Solari Soldier
description: Daybreak: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavourText: As the sun warmed him, he stood watch at the heretic's prison, ignoring the soft pleas that quickly turned to bitter silence.

name: Grandfather Rumul
description: Play: Grant 2 allies +0|+4.
flavourText: "Listen, Osu. Do you hear that? Bells! Grandfather's back!" - Illi, Star Shepherd

name: Pale Cascade
description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
Nightfall: Draw 1.
flavourText: "Under cover of night, watched over by a pale moon." - Diana

name: Lunari Priestess
description: Nightfall: Invoke.
flavourText: "Oh, stars above, journeying like many pilgrims through the night's expanse--stay with us a moment, tell us what you've seen." - The Paeans of Evening

name: Starbone
description: If you Behold a Celestial, create The Messenger in your deck and grant Celestial allies everywhere +1|+1.
flavourText:
"May the Messenger play,
And with his joy,
Light the stars."
- Lunari Prayer

name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble
description: Stun an enemy. Create a Fleeting Paddle Star in hand.
flavourText: "Naptime for you! One sparklefly, twoooo sparklefly, thre-- Hey, what'sthatoverthere?!" - Zoe

name: Fused Firebrand
flavourText: Countless challenges await those climbing Mount Targon. Some, like the endless ascent, slowly sap the aspirants' strength. Others are much more immediate.

name: Porofly
flavourText: In space, no one can hear you squee.

name: Patched Porobot
description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
flavourText: It's not quite as cuddly as the real thing, but it IS just as cute.

name: Ballistic Bot
description: Round Start: Create an Ignition in hand.
flavourText:
Subject requested that we keep only his mind intact, stating "That's where I've stored all my grudges."
- Augmentor's log, entry 1011

name: Death Ray - Mk 1
description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavourText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations

name: Death Ray - Mk 3
description: Deal 3 to a unit.
flavourText:
"The beam melts flesh and metal alike with exceptional speed! I have since eagerly integrated it onto my machine body. To see, feel, and dissect the world with such CLARITY... This is the great potential of the human mind unburdened by flesh! A truly glorious evolution!" 
- Viktor's design annotations

name: Death Ray - Mk 2
description: Deal 2 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 3 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavourText:
"Altered beam transmission medium, adjusted lenses to optimal focal distances, internal mirrors polished and positioned. Intensity increased tenfold. But it must improve. I MUST IMPROVE!"
- Viktor's design annotations

name: Viktor
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
flavourText: "Zaun, you have seen your share of tragedies, and the time has come for change. And, as with all great advancements, it must start within you."

name: Viktor
description:
Your created cards cost 1 less.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Hex Core Upgrade in hand.
flavourText: "Ah, Piltover. As a boy, I looked up to you, the shining 'City of Progress'. But as a man, I see its corrupt foundations, built atop the suffering of our home, Zaun. Today, we herald a new era of Zaunite innovation--and you will be the first to witness our rise!"

name: Viktor's Death Ray - Mk 1
description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Death Ray - Mk 2 in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a Viktor in your deck.
flavourText:
"Today, I have successfully demonstrated that radiant energy can be focused into a single powerful beam! With the right improvements, this ray could be a tool of unmatched precision, but there is still much to do."
- Viktor's design annotations

name: Hex Core Upgrade
description: Grant Viktor a random keyword.
flavourText: Humanity is destined to break free from the confines of flesh. We must become more. We must augment. We must evolve!" - Viktor

name: Mechanized Mimic
description: Attack: Grant me all keywords on allies.
flavourText: "I'm just like you, only better."

name: Give It All
description:
Grow all allies' Power and Health to the highest Power or Health among allies.
Grant all allies allied keywords.
flavourText:
"I know I know
You want some more
If you ready let’s go
Giving it all"
- Seraphine, 'MORE'

name: Calculated Creations
description: Create an Armed Gearhead, Ballistic Bot, or Nyandroid in hand and grant it +1|+1.
flavourText: "Rationality and choice separate humanity from its base animal instincts." - Viktor

name: Iterative Improvement
description: Pick a follower. Create a copy of it in hand with +1|+1.
flavourText: "Self-improvement is a game where you are the hero and the villain. You will struggle. You may even think you've won. But in the end, you will always be left standing in your own way." - Mechanized Mimic

name: Stress Testing
description: Remove Fleeting from all cards in hand. When I'm discarded, draw 1 Fleeting.
flavourText: "It's simple stuff, really. I replaced the steel frame with a more durable alloy I invented, and rerouted the circuitry away from the hinges to stop the systems from shorting out. Easy peasy." - Chief Mechanist Zevi

name: Armed Gearhead
flavourText: "Alright! New arm! Always wanted one of those. What've we got next? Gravwheels for legs? Electrobelts? METAL TEETH? Actually, leave my face. I like my face."

name: Hexcore Foundry
description: Round Start: ALL players draw 1.
flavourText: "Let them say what they will about my methods. They cannot deny progress--the light of my knowledge is shining like a beacon through the darkness of ignorance!" - Viktor

name: Ignition
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText:
"If they do not choose to add metal to their bodies, I will deliver metal to them instead. That was a humorous remark. Ha."
- Ballistic Bot

name: Nyandroid
flavourText: "I clawed my way through years of Piltovan academia only to have my technologies deemed 'too dangerous' and my very presence dismissed as 'too cute'! Meow to Zaun, where I know at least one great mind shares my ambitions..."

name: Aftershock
description: Deal 3 to a unit or destroy a landmark.
flavourText: "This ray of light will guide our march to Piltover. Nothing will stand in the way of our Glorious Evolution!" - Viktor

name: Tri-beam Improbulator
description: Deal 1 to a unit. Summon a random 1 cost follower. While I'm in hand, increase both by 1 when you play a 3 cost card.
flavourText: "...and in one, two, and THREE!!! Oh. Oh, my word... Yet another unforeseen outcome?!" - Heimerdinger

name: Poro Cannon
description:
To play, discard 1.
Create 2 Daring Poros in hand.
flavourText: Two downy shapes arced gracefully over the adoring crowd, leaving a cloud of fluff and the faint scent of baked goods in their wake.

name: Stalking Shadows
description:
Pick a follower from the top 4 cards in your deck.
Draw it, place the rest into your deck, then create an exact Ephemeral copy in hand.
flavourText: "Go... surround them..." - Nocturne

name: Evershade Stalker
description: Nightfall: Create a copy of me in hand.
flavourText: "It was just a pair of eyes at first, and a lone voice chittering in the shadows. More every time I looked back. Angrier. Louder. Soon as I saw the Tooth, I ran." - Whale's Tooth looter

name: Gluttony
description: Kill an ally with Last Breath to summon a follower from your deck that costs 1 more.
flavourText: "SUPPAH TIIIIME!" - Ravenous Butcher

name: Passage Unearned
description: Obliterate all units that were summoned, but not played, this round.
flavourText:
"Of course, death is present in Demacia. We see it take our loved ones and know that, someday, it will come for us. But on these isles... I can almost taste death. I feel it in my lungs as I breathe, I hear it whisper in my ear. It is not some abstract notion. It sits with me here. Now. And it will have us all."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Encroaching Shadows
description: Grant ALL allies in your deck and hand +2|+2 and Ephemeral.
flavourText:
"Mind or body, I fear that the nightmares of the Shadow Isles will break us all eventually, and insanity will reign forever."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Go Hard
description:
Drain 1 from a unit.
Create 2 copies of Go Hard in your deck. Every third time this happens, transform all copies of me everywhere into Pack Your Bags.
flavourText:
"We go hard, 'til we get it, get it
We go hard, we so in it, in it
We Pop Stars (Pop Stars), only winning, winning now
Ain't nobody bringing us down, down, down, down"
- Evelynn, 'POP/STARS'

name: Pack Your Bags
description: Deal 5 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. Transform all copies of me everywhere back to Go Hard.
flavourText:
"Sorry for the bad news sorry I’m so bad
Only took a minute for me to get all you had
Sorry for the bad news know it makes you sad
I’ll be here for a minute baby you should pack your bags"
- Evelynn, 'THE BADDEST'

name: Shroud of Darkness
description: The next time you summon an ally this round, give it +1|+0 and SpellShield this round.
flavourText: "Soon as you step outside the Tooth, you'll feel 'em. Fingertips on your nape, light as rain. Them creatures don't budge when you come at 'em, neither. Ain't afraid of my blade or my torch. Nothin'. Awful things." - Whale's Tooth looter

name: Nocturne
description: Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavourText:
"It appears that, once enough souls have been shaken, it breaches our world. Only hope can send the monstrosity back to its realm... but hope died here long ago, on a queen's final breath, and with a king's eternal scream."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Nocturne's Unspeakable Horror
description:
Drain 1 from anything. Create a Nocturne in your deck.
Nightfall: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
flavourText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Nocturne
description:
Nightfall: Grant an enemy Vulnerable and give enemies -1|-0 this round.
Other allies have Fearsome.
When you summon another ally, give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavourText:
"My dreams grow more vivid with each passing night. I see a creature of pure evil, writhing in the dark, twisting its way toward me. Though I was to be stationed here for another week, I have just paid for transport to Fossbarrow this evening. Plainly, I cannot stand this place."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Doombeast
description: Nightfall: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: With each passing night, the travelers grew more weary. Their slumber was restless, and their dreams vivid. Sleep no longer gave respite, and instead pulled the life from their bones.

name: Pesky Specter
description: Last Breath: Create 2 copies of me in the enemy deck.
flavourText: Most of the spirits on the Shadow Isles are utterly terrifying and morbid creatures. A small handful are... well... just really, really annoying.

name: Torment
description: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: What knows you better than your own mind? What can torment you more exquisitely than your own dreams?

name: Stygian Onlooker
description: Nightfall: Give me +2|+0 and Fearsome this round.
flavourText: As the sun melts into pitch, the terrors of this place wake, watch, and wait.

name: Unspeakable Horror
description:
Drain 1 from anything.
Nightfall: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
flavourText:
"Every passing day saps my spirit, pulls from me the vigor that compelled me to find this place. The Whale's Tooth is full of haggard folk, seemingly lost to all endeavor, and I fear the longer I stay, the more like them I become."
- Notes of Jens Tommen, historian

name: Duskrider
description: Nightfall: Grant me +1|+0 for each time we've activated Nightfall this game.
flavourText: With every setting sun, the night unfurls its dark wings, and blots out the day's last remnants of hope.

name: Risen Mists
description: Summon a Mistwraith.
flavourText: The mistwraiths move through planes unseen by mortal eyes, appear without warning, and inflict misery on all they encounter.

name: Flurry of Fists
description: Grant an ally +1|+0 and Quick Attack. If it already has it, grant it Double Attack instead.
flavourText: "Hit often, hit fast, and hit hard." - Horns of the Dragon

name: Pix!
description: Support: Give my supported ally +2|+1 this round.
flavourText:
"Pix is AWESOME, he's small and cool and wholesome,
His favorite things are possums, and he likes to... hrmhmhmhrmthrossom!" - Lulu

name: Whimsy!
description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round.
flavourText: "Adoribus!" - Lulu

name: Squirrel
flavourText: A fae flash knocked him to the floor! Newly keen ears heard a yordle's fading laughter, and he looked down to see furry paws, attached to furry arms...

name: Flower Child
description: When I'm supported, grant me +2|+0.
flavourText: Everyone wants a familiar, but no one's prepared for the responsibility. You've gotta take them on walkies, make sure they're eating a balanced diet... house-train them. It's a lot of work.

name: Singular Will
description: Pick an ally. Recall ALL other units and landmarks.
flavourText: "I walk my path alone." - Solitary Monk

name: Lulu
description: Support: My supported ally grows up to 4|4 this round.
flavourText: "Don't you worry, Pix! We're gonna get outta the Glade, and we're gonna adoribus ALL THE THINGS! Are you ready?!"

name: Help, Pix!
description: Give an ally Barrier or an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavourText: Pix protec... or Pix attac...?

name: Lulu's Whimsy!
description: Transform a follower into a 1|1 Squirrel and Silence it this round. Create a Lulu in your deck.
flavourText: "Adoribus!" - Lulu

name: Lulu
description:
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Help, Pix! in hand.
Support: My supported ally grows up to 5|5 this round.
flavourText: "Oooh! Look, Pix! It's a whole different world out here! Now let's give it lots of colors!"

name: Swole Squirrel
description: Strike: Double my Power.
flavourText: His secret is acorn powder shakes, four times a day.

name: Tasty Faefolk
flavourText: Energy: 104kJ (25 kcal), Carbohydrates: 5.88g, Sugars: 3.53g, Dietary Fiber: 3g, Fat: 0.18g, Protein: 0.98g, Water: 92g...

name: Fae Guide
description: Play: Grant an ally Elusive.
flavourText: "Shh! This way! We've gotta make a sharp left after the walking treehouse, then go straight past the talking flowers. Lu, you listening to me? Lu? Lu! LULU! Do. NOT. Feed them. Do not do that."

name: Trevor Snoozebottom
description: Support: Create an attacking Mumblesprite with my supported ally's stats.
flavourText: You're supposed to follow your dreams, not manifest them through inadvertent muttered conjuration as you sleep-float through an ancient magical forest. I mean SHEESH.

name: Mumblesprite
flavourText: Another mumblesprite burst out, its eyes full of devilish mischief. "No more cheese for Trevor!" Bri announced. The others all nodded.

name: Young Witch
description: Support: Give my supported ally Quick Attack and +1|+0 this round.
flavourText: Sir Ribery Montague left home hoping to complete some great quest or curry favor with a notable house. But fate led him to a hidden bandlewood, where young Bri quickly transformed Sir Ribery into a frog, and yanked him off on HER adventures. Poor Rib!

name: Nopeify!
description: Stop a Fast or Slow spell that costs 3 or less.
flavourText: "Don't do that, you silly smufflefloof! You might hurt the antylopes!" - Lulu

name: Go Get It
description: Recall an ally to summon an exact Ephemeral copy in its place. Reduce its cost to 0 this round.
flavourText:
"More
Know I got it,
So here you go,
You look like you could use some more."
- Akali, 'MORE'

name: Fuzzy Caretaker
description:
When I'm supported, give me +0|+3 this round.
Support: Give my supported ally +3|+0 this round.
flavourText: The purple faefolk are sweet little creatures, and cared for by all those who encounter them. Well, almost all.

name: Dragonguard Lieutenant
description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, grant me Challenger.
flavourText: "When I lost my comrades in arms at Wrenwall, I thought I had also lost my resolve... but it turns out there is nothing that a fight can't stir up in an old soldier."

name: Confront
description:
Grant an ally Challenger.
If it's a Dragon, draw 1.
flavourText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana

name: Stony Suppressor
description: ALL spells cost 1 more.
flavourText: What begins as a shapeless, rough-hewn block of petricite quickly becomes something more under the clever hands of its sculptor. That is when a piece truly starts to come to life.

name: Screeching Dragon
flavourText: All creatures are fiercely protective of their young, but few are as well equipped to deal with would-be threats as a dragon.

name: Molten Breath
description: An ally with Fury strikes the 2 weakest enemies one after another.
flavourText: For centuries, the Demacians only knew of a dragon's fury through legend. Wrenwall changed that.

name: Strafing Strike
description: An ally and an enemy strike each other. Then, if the ally is a Dragon, heal it 5.
flavourText: When knight and dragon separated, panting and wounded, the latter seemed reinvigorated. It smelled blood, and was eager for more.

name: Shyvana
description: Attack: Give me +1|+1 this round.
flavourText:
"On the one hand, she is, by her very nature, our most hated foe, her kind having historically brought only anguish to Demacia. On the other, she is trusted by the Prince, and seems to have all the makings of a determined soldier and valuable ally. I only hope that she does not betray the trust we have placed in her."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall

name: Dragon Shyvana
description: Attack: Give me +2|+2 this round and create a Fleeting 2 cost Strafing Strike in hand.
flavourText:
"The first time I witnessed her transformation, I beheld her with revulsion. There was Yvva, replete in fire and fury! If only I had known then what I know now--that she would become our sister in arms, an exemplary soldier... and my dear, dear friend."
- Page from Lieutenant Jerik's account on Wrenwall

name: Shyvana's Confront
description:
Grant an ally Challenger. 
If it's a Dragon, draw 1.
Create a Shyvana in your deck.
flavourText: "None shall escape us!" - Shyvana

name: Dragonguard Lookout
description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold a Dragon, Rally.
flavourText:
"There in the distance! Is that...?"
"Looks like it."
"How can you be sure?"
"Oh, there's no mistaking them. Cover your ears. This will be loud." - Anden and Yessenia

name: Stalking Broodmother
flavourText: "Careful, soldiers! If we tread carefully and don't disturb the nest, we can keep the mother dragon on the defensive. If we rile her up any further... Well, you'll want to be ready to run." - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Egghead Researcher
description: When I'm summoned, create a random Dragon in hand.
flavourText:
Dragon Egg (Screeching Dragon, Draco Murmurationis) 
Location: Recovered by researcher Anden Mayne on Expedition. 
Notes: Gestation period unknown. Incubation continued. Recent movement observed within shell. Egg responds to heat, light, hammer. Current studies inconclusive. 
- Notes of Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Kadregrin the Infernal
description: When I'm summoned, grant other Dragon allies everywhere +4|+4.
flavourText: When Demacia underwent a sudden spate of dragon attacks, Shyvana knew that Kadregrin the Infernal was to blame. Other dragons, inspired by his bold nature and powerful flame, drove the Demacians to fear.

name: For The Fallen
description:
When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
For each ally that died this round, summon a Dauntless Vanguard.
flavourText: "If a soldier falls, another must take their place. Our banner must never fall." - Garen

name: Sharpsight
description: Give an ally +1|+2 and Sharpsight this round.
flavourText: Any who would dare breach Demacia's walls will find a full company awaiting them--forewarned and heavily armed.

name: The Scargrounds
description: When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+0 and Tough.
flavourText: There are many places of honor among the Winter's Claw, but one of the greatest is The Scargrounds, where damaged war vessels that have returned from raids are repurposed as gathering halls for warriors and their kin. These ships embody the tribe that built them--resilient and adaptable.

name: Troll Scavenger
description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me +3|+0.
flavourText:
The scout knelt by a tattered edge of cloth hidden in the snow, where the scent of human sweat and fire smoke lingered in the cold air.
He pulled the material free and saw at one end, a talisman dangled, dull under the stormy sky. Avarosan.

name: Revitalizing Roar
description:
Pick a unit in hand to reveal. Heal your Nexus equal to its Power.
Enlightened: Reduce its cost to 0.
flavourText: "Fully grown trolls have thick hides and dense bones that heal quickly, making them terrible, tenacious foes. Cut them down quickly, lest they recover to fight again another day." - Avarosan Marksman

name: Augur of the Old Ones
description: Play: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant an ally Overwhelm and Regeneration.
flavourText: It is said that very few trolls are taught the chants of the Old Ones, and that those who know them can call on their forebears to imbue their brethren with exceptional strength.

name: Trundle
description: When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
flavourText:
One by one, torches lit along the pass, throwing the scene into sharp relief. There were dozens of trolls, maybe hundreds, each one hulking, massive, and deadly.
"I'll ask one more time," Trundle snarled, hefting Boneshiver over one shoulder. "Are you gonna give up, or am I gonna have to break your skulls?"

name: Trundle
description:
When I'm summoned, create an Ice Pillar in hand.
Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each 8+ cost card you Behold.
flavourText: The Avarosans refused. Trundle gestured, and, like an avalanche, the trolls descended with such momentum that it carried them on for miles afterward, deep into the Avarosan tribelands, battering and breaking everything in their path without reserve.

name: Trundle's Icequake
description:
Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
Create a Trundle in your deck.
flavourText: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle

name: Ice Pillar
description:
Play: Refill 8 mana.
Play and Round Start: Give the strongest enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavourText: "Haha! You didn't see that coming!" - Trundle

name: Icequake
description: Give ALL units -3|-0 this round. Deal 3 to ALL units.
flavourText: "Bury 'em alive!" - Trundle

name: Troll Chant
description: Give an ally +0|+2 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: Troll chants are highly varied. They differ from group to group, and are often incomprehensible. They are all, however, terrifying to witness.

name: Uzgar the Ancient
flavourText:
They felt it before they heard it, the ground trembling beneath their feet, but it quickly became audible, like distant thunder drawing closer.
Meyrick lifted his head, eyes wide, listening.
"What is it?" Anya whispered urgently, drawing her bow, but Meyrick was already sprinting back toward the path. 
"RUN!"

name: Troll Ravager
description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an 8+ cost card, grant me Regeneration.
flavourText: Once they were among the Avarosan huts, they called Hgar forward. With a laugh, she raised Snowsunder, ready to use the weapon to batter the wooden homes into little more than splinters.

name: Call the Wild
description: For the top 4 cards in your deck, draw each Yeti, Poro, and Elnuk. Then place the rest into your deck.
flavourText: "...an' then a BIIIIG HUUUGE ELNUK came FLYIN' out of the trees with a teeny lil' poro on his back an' there was a FRIENDLY YETI as well because he wanted to play with his friends an' they all ran down the mountain goin' RAAAAAWRRRR an' then..." - Ingvar the Younger

name: Faces of the Old Ones
description: Round Start: If you Behold an 8+ cost card, get an extra mana gem this round.
flavourText:
"Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Rule of ice, break the sky.
Rise, Old Ones, rise,
Bring us strength, them demise."
- Troll chant

name: Voices of the Old Ones
description:
Get 2 empty mana gems.
For the top 5 cards in your deck, draw each card that costs 8+. Then place the rest into your deck.
flavourText: For generations, Avarosan settlers heard strange, inexplicable sounds within the tumult of winter storms. Eventually, when they ventured much farther north, they finally discovered the source--ancient troll monoliths whispering in long-lost tongues as the wind swept through their yawning maws.

name: Troll Gifts
description: Grant an ally Regeneration. If they already have it, grant them +2|+2 instead.
flavourText: Pity those who see the promise of victory in a troll's blood.

name: Feel The Rush
description: Summon 2 different, random champions from your hand and deck. Grow their stats up to 10|10.
flavourText:
"We got it all in our hands now
So can you handle what we're all about?"
- Ahri, 'POP/STARS'

name: Ekko
description: Strike: Create a Fleeting Time Trick in hand.
flavourText: It's not about how much time you have, it's about how you spend it.

name: Chronobreak
description: Revive all allies that died this round, then Rally.
flavourText: "Once more, for the first time." - Ekko

name: Ekko's Called Shot
description:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
Create an Ekko in your deck.
flavourText: "Splitting the timelines..." - Ekko

name: Ekko
description: Strike: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Time Trick in hand.
flavourText: Ekko can't fix everyone's mistakes, but that'll never stop him from trying again, and again, and again, and...

name: Chirean Sumpworker
description: When you summon another Chirean Sumpworker, Obliterate me and transform allied Chirean Sumpworkers everywhere into Sumpworks Posses.
flavourText: The first Zaunite miners to discover the chirean thought them timid, simple creatures. But as the years passed, and as they grew comfortable with humans, they slowly revealed their close societal bonds, and their seemingly native understanding of technology.

name: Circuit Breaker
description: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: It takes a lot to upset a group of chirean, but when they get mad, everyone's gonna know about it.

name: Sumpworks Posse
description: Attack: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "They're sweet enough on their own, sure, but get a bunch of 'em together, and before you know it, they've built some madcap machine and are off knockin' down some part of the Lanes." - Zaunite machinist

name: Production Surge
description: To play, spend all your mana. Summon random Turrets whose total cost equals the mana spent.
flavourText: "Not enough resources?! I built my first mechanized contraption with discarded clockwork parts and a rusted thermal capacitor. One must do what one can with what one has!" - Heimerdinger

name: Timewinder
description:
To play, discard 1.
Deal 1 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 1 to another.
flavourText: "Look out!" - Ekko

name: Called Shot
description:
Draw 1.
Create a Parallel Convergence in your deck.
flavourText: "Splitting the timelines..." - Ekko

name: Parallel Convergence
description: Start a free attack with an exact Ephemeral copy of each ally.
flavourText: "Converging!" - Ekko

name: Fallen Feline
description: When I'm summoned, create a Hexite Crystal in the bottom 10 cards of your deck.
flavourText: "BUT MY PLAAAANNN--MEEEOOOOOW!"

name: Defective Swapbot
description: Play: Swap my stats with another unit.
flavourText:
"A new slotbot? Didn't they shut down the plant that made these years ago?"
"I thought so. Something about 'rolling bombs' and 'unintended conflagration."
"Huh."
"...Wanna play?"
"Absolutely yes."
- Zaunite patrons

name: Volunteer Elnuk
description: When I'm summoned, create a random Elnuk in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavourText: "OKAY, LITTLE BUDDY, YOU JUST SIT STILL WHILE I FLIP THIS SWITCHAROO OVER HEEERE AND BOOM! HA! ELNUKS FOREVER! We're totally gonna need more grass. And room." - Practical Perfectionist

name: Hexite Crystal
description:
If you see me in a Prediction, draw me.
Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Strange how such a small thing could change the world so fundamentally. Strange, too, how that cat seems so intent on getting his paws on a sample. I suspect he enjoys the way light bounces through the crystal!" - Hextech researcher

name: Concurrent Timelines
description: Grant followers in your hand "When you play me, pick 1 of 3 followers with my cost and transform me into that follower."
flavourText: "We're playing by MY rules." - Ekko

name: Boom Baboon
description: When I'm summoned, create a Flame Chompers! in hand.
flavourText: Jinx had a more conventional supplier once, but the two of them had a small falling out. By which we mean, the supplier fell out of a window. By which we mean, the supplier was blown out of a window. By Jinx.

name: Time Trick
description: Predict, then draw 1.
flavourText: "The future's what I make it..." - Ekko

name: Practical Perfectionist
description: Play: Predict. Create 3 copies of the chosen card in your deck.
flavourText: "Kay's awesome. She's got that whole 'practice makes perfect' mentality, you know? And boyyy does she practice." - Shomi

name: Swapbot's Swap
description: Swap my Power and Health with that of another unit.
flavourText: "Dealer's choice!" - Defective Swapbot

name: Glorious Evolution
description: Your cards have -1 cost, Augment, are created by Glorious Evolution, and are now Tech.
flavourText: "Progress is everything. I will bring the future to this city, whether it is ready or not." - Viktor

name: Adaptatron 3000
description: When you summon a Tech, we share keywords.
flavourText: "Ah yes! The Adaptatron 3000! Adaptable, inventive, AND quite the looker! If the fellow could speak, I'm sure we'd have MUCH to share with each other." - Heimerdinger

name: Dropboarder
description: If you see me in a Prediction, summon me.
flavourText: "Ahh, Shomi's a GENIUS with that hoverboard. I once saw them switch a sumpgrinder into a bottomboard backslide, then catch air with a three-point triple dip! Or something. Look, the point is, they're awesome, okay?" - Practical Perfectionist

name: Bone Skewer
description: An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
flavourText: "Little parting gift..." - Pyke

name: Jaull-fish
description: Play: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
flavourText: "Ain't nothin' like a jaull-fish to show you who you can trust, and who you can kill." - Pyke

name: Redfin Hammersnout
description: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavourText: When a hammersnout breaks a ship's keel, it seems to do it for sheer entertainment. They rarely devour the crew they stranded, instead leaving a feast for the creatures that follow.

name: Pyke
description: When I Lurk, transform me into Death From Below.
flavourText:
"...the visions are back again. I see his desperate eyes looking up at me whilst the jaull-fish closed its maw around him. We tried pulling, but the ship was too small, and the beast too big. I had no choice. I had to cut his line. I had to."
- Blood-soaked letter

name: Death From Below
description: Summon Pyke striking an enemy.
flavourText: "Breach!" - Pyke

name: Pyke
description:
When I Lurk, transform me into Death From Below.
When I kill an enemy, I strike the weakest enemy.
flavourText: First he came for his old crew, then other captains, then cheaters, gamblers, and drunkards. Pyke's craving for revenge slowly gave way to a newfound lust for murder. Now, instead of only listing those who once wronged him, his growing manifest only illustrates what Pyke has become.

name: Pyke's Bone Skewer
description:
An ally strikes an enemy, then moves to the top of your deck.
Create a Pyke in your deck.
flavourText: "Little parting gift..." - Pyke

name: Monster Harpoon
description:
Plunder: I cost 2 less.
Deal 5 to a unit.
flavourText: "The beast's been stuck already, lads! Now stick it again 'til it stops thrashin' and the waters've lost their blue!" - Jagged Taskmaster

name: Line 'Em Up
description:
Summon a Powder Keg.
Create a Knock 'Em Down in hand.
flavourText: "Done as you asked, Cap'n. Give 'er a little spark and she'll kick back alright." - Dreadway Deckhand

name: Loaded Dice
description: Next round, when you damage the enemy Nexus, Nab 1.
flavourText: "So, what are you willin' to wager, friend?" - Tahm Kench

name: Sharkling
flavourText: "Might not look much, aye, but they're eager for blood. And if you let 'em at you, they'll know where to find it when they're bigger. Best wear yer gloves." - Jaull Hunters

name: Snapjaw Swarm
description: Play: I start a free attack.
flavourText:
"Drip, drop, drip, drop, the blood splashes down,
Swim, swim, comes the swarm, better now to drown,
Snip, snap, go the teeth, and we all scream,
To the deep, off we sleep, for forever dreams!"
- Bilgewater nursery rhyme

name: Ripper's Bay
description: When allies attack, before activating Lurk, grant the top ally in your deck Lurk and it becomes a Lurker.
flavourText: Bilgewater's more treacherous coves soon became home to all manner of sea beasts. There they lie, waiting for the next foolhardy crew to ignore the harbormaster's warnings.

name: Lost Riches
description: Draw a Treasure. If there aren't any to draw, create 2 Treasures in your deck instead.
flavourText: "We're rich!" - Jagged Butcher

name: Knock 'Em Down
description: Deal 1 to anything.
flavourText: "A little spark, eh? I've just the thing..." - Gangplank

name: Reaver's Row
description:
When I count down, summon a random 1 cost follower.
Countdown 2: Grant 1 cost allies +2|+1 and Fearsome.
flavourText: "Ye think ye've got what it takes to call yourself a Hook, do ye? We'll see, ye tyke. By the time we're done with ye, ye'll either be worth yer weight, or ye'll be weighed down below the waves, bait fer the beasts!" - Petty Officer

name: Frenzied Feast
description: Each Lurker ally strikes a random enemy.
flavourText: "They hurt. I know." - Pyke

name: Bloodbait
description: Create a Snapjaw Swarm on top of your deck.
flavourText: "If it were up ta me, I'd have a jaull-fish take me afore them bloody things. Sooner go fast than be left screamin' fer me mates to stick me while I'm eaten alive." - Jagged Butcher

name: Ruined Rex
description: Play: Play Cannon Barrage on randomly targeted enemies for each card you've drawn this round, up to 6 times.
flavourText: "...Rex?" - Petty Officer

name: The List
description: Grant an enemy Vulnerable. If it's already Vulnerable, the strongest ally starts a free attack Challenging it.
flavourText: "You've got a name, and I've got a list." - Pyke

name: Defiant Dance
description:
Recall a unit.
Blade Dance 1.
flavourText: "Fall back! It's time for another to take center stage!" - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

name: Irelia
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavourText: "Once we studied art and beauty, and our hearts soared. But when they broke our walls and spilled our blood, we fell back down to earth..."

name: Scattered Pod
description:
Play: Draw a Slow, Fast, or Burst spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavourText: The strange and hauntingly beautiful sky-songs of the Cloud Drinkers kept some of the Black Mist at bay... but only for so long.

name: Bladesurge
description: Swap Irelia with an ally.
flavourText: "Follow my lead!" - Irelia

name: Irelia's Vanguard's Edge
description:
Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
Create an Irelia in your deck.
flavourText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia

name: Irelia
description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Flawless Duet in hand.
When allies attack, create a Bladesurge in hand.
flavourText: "...Though our hearts are heavy, we are full of purpose, and return to dance once more."

name: Flawless Duet
description: Blade Dance 2.
flavourText: "There is no song more perfect than that of two voices entwined in harmony..." - Blossoming Blade

name: Blossoming Blade
description: Play: Blade Dance 2.
flavourText:
"There are those who think a flower is a fragile, delicate thing. They forget how much strength it takes to hold fast to the humble earth and inspire hope with every bloom."
- Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

name: Vanguard's Edge
description: Pick an ally to attack alongside the Blades, then Blade Dance 3.
flavourText: "Stop their retreat! The Noxians started this war, but we will end it." - Irelia

name: Dancing Droplet
description: When I'm Recalled, draw 1.
flavourText: "Water is flexible, adaptive - it will take the form most needed in the moment, flowing forth or retreating from the shore." - Ionian monk

name: Shadow Apprentice
description: When you summon an Ephemeral ally, give me +1|+0 this round.
flavourText: "You are smoke—a whisper on the wind. Your fists must join with the dark like shade to shadow. Now... again!" - Mistress Shi

name: Zinneia, Steel Crescendo
description:
When you Blade Dance, I attack with the Blades.
Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavourText: "Gather round, my darlings. Today our feet will glide 'cross the ground that nourished us, with the movements our families taught us. We are children of Ionia, and today we dance for art, for freedom, for each other!"

name: Blade
description: Obliterate me when I leave combat.
flavourText: "Keep your skills sharp--it is not only the blade that strikes, but the hand behind it." - Irelia

name: Syncopation
description: Swap 2 allies.
flavourText: "To dance is to move in harmony with the motions of all things." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

name: Lead and Follow
description: Recall an ally to create a Flawless Duet in hand.
flavourText: "Our performance will be... unforgettable." - Zinneia, Steel Crescendo

name: Scattered Pod
description:
Play: Draw a Slow spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavourText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer

name: Scattered Pod
description:
Play: Draw a Fast spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavourText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer

name: Scattered Pod
description:
Play: Draw a Burst spell.
Enlightened: I have Elusive.
flavourText: "I know their songs. This is a song of mourning." - Ionian farmer

name: Sacred Protector
description:
Play: Give an ally Barrier this round and draw a Shen.
Allies with Barrier have Double Attack.
flavourText: "Just as we fight to protect the land, the land itself rises up to defend us. We draw strength from the earth's wrath and drive out our enemies. And so, balance remains." - Ionian Priest

name: Shadows of the Past
description: Recall each ally and summon a Living Shadow in its place.
flavourText: "Let them strike at shadows, where their weapons will find no purchase." - Zed

name: Ribbon Dancer
description: Play: Blade Dance 1.
flavourText: "What a shame, boys! All that power and just no rhythm to match it? We can't ALL be stars, I guess...!"

name: Field Musicians
description: Each round, once you've summoned 3 other allies, refill your spell mana and draw 1.
flavourText: For some, music is a shared refuge from hardship and violence. For others, music is resistance.

name: Coastal Defender
description: When you summon another ally, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavourText:
My dearest Kay, 
They arrived this morning in a line of ships that broke the horizon and blotted out the sunrise. Their machines set fire to the Silver Plains, and now a thick smoke crawls through the summer air. We can stand by no longer. Rake or shovel, scythe or sword, today we must go to meet our destiny. 
Know that I love you and our home more than I have words to write.
- Charred letter

name: Careful Preparation
description:
To play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
Predict, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
flavourText: "The actions we take today plant seeds for future trees." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer

name: Unworthy
description:
Give an enemy follower -4|-0 this round.
If you have fewer mana gems than your opponent, kill it instead.
flavourText: "The sun will shine again upon Shuriman lands." - Voice of the Risen

name: Baccai Sandspinner
description: Play: Grant an enemy -1|-0 and Vulnerable.
flavourText: Each grain she spills takes a second from their lives, wearing away at them like wind.

name: Rite of Negation
description: Destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavourText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.

name: Rite of Negation
description: Kill an ally to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavourText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.

name: Voice of the Risen
description: If you've leveled a champion, allies have +2|+0.
flavourText: "I saw her speak, long ago." The old soldier smiled, and for an instant, his granddaughter could picture it: Shurima, gold and gleaming, proud Azir standing over the city heralded by the Voice of the Risen. "She stirred in us all a passion we thought long lost."

name: Rek'Sai
description:
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.
Round End: Place me into your deck.
flavourText: "Young Jhuraa was exploring, as is his way, and in a small hidden cave, discovered some ancient texts! We took them to a translator in Marrowmark, and the scrolls... they speak of an ancient terror who stalked our ancestors. A queen. A xer'sai queen!" - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder

name: Rek'Sai's Call the Pack
description:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
Create a Rek'Sai in your deck.
flavourText:
"May the sun shine, and may the xer'sai sleep."
- Merchant's prayer

name: Rek'Sai
description:
When I level up, create 3 random Lurkers in hand.
When I Lurk or Attack: Grant Lurker allies everywhere +1|+0.
flavourText: "We have known of her terror for generations, but for our ancestors to know her, too? How old must she be? How many of our people has she butchered? The thought unsettles me greatly." - Fezhaur, Vekauran elder

name: The Absolver
description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round. If you have leveled a champion this game, create a The Absolver's Return in hand.
flavourText: "Everyone told me not to use this. 'No one must wield such a powerful weapon,' they said." - Akshan

name: Desert Naturalist
description: Play: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavourText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary

name: Teen Spirit
description: Destroy a landmark. If it's allied, summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavourText:
"Kadira broke something today! Again! It was just a stone wall this time, but it looked old and was probably important to someone's ancestor. Her excuse is that walls are built better in Tereshni, but still! I am very cross."
- Zaifa's diary

name: Raz Bloodmane
description: Attack: Give enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: "When this here croc was born, the others took bets on how long he'd live, assuming he was the runt of the litter and a freak to boot. Nobody thought to bet on him eatin' all his siblings. Heh."

name: Sandcrafter
description: Attack: Summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavourText: Few are taught the ways of the desert, and even fewer given the ability to command its sands as Azir can. To wield this power and know the secrets of the sands is a gift given only to Azir's most faithful and capable followers.

name: Call the Pack
description:
To play, put a card from hand on top of your deck.
Create 2 random Lurkers in hand.
flavourText:
"May the sun shine, and may the xer'sai sleep."
- Merchant's prayer

name: Payday
description: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavourText: "Sure, I've had good days and bad days, just like anyone. In this line of work, the bad days can get real bad, and the good days can get real rich." - Sivir

name: Ancient Preparations
description:
Play: Predict.
Countdown 2: Summon a Clockling.
flavourText: Though they might otherwise be thought of as lost to time, buried underneath years of sand, the automata were precisely placed, simply waiting to be awakened.

name: Treasure Seeker
description: When I'm summoned, create a Waking Sands in hand.
flavourText: "Okay, Davu. You're gonna go in there, grab that... whatever it is, and you're going to make us rich. Me rich. You're going to make me rich. Got it? Also, if that's a trapped thing, I am real sorry in advance."

name: Baccai Reaper
description: When you slay a unit, grant me +1|+0.
flavourText: "The baccai all fled or were spared following their failed Ascension, and none have seen them since. Who knows how long they have hidden in those dark tombs, bearing the mark of their shame?" - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Hibernating Rockbear
description: Countdown 3: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear.
flavourText:
"MY NAME IS ZAIFA AND I LIKE WRITING STUPID THINGS IN MY STUPID BOOK WHEN I THINK EVERYONE ELSE IS ASLEEP. EVEN SAMI."
- Zaifa's diary

name: Callous Bonecrusher
description: Reputation: I cost 1 less and when I'm summoned, grant me Overwhelm.
flavourText: The soldier struggled as he reached for his spear, but she leaned harder on his chest until he ceased, groaning. "No, no," she admonished, showing her sharpened eyeteeth with a wicked smile. "This is mine, now."

name: Ruin Runner
flavourText: Before the vaults, Shurima's mercenaries and tomb robbers must learn to survive the desert's more overt threats. First, the unrelenting heat. Second, the multitude of raiders, hellbent on carnage.

name: Zilean
description: Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
flavourText: Over many years, Zilean established a network of promising young mages from different times, all of whom were capable of seeing out his life's work should the unthinkable happen. Although a kind and encouraging mentor, deep sorrow creased his brow when he sought solitude, and there was a weariness in his eyes that only someone who has lived multiple lifetimes could hope to comprehend.

name: Time Bomb
description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1 and advance other allied Time Bombs 1 round.
Countdown 1: Deal 1 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Using time "constructively" can also mean "destructively."

name: Zilean's Careful Preparation
description:
To play, place a card from your hand into your deck.
Predict, then create an exact copy of the chosen card in hand.
Create a Zilean in your deck.
flavourText: "The actions we take today plant seeds for future trees." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer

name: Zilean's Chronoshift
description:
Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
Create a Zilean in your deck.
flavourText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean

name: Zilean
description:
Round Start: Create a Fleeting copy of each non-Fleeting card I saw you play last round.
Play: Create 4 Time Bombs in your deck, then Predict.
flavourText: Countless possibilities stretched before and behind him. He saw them all at once, a dizzying array that only he could decipher. With a single gesture, Zilean could unfold entire timelines -- but none had yet shown him how to save Icathia.

name: Taliyah
description: Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark.
flavourText:
"The nomad's step is always light, for it is unburdened by the weight of roots, and their home is forever beyond the horizon."
- The Societies of Shurima

name: Taliyah
description:
Play: Summon an exact copy of an allied landmark. 
Attack: I deal 2 damage to my blocker 3 times. If it's dead or gone, I deal 2 damage to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: Taliyah left Ionia after hearing word of monumental change in her homeland. She returned to Shurima to find an emperor reborn, her people fraught, and the xer'sai more active than ever. She had no choice but to grow beyond her years.

name: Threaded Volley
description: Deal 2 to Taliyah's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: "Throw another rock!" - Taliyah

name: Taliyah's Stoneweaving
description:
Manifest a landmark you can afford.
Create a Taliyah in your deck.
flavourText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah

name: Khahiri the Student
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 if you've Predicted this game.
flavourText:
"Remember what we learned," Zilean said, his voice unusually soft - grave, even. "Are you certain you're ready?"
Khahiri gave his mentor a reassuring smile. "I'll be back soon. And besides, I've spent every day for years preparing for this moment. If not now, when?"

name: Salt Spire
description: Countdown 2: Summon a Grumpy Rockbear. Then, if you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant the strongest ally +2|+2.
flavourText: A Shuriman saltworker quickly learns which deposits are suitable for collection, and which are best left alone.

name: Azir
description: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavourText: "When Azir took up the mantle as emperor of Shurima, he was arrogant. Blind. He accumulated power and planned his Ascension so that he might stand as ruler over not just Shurima, but the entire world." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Azir
description:
When I level up, replace your deck with the Emperor's Deck, then draw 1.
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
flavourText:
"The Emperor Azir, though haughty, is generous. Above all, he cares deeply for those who would march alongside him into Shurima's golden future, as the nation rises anew, its people once again united under his rule." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Azir
description:
When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
When you summon another ally, give us both +1|+0 this round.
flavourText: "Short of fulfilling his destiny, Azir's lifelong friend - and newly named brother - hatefully cast him off the dais. In that fateful moment Shurima was cursed, doomed to ruin for thousands of years to follow." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Sandstone Charger
flavourText: "They appeared out of nowhere, made up of swirling sands! Then, after they had dispatched our forces, their forms simply... disappeared, melted back into the desert." - Desert Survivor

name: Golden Herald
description: When I'm summoned and Round Start: Summon 2 Sand Soldiers and grant them +2|+2.
flavourText: Now more powerful than ever, Azir has raised his most loyal soldiers to lead his armies.

name: Azir's Arise!
description:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
Create a Azir in your deck.
flavourText: "The order is given." - Azir

name: General's Palace
description:
Enemies are Vulnerable.
Round Start: Rally.
flavourText: "Observe our god-emperor! He knows the power of these lands better than any, and his army only grows. Shurima is risen, and it shall never fall again!" - Voice of the Risen

name: Sand Soldier
description: Nexus Strike: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Azir's legions were reputed to be unstoppable even before Shurima was reborn, but now they are truly innumerable.

name: Eternal Gladiator
description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Round End: The Strongest enemy and I strike each other.
flavourText: "Behold! See how our champion sits astride the lion? Even the king of beasts would yield to his power, for he is the Will of Azir!" - Voice of the Risen

name: Crumbling Sands
description:
Obliterate a follower.
Draw 1.
flavourText: "Those who oppose us will be reduced to dust." - Azir

name: Sandstorm
description: Obliterate 3 enemy units or landmarks.
flavourText: The storm rolls in with a peal like thunder, and when it passes, it leaves nothing behind.

name: Emperor's Guard
description: When I'm summoned, draw 1.
flavourText: The emperor's golden guard moves as one, a succession of regimented warriors that is as terrifying as it is impressive to behold.

name: Shimmering Mirage
description:
Summon an exact copy of an ally. It's Ephemeral.
Draw 1.
flavourText: Between the sand, the sun, and the heat, it can be difficult to tell what is real, and what is merely a mirage.

name: Ascended's Call
description:
Rally.
Summon Renekton and Nasus. Immediately level them up to level 3.
flavourText: "They will serve their emperor. My generals will make sure of it." - Azir

name: Emperor's Prosperity
description: Draw 2.
flavourText: Birds found in the desert climes are all considered symbols of Azir, and Shurimans find their presence a good omen.

name: Xenotype Researchers
description: When I'm summoned, grant 3 random allies in your deck +3|+3.
flavourText: The Void is full of surprises, growing every day and finding new ways to infiltrate the tower, as intrusive as a thorned blindbrush but infinitely more deadly. Inasmuch, the study of it proves difficult, as it requires similarly clever and resourceful researchers to anticipate and understand the threat.

name: Akshan
description: When I'm summoned or strike: Summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 1 round.
flavourText: "The Sentinels' code seems full of complicated restrictions. Things like 'Never take a life in the name of vengeance' and 'Fight for the world, never for yourself'. As for me..."

name: Akshan's Grappling Hook
description:
An ally you've targeted this round strikes an enemy.
Create an Akshan in your deck.
flavourText: "They never expect the grappling hook!" - Akshan

name: Akshan
description: When I'm summoned or strike: Summon a Warlord's Hoard or advance it 1 round.
flavourText: "My code is far simpler--disregard any rule that prevents me from doing whatever I want."

name: Warlord's Palace
description:
Countdown 8: Create a Relic of Power in hand.
When you target allies advance me 1.
flavourText: "See that eyesore of a building? That's where the swine lives. We'll take him out, grab the loot, and be back in time for dinner." - Vekauran Vagabond

name: Warlord's Hoard
description:
Countdown 8: Create a Sentinel's Hoard in hand.
When you target allies advance me 1.
flavourText: When a group of survivors from the fallen city of Vekaura learned of a particular warlord's sordid history, they wasted no time making plans to seize his ill-gotten gains.

name: Sentinel's Hoard
description: Play a The Absolver's Resurrection, a Fount of Power, or a Shield of the Sentinels.
flavourText: Before the thief could even reach for her tools, a pale green fog enveloped the box, coaxing it open with a cold whisper.

name: Fount of Power
description: Draw 2. Your cards cost 1 less this round.
flavourText: "My love... Why won't you answer? Please. Answer me, Isolde. ANSWER ME!" - Viego

name: The Absolver's Resurrection
description: Grant all enemies Vulnerable and create in hand a 0 cost copy of the strongest ally that died this game.
flavourText: "Fate is what I make it." - Akshan

name: Shield of the Sentinels
description: Grant your champions everywhere SpellShield and +2|+2.
flavourText: The Sentinels of Light trace their heritage back to blessed Helia. The relic stones they saved from the Ruination would become the world's greatest defense against the darkness of the Black Mist.

name: Relic of Power
description: Pick 1 - Predict then draw 1, summon a Sandstone Charger, or grant all allies +1|+0.
flavourText: The Black Mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.

name: Relic of Power
description: Summon a Sandstone Charger.
flavourText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.

name: Relic of Power
description: Grant all allies +1|+0.
flavourText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.

name: Relic of Power
description: Predict, then draw 1.
flavourText: The mist searched for her in everything. It cried out in his voice, grasped forward with his pleading hands, commanding her to return. But she could not. She would not.

name: Desert's Wrath
description:
Grant allied Sand Soldiers everywhere +1|+0.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavourText: They do not rest. They do not hesitate. They are uncompromising, unfeeling, unyielding.

name: Renekton
description: When I Challenge an enemy, give me +2|+1 this round.
flavourText: "It could be easily forgotten that he was once human, for the visage of the crocodile fits his love for bloody battle so well..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Renekton
description: When I block or Attack: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "When he finally has a chance at revenge on his brother Nasus, Renekton will stop at nothing. He will destroy all, and Shurima will again be left a ruin." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Renekton
description: Attack: Give me +3|+3 this round.
flavourText: "So many long years in the dark with that betrayer filling his head with words of hate and resentment, breeding contempt for his brother. It only fueled his rage, made him stronger." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Renekton's Ruthless Predator
description:
Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create a Renekton in your deck.
flavourText: "Shred them!" - Renekton

name: Dominus Destruction
description: Deal 2 to enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "I will spare no one!" - Renekton

name: The Absolver's Return
description: Give an ally Overwhelm and +2|+1 this round.
flavourText: "Eh. Who cares?" - Akshan

name: Imagined Possibilities
description: Create a random landmark with Countdown in hand, or advance your landmarks 1 round.
flavourText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean

name: Ricochet
description:
Reputation: I cost 3 less. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
flavourText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir

name: Xer'sai Caller
description: Play: Predict.
flavourText: Not all xer'sai are born to butcher. Some can summon their kin with piercing shrieks that rattle the sands as well as the senses.

name: Shaped Stone
description:
Give an ally +1|+1 this round.
If you've summoned a landmark this game, give it +2|+1 instead.
flavourText: "With the land's help, we WILL defend ourselves!" - Taliyah

name: Scrying Sands
description:
Predict.
Give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: "I have seen my destiny, and this time, I will not be stopped." - Azir

name: Rock Hopper
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Roiling Sands.
flavourText:
"Today, we began our journey to Nashramae! Samir is determined to cross the Great Sai before the next full moon, and is making SUCH a mess of things! I did not know a simple sandboard could collapse a whole dune. Neither did Sami. He's fine."
- Zaifa's diary

name: Preservationist
description: Play: Advance an allied landmark 3 rounds.
flavourText: Whenever he seeks a moment's peace, Zilean returns to Icathia's last garden, just as he remembers it.

name: Vekauran Vagabond
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Warlord's Palace or advance it 2 rounds.
flavourText: Seeing Akshan hanging underneath the fourth-floor window, Najah cursed under her breath. Pretty boy beat her to the mark. Again. Turning her dagger over in her hand, she pondered what to say to him. Maybe this time, he'd finally acknowledge her.

name: Quicksand
description: Give an enemy -4|-0 or 2 enemies -1|-0 this round. Disable their positive keywords this round.
flavourText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.

name: Quicksand
description: Give 2 enemies -1|-0 and disable their positive keywords this round.
flavourText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.

name: Quicksand
description: Give an enemy -4|-0 and disable its positive keywords this round.
flavourText: In parts of the desert, old ruins have sunk into sand, creating hollows where unwary travelers might join them.

name: Shifting Sands
description:
Deal 4 to a unit.
Summon 2 Sand Soldiers.
flavourText: "Go. Surround them. They cannot fight the land itself." - Azir

name: Arise!
description:
Summon a Sand Soldier.
Create a Fleeting Arise! in hand.
flavourText: "The order is given." - Azir

name: Inner Sanctum
description:
Reputation: I cost 3 less. 
Countdown 1: Create 2 Lucky Finds in hand.
flavourText: "Some maps take years to decipher, some traps takes months to disarm, and some vaults take weeks to navigate. But the times you pull it off? They're worth every damned second." - Sivir

name: Profiteer
description: When I'm summoned, create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavourText: "My friend, for you I've procured this incomparable beauty straight from the fabled Tomb of the Emperors and pulled it right from the hand of the great Renekton himself and as I rode out, I was surrounded by ten--twenty!--bloodthirsty sauren riders! Truly, a miracle that such a treasure has made it to your hands."

name: Lucky Find
description: Fearsome
flavourText: "Yeah, you better be afraid." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
description: Overwhelm
flavourText: "If I can't get past you, I'll just go through you." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
description: Quick Attack
flavourText: "Quick as a flash." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
flavourText: "The best just got better." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
description: Challenger
flavourText: "Try turning me down." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
description: Tough
flavourText: "Can't spend your earnings if you're dead." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
flavourText: "Let's cut 'em down to size." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
flavourText: "Go on. Gimme your best shot. Then it's my turn." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
description: SpellShield
flavourText: "Your tricks ain't worth the sand you're standing on, kid." - Sivir

name: Lucky Find
description: Pick a buff from among 3 to grant an ally.
flavourText: "Nothin' better than a payday." - Sivir

name: Sivir
flavourText: Sivir made her way through life as a mercenary, and burdened herself with all the risks and rewards that came with her choice. One fateful expedition almost cost her everything, but as her blood seeped into Shurima's sands, it awoke an ancient power that would return both her and her homeland to greatness.

name: Inspiring Marshal
description: When you summon another ally, give it +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: To receive the blessing of Azir is a great honor - to give a blessing in his name, an honor greater still.

name: Merciless Hunter
description: Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
flavourText: "And... there. Tied up, nice 'n pretty. Renekton likes his meals delivered still-squirming."

name: Imagined Possibilities
description: Advance your landmarks 1 round.
flavourText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean

name: Imagined Possibilities
description: Create a random landmark with Countdown in hand.
flavourText: "Time is evanescent." - Zilean

name: Roiling Sands
description: When an enemy is summoned, destroy me to grant it Vulnerable.
flavourText: Centuries of missteps have taught the Shurimans how to read the sands. Only they know which expanses will stand firm, and which give way. It is all the same to the layman observer.

name: Stasis Statue
description: Countdown 1: Summon exact copies of the units and landmarks stored inside.
flavourText:
"I like to think of this as 'capturing a moment'." 
"Ha. Clever."
- Xetsa and Zinsa, Void Researchers

name: Xerxa'Reth, The Undertitan
description: Attack: If I have 8+ Power, give me Fearsome, Overwhelm, and SpellShield this round.
flavourText: "It is said that hundreds of years ago, the river Khaleek bore a great trading outpost known as Taraleek upon its shores. That is, until one fateful day, when a mighty beast broke through the ground, and annihilated both the outpost and all who called it home. But what monster could do such a thing?" - Shuriman historian

name: The Clock Hand
description: When I'm summoned, create 2 Instant Centuries in hand.
flavourText: The constant rumble in the lower levels of the tower are due to The Clock Hand, the tower guardian that steadily winds the gears below.

name: Instant Century
description: Summon a random landmark with Countdown, or advance a landmark 4 rounds.
flavourText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'..." - Zilean

name: Instant Century
description: Advance a landmark 4 rounds.
flavourText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'." - Zilean

name: Instant Century
description: Summon a random landmark with Countdown.
flavourText: "There is little distinction between 'what has been' and 'what will be'." - Zilean

name: Ruinous Path
description:
Draw 1.
If you've slain a unit this round, drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Sandthrashers primarily recruit from their enemy's ranks. Whoever survives their initial assault is invited to join, or die.

name: Emperor's Divide
description: Give enemies Vulnerable this round and summon 6 Sand Soldiers.
flavourText: "My soldiers march on." - Azir

name: Rite of Dominance
description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton

name: Rampaging Baccai
description: Play: If you've slain 4+ units this game, an enemy and I strike each other.
flavourText: The bearer of a grudge's resentment only deepens, even if those they bear the grudge against are long dead.

name: Destined Poro
description: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, transform me into Exalted Poro.
flavourText: She didn't know what she had found, precisely... but it was shiny, and looked like a good snack.

name: Exalted Poro
description: I have 3 random keywords.
flavourText: As far as divine rulers go, she's awfully fond of snax.

name: Exhaust
description: Give an enemy -2|-0 and Vulnerable this round.
flavourText: Desert-dwellers know how to avoid the sun's searing and relentless heat, but those unprepared to withstand it will find their strength and energy sapped at remarkable speed.

name: Unraveled Earth
description:
Summon 2 Roiling Sands.
Draw 1.
flavourText: As beautiful as the Great Sai may be, it is not a place for the weak. Many lives have been lost among its rolling dunes, and while the xer'sai claim many, the land itself takes its share.

name: Ascended's Rise
description: Level up all level 1 Ascended allies.
flavourText: "The future will be written by the Ascended!" - Azir

name: Nasus
description: I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game.
flavourText: "Nasus' newly won blessing allowed him countless lifetimes to spend in study and contemplation over the nature of life and death. But this same extended lifespan would, after the fall of Shurima, also prove to be his curse." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Sanctum Conservator
description: Play: Kill an enemy follower. If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me instead.
flavourText: The baccai are tasked with defending the inner sanctum to safeguard the ancient treasures there, and for the sake of mortals that might think themselves clever enough, or mighty enough, to withstand the weight of the Curator's judgment.

name: Dunekeeper
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Sand Soldier.
flavourText: "As the emperor commands, both the sand and I obey."

name: Golden Ambassador
description: Allegiance: Draw a champion and grant it +2|+2.
flavourText: "Our shining future lies just beneath the sands, and it is up to us to pave the way for Azir. The golden empire in the desert will rise again!"

name: Aspiring Chronomancer
description: Play: Predict.
flavourText: Throughout his time as a student of chronomancy, Tai had to reconcile his uncertainty with his determination. It was better to have hope in a potential victory than to dwell on what could possibly go wrong.

name: Xer'sai Dunebreaker
flavourText: While all xer'sai are able tunnelers, only their dunebreakers have the mass and power needed to break through the veins of solid bedrock that snake through the Great Sai, and open up the lands beyond for further hunting.

name: Baccai Rampage
description: Rampaging Baccai and an enemy strike each other.
flavourText: The baccai are twisted, warped versions of what they might have been - had they become part of the Ascended Host - and the rage they feel at their failure must be unleashed somewhere.

name: Chronoshift
description: Give an allied Champion "The next time I'd die this round, fully heal me and grant me +3|+3 instead".
flavourText: "We cannot stop the inevitable... but we can postpone it." - Zilean

name: Preservarium
description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1.
Countdown 2: Draw 1.
flavourText: Zilean shows those he brings to the tower what, precisely, they are looking to restore. The Preservationist is able to show them, if only a glimpse at a time.

name: Buried Sun Disc
description:
Start of Game: Summon 1 of me from your deck if it's all Shuriman.
Countdown 25: Restore the Sun Disc.
I advance 9 rounds for each time an Ascended ally has leveled up this game.
flavourText: When Azir beheld the Shuriman capital's Sun Disc, he saw it not for what it was, but what it could be--the key to returning Shurima to its former glory.

name: Siphoning Strike
description:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
flavourText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus

name: Vekauran Safecracker
description: Play: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: Tena waited patiently as her pet's caustic spittle wore away the gilded bars of the palace's rear gate. Around the corner, she would soon find a hoard of unspeakably valuable treasure--more than enough to bring Vekaura back to its former glory.

name: Boomerang Blade
description: An ally strikes the strongest and weakest enemies one after another.
flavourText: "Better duck." - Sivir

name: Time in a Bottle
description: Predict and advance an allied landmark 2 rounds.
flavourText: "If only you saw time as I do, you would know it is not immutable." - Zilean

name: Clockling
flavourText: The Clocklings were the first to wriggle free - precisely at the time Zilean had set them to wake up. They shook themselves off and went clambering over the ancient walls, seeking others of their kind.

name: Nasus' Siphoning Strike
description:
An ally strikes a unit.
If it dies, grant allied champions everywhere +2|+2.
Create a Nasus in your deck.
flavourText: "Your soul will be measured." - Nasus

name: Nasus
description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game. 
Enemies have -3|-0.
flavourText: "His hope revived by Shurima's rise, Nasus finally returned after years spent wandering the desert, eager to make amends with his brother. He never suspected he would find Renekton maddened by years spent suffering at Xerath's hands in the tomb, waiting for him." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Nasus
description:
I have +1|+1 for each unit you've slain this game. 
Enemies have -1|-0.
flavourText: "For years, Nasus and his brother Renekton served the empire. Nasus was a scholar, Renekton a fierce warrior. It was not until the two were called upon to confront the betrayer, Xerath, that Nasus was forced to make a terrible choice..." - Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Khahiri the Returned
description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in your deck. When you see me in a Prediction, grant all allied copies of me everywhere +2|+2.
flavourText: Khahiri had only been gone a moment when he suddenly reappeared. Older by nearly a decade and wielding a strange and deadly-looking weapon, he was met with gasps of awe and concern.

name: Devoted Council
description: Round Start: If you've leveled a champion, heal your champions and Nexus 2.
