flavourText: "I have sworn myself to Azir, and to Shurima, my home! Will you not do the same?"

name: Esteemed Hierophant
description: When I'm summoned, advance your Buried Sun Disc 3 rounds.
flavourText: "Oh! That's Padjuman, one of the elders of Nashramae! I think everyone has come to our city today, papa!" - Excited onlooker

name: Sivir's Ricochet
description:
Reputation: I cost 3 less. 
Deal 1 to a random enemy or the enemy Nexus 5 times.
Create a Sivir in your deck.
flavourText: "This might get a little messy." - Sivir

name: Sivir
description: While I'm attacking, attacking allies have my keywords.
flavourText: "If you wanna work with me, I'll give you the same talk I give everyone: work for your share, and you'll get everything you're due. But if you slow me down, or get in my way, I'll kill you myself."

name: Promising Future
description: Grant an allied landmark "My Countdown completion effect activates twice".
flavourText: "Mortals spend so much of their time waiting. My fondest hope is that they all should be rewarded for their patience." - Zilean

name: Weight of Judgment
description: Deal 2 to a champion or 4 to a follower.
flavourText: "One life in return for so many. One life so that others might thrive." - Nasus

name: Rite of Negation
description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to stop all enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills.
flavourText: Analysis is a mainstay of chronomancy, as many actions must be halted to consider future solutions.

name: Clockwork Curator
description: Play: Advance an allied landmark 2 rounds.
flavourText: The constructs that guard Zilean's tower are able to withstand the harsh desert for millennia, and not just for their clever construction.

name: Ancient Hourglass
description: Obliterate an ally to summon a Stasis Statue in place with the ally stored inside.
flavourText:
"Oh, Tai! Come here! We could use your help with something."
- Xetsa, Void Researcher

name: Waking Sands
description: Summon a Sandstone Charger.
flavourText: "The box might be worth something, but whatever's inside sure as sand isn't. By which I mean, it's not worth opening. Speaking from experience, here." - Sivir

name: Soothsayer
description: When I'm summoned, grant allied champions and landmarks SpellShield.
flavourText: "Ah, you did not expect to see water in the middle of the desert. Worry not. Come, drink your fill, wash your feet. Rest in the shade awhile. This is Azir's new Shurima, and it is an oasis."

name: Sai Scout
description: Play: Predict. If you pick a landmark, grant me Elusive.
flavourText:
"We had trouble earlier! A great storm threatened from the west, and Taliyah passed xer'sai tunnels to the south. I spotted a temple to the north, and we are now safe inside its terracotta walls. The others are all asleep, and my flame, like me, is ebbing. I hope I dream well."
- Zaifa's diary

name: Bloodthirsty Marauder
flavourText: The Sandthrashers do everything with their companions. Fight, hunt, kill... and eat.

name: Feral Prescience
description: Predict.
flavourText: "The fin brings fear, but the teeth bring death." - Shuriman saying

name: The Time Has Come
description:
Summon a Clockling.
If you've Predicted this game, summon 2 instead.
flavourText: "Come here and stop fussing! You have sand in your gears." - Tai, Aspiring Chronomancer

name: Sandstone Chimera
description: I cost 1 less for each time an ally attacked this game.
flavourText: Upon Azir's return, Shurimans caught sight of ancient beasts of legend, made of sand but no less impressive.

name: Restored Sun Disc
description:
Immediately draw 1 of each of your Ascended allies.
For the rest of the game, your level 2 Ascended allies are level 3.
flavourText: "Shurima has known no glory like today. Come, bask in the light of our sun!" - Voice of the Risen

name: Rite of Dominance
description: Kill an ally to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton

name: Rite of Dominance
description: Destroy one of your mana gems to give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: "We fight, they bleed!" - Renekton

name: Sandswept Tomb
description: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sandstone Charger.
flavourText: As they passed through the ravine, the Sandcrafter spoke the words of magic. A gust of wind echoed through the canyon and turned to the thunder of oncoming hooves.

name: Grappling Hook
description: An ally you've targeted this round strikes an enemy.
flavourText: "They never expect the grappling hook!" - Akshan

name: Xer'sai Hatchling
flavourText: Once a caravan has been disabled, the hunters will occasionally retreat and allow their hatchlings to forage forward. It is here that the young xer'sai refine their instincts, learning which sounds are of the desert, and which signal their prey.

name: Thrumming Swarm
description: When I'm summoned, create a copy of me in hand if you've leveled a champion this game.
flavourText: The giant scarabs were thought to have perished when the Shuriman empire fell. But the Mist's creeping tendrils burrowed deep into the sands, and bound the ancient things to Viego's service.

name: Ruthless Predator
description: Give an ally +2|+0 to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavourText: "Shred them!" - Renekton

name: Rite of Calling
description: Kill an ally or destroy one of your mana gems to draw a champion.
flavourText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus

name: Rite of Calling
description: Destroy one of your mana gems to draw a Champion.
flavourText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus

name: Rite of Calling
description: Kill an ally to draw a Champion.
flavourText: "A necessary sacrifice." - Nasus

name: Conservator's Judgment
description: Kill an enemy follower. If you've slain 13+ units this game, kill all enemy followers, then summon a copy of me instead.
flavourText: "We are where both gods and men find their end." - Sanctum Conservator

name: Stoneweaving
description: Manifest a landmark you can afford.
flavourText: "Come on - there's so much to see!" - Taliyah

name: Emperor's Dais
description: When allies attack, summon an attacking Sand Soldier.
flavourText: The Sandcrafters lifted their hands, willing the sand into the familiar shape of armored, faceless soldiers, a tireless army ready to fight for their god-emperor.

name: Spirit Fire
description: Give enemies -2|-0 and "Round End: Deal 2 to me" this round.
flavourText: "Their spirits will burn." - Nasus

name: Vekauran Bruiser
description: Strike: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavourText:
"Okay, Barb. That's the last of the guards on this floor, but we've still gotta keep a low profile."
"BLARGH-BLAAA!"
"Inside voice, Barbara."
"Blarb."
"That's my girl."

name: Grumpy Rockbear
flavourText:
"Ogh today was fun! We stopped for lunch (skallashi cheese - BLEUGH!) when Kadira spotted a poor rockdoubb asleep in the shade. Of course, she had to tug on its tail, and of course, it got mad. I hope it likes the cheese we left behind!"
- Zaifa's diary

name: Draklorn Inquisitor
description:
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall.
Round End: If the Countdown of any of your Frozen Thralls is 4 or less, advance them to 0.
flavourText: "My lady appears to me in dreams, her voice near a whisper. 'Follow,' she bids me. This command I dare not disobey."

name: Buried in Ice
description: Obliterate each enemy to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the enemy stored inside.
flavourText: "The cold overcomes all, eventually." - Lissandra

name: Spoils of War
description:
Grant an ally +1|+2.
Plunder: Grant +2|+4 instead.
flavourText: "You Avarosans only grow weak and plump in your fertile fields. So rest tonight, you pitiful weaklings, and while you dream of tomorrow's bounty, we will take it." - Scarmother Vrynna

name: Frostguard Thrall
flavourText: Freed from its icy tomb, the corrupted troll knew one thing, and one thing only - it must do as its dark mistress commanded.

name: Cold Resistance
description: Get an empty mana gem and grant an ally +0|+2.
flavourText: "Beware the ice... and more importantly... beware what lies within!" - Scrawled on a Freljord inn wall

name: Lissandra
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall and advance it 2.
flavourText: "The Watchers lurk just beyond these walls, suspended in ice, frozen in time... and while they wait, I have plans that must be set in motion..."

name: Watcher
description:
I cost 0 if you've summoned 5+ allies that cost 8+ this game. 
Attack: Obliterate the enemy deck, leaving 3 non-champions.
flavourText: "This is the end. As it was foretold -- as I promised. Sisters... forgive me." - Lissandra

name: Lissandra
description:
Your Nexus is Tough.
When I'm summoned, summon a Frozen Thrall and advance it 2.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting 0 cost Ice Shard in hand.
flavourText: Few know what Lissandra sacrificed in order to gain power, her ambitions too great to be stymied by mortal trappings.

name: Lissandra's Entomb
description:
Obliterate a unit to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the unit stored inside.
Create a Lissandra in your deck.
flavourText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra

name: Succumb to the Cold
description:
Frostbite an enemy.
Summon a Frozen Thrall.
flavourText: "The cold elicits many reactions. Let us find out yours." - Lissandra

name: Rimefang Pack
description: I have +1|+0 for each time you've Frostbitten enemies this game.
flavourText: The young wolves were the most nervous, but were quickly emboldened as they saw their mother lunge for the boar's throat, icy fangs flashing.

name: Frozen Thrall
description: Countdown 9: Summon a Frostguard Thrall.
flavourText: Certainly, there were enough half-witted warriors within the ranks of Trundle's disorderly army to use as front-line fodder, but Lissandra desired something much more loyal, something that served her, and her alone...

name: Entomb
description: Obliterate a unit to summon a Frozen Tomb in place with the unit stored inside.
flavourText: "Kneel, or freeze." - Lissandra

name: Frozen Tomb
description: Countdown 2: Summon exact copies of the units and landmarks stored inside.
flavourText: "Our lady will bury this world and all you know in ice." - Draklorn Inquisitor

name: Ancestral Boon
description:
Grant the top ally in your deck +2|+2.
Enlightened: Instead, grant all allies in your deck +2|+2.
flavourText: The Freljord's unrelenting cold and punishing storms kill most who enter its barren lands. But those who survive find within themselves an inner strength that spurs them onward through the rest of their lives.

name: Blighted Ravine
description:
When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 2.
Countdown 1: Deal 2 to ALL units.
flavourText: Bizarre forms made of dark ice sprout from every surface along the ravine, their outward-facing spikes deterring any would-be intruders.

name: Ice Shard
description: Deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavourText: "I will bury the world in ice." - Lissandra

name: Fabled Poro
description: When I'm summoned, grant Poro allies a random keyword.
flavourText: There is one figure said to be legendary to all porokind. It is said that, as he travels, he bestows his deserving furry friends with all manner of magical forged gifts.

name: Rimefang Denmother
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Rimefang Pack.
flavourText: The rimefang wolves circled the drüvask, crouched low, wary. The stench of death clung tightly to it, pungent and overwhelming.

name: Abominable Guardian
description:
While I'm in hand, Round Start: If you have 2+ Yetis, summon me and create a copy of me in your deck.
Play: Draw a Yeti.
flavourText: "...and they're sneaky, too! Last time I was out there, I had found shelter in a cave, only to find yearlings in there, fast asleep. Tried to keep my distance, but then one of the big 'uns returned, tall as a mountain, and covered in ice! Now you listen to me, because..." - Babbling Bjerg

name: Three Sisters
description: Create a Fleeting Flash Freeze, Fury of the North, or Entomb in hand.
flavourText: The Freljordian sisters Avarosa, Serylda, and Lissandra bore tremendous power, though chose to wield it in different ways - each one distinctly merciful, martial, or malicious.

name: Whispered Words
description:
Reputation: I cost 2 less. 
Draw 2.
flavourText: Before the news, the rumors. Before the rumors, the play. Before the play, the plot.

name: Thorn of the Rose
description: When I'm summoned, create a Guile in hand.
flavourText: "Aelana, my dearest friend and colleague! Have you seen Lord Duin about...?  Ah, what a shame. I was very much looking forward to catching up. I do hope he paced himself tonight. I would hate for anything to happen to the old boy..." - Lady Auvray, Black Rose Spy

name: Retired Reckoner
description: When you target me, grant me +1|+0.
flavourText: After countless battles, Beryn had vowed to never again raise his sword, even if it meant forfeiting his life. But when the strange mists swept through Noxus and overtook Thea, he knew he had to break his promise. He would free her, no matter the cost.

name: Ruined Reckoner
description: When I'm summoned, create a Midnight Raid in hand.
flavourText: When her sentence ended, Thea knew she could never rejoin her people. War - and Noxus - had changed her, made her a killer. She wouldn't know peace. Instead, she put her newfound skills to use for coin in the arenas.

name: Midnight Raid
description: An ally starts a free attack.
flavourText: "Kill or be killed!" - Ruined Reckoner

name: Bloody Business
description:
Reputation: I cost 2 less. 
An ally with 5+ Power strikes an enemy.
flavourText: "The greatest threats are the ones that go unseen." - LeBlanc

name: Thrashing Snapper
description: When an enemy blocks me, give me +3|+0 this round.
flavourText: Surprised by the resilience of the creature they'd found on the shore of Ionia, the young general insisted on taking it back home, eager to find out its true strength.

name: Incisive Tactician
description:
Reputation: I cost 2 less. 
When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavourText: Within the inner chambers of the Black Rose, Noxian nobles play their pieces, and murder befalls distant victims.

name: Black Rose Spy
description: Reputation: When I'm summoned, transform me into an exact copy of the strongest ally that struck this round.
flavourText: "A secret is only worth the cost of keeping it."

name: Mimic
description:
Reputation: I cost 3 less. 
When you play your next spell this round, copy it with the same targets.
flavourText: Imitation is flattery, and flattery can be quite deadly.

name: LeBlanc
flavourText: "Now now, no need to squabble amongst ourselves. For the moment, we will refrain from any rash action. Let us reconvene once we've heard from our emissary. After all..."

name: LeBlanc's Sigil of Malice
description:
Reputation: I cost 2 less. 
Deal 2 to anything.
Create a LeBlanc in your deck.
flavourText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.

name: Mirror Image
description: Pick an ally. Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
flavourText: "Seeing double?" - LeBlanc

name: LeBlanc
description: Each time you deal 15+ damage, create a Mirror Image in hand. If you already have one, reduce its cost by 1 instead.
flavourText: "...we all want the same thing."

name: Shrieking Spinner
description: Attack: Give Spider allies +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: "Go on, my sweet. Let the others hear your call. You know how it excites them. You know it pleases me." - Elise

name: Atakhan, Bringer of Ruin
description:
Play: Revive the Strongest dead ally.
Attack: Grant me Power equal to the total Power of all allies.
flavourText: A nameless aberration towered above them in the smoke-filled chamber. The mages chanted in discordant chorus, dread their voices reaching a strained, fevered pitch. The monster breathed deep of their mounting fear, and each breath brought it terrible power.

name: Crimson Bloodletter
description: The next time you summon another ally, deal 1 to it and grant me +1|+1.
flavourText: "They're rarely kept as pets, you know. Just one little scratch from those claws of theirs can open up a vein... but I don't mind." - Clara, Crimson Disciple

name: Sigil of Malice
description:
Reputation: I cost 2 less. 
Deal 2 to anything.
flavourText: Once the battle is won, one must not hesitate, but press on, pursue, and annihilate their foe.

name: Strength in Numbers
description: Summon 2 Legion Marauders.
flavourText: Though the soldiers of Noxus rarely leave survivors, the marauders leave even fewer.

name: Thorned Blade
description: Give an ally +5|+0 this round.
flavourText: "You will act with grace and courtesy. You will flatter, you will disarm. You will listen. You will learn. And, when it is time, you will strike, and you WILL kill." - LeBlanc

name: Kindred
description:
Each round, the first time you slay a unit, I mark the weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
flavourText:
Once there was a lonely man
Who split himself in twain
From one came two, born anew
Never alone again.

name: Kindred's Spirit Journey
description:
Kill a unit, then revive it.
Create a Kindred in your deck.
flavourText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb

name: Kindred
description:
Each round, the first time you slay a unit, grant me +2|+2 and I mark the weakest enemy. 
Round End: Kill units with my mark.
flavourText:
Death took the form of hunters 
None escape such as they
One cajoles with arrows and bow
One chases down its prey.

name: Viego
description: Each round, the first time another ally dies, summon an Encroaching Mist.
flavourText: "There is something that deeply unsettles me about the young king. Something at his heart... a hunger that cannot be satisfied, a desire that goes unfulfilled." - From the record of Nunyo Necrit of Camavor

name: Viego's Despair
description:
Pick a unit to strike your Nexus, then kill it.
Create a Viego in your deck.
flavourText: "I have given everything to find her, and yet it is not enough." - Viego

name: Viego
description:
Each round, the first time another unit dies, summon an Encroaching Mist.
Round Start: Steal the strongest enemy this round. If it's a champion, kill it instead.
flavourText: "It is obvious to me in hindsight that it was not Isolde's death that fueled Viego's delusions, nor his need for fulfillment, but simply that something he desperately wanted was denied him." - From the record of Nunyo Necrit of Camavor

name: Spirit Leech
description: Play: Kill an ally to draw 2.
flavourText: In shadow they lurk, waiting for a weary nod or an absent mind. Then claws, a gaping maw, and finally, darkness.

name: The Etherfiend
description: Play: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
flavourText: "As my time on this place comes to a close, I find myself pondering not my first death, but the second. Who will be the last soul to remember my name? And when they, too, fall to this earth... what will become of me?" - Eminent Benefactor

name: Unto Dusk
description:
Draw 1.
Nightfall: Activate an ally's Nightfall effect, ignoring any targeted portions.
flavourText: "Come, child. No need to be afraid." - Mask Mother

name: The Twisted Treeline
description: Once I've seen 3+ Fearsome or Nightfall allies attack, destroy me to summon Vilemaw.
flavourText:
Its altars may lie dormant, its paths may seem untrod,
But in the dark still skitters, the beast that fools forgot.

name: Sea Scarab
description: When another ally dies, or Last Breath: Toss 1.
flavourText: "Alright, you lot--haul them traps up! An' remember: if you see one of 'em sea scarabs, you cut rope an' move on. I ain't riskin' the keel for whatever they've half-eaten, y'hear?" - Bilgewater captain

name: Encroaching Mist
description: When I'm summoned, grant all allied Viegos and other Encroaching Mists everywhere +1|+1.
flavourText: Each living creature that beholds the Black Mist sees something unique in it, their own fears manifested and realized in vague, roiling forms.

name: The Wings and The Wave
description: Play: Play me as First Wave or Last Wind.
flavourText: The Kinkou speak of only two gods: the first wave, who cradles life in its warm waters, and the last wind, who snatches life with its final, frigid sighs.

name: Last Wind
description: To play me, kill an ally.
flavourText: What is life without death?

name: First Wave
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
flavourText: What is death without life?

name: Song of the Isles
description: Grant an ally Lifesteal, Fearsome, and Ephemeral.
flavourText: "Come, child. See as I see, and feel as I feel. Do not fear the darkness." - The Rekindler

name: Camavoran Soldier
description: When I'm summoned, summon an Encroaching Mist.
flavourText: The soldiers of Camavor marched with Viego in life, then again in death, their loyalty unwavering.

name: Lamb's Respite
description: Give the weakest ally "I can't take damage or die" this round.
flavourText: "Shine once more, before the end." - Lamb

name: Withering Mist
description: Drain 2 from 2 enemies.
flavourText: "I will take what I want, and dispense with what I don't." - Viego

name: Astral Fox
description: Play: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: A handful of Targonian tribes speak of the Fox, a god of death seen as a lone star in the night sky. As the legend goes, the Fox descends upon the mountain with each death, and takes the soul to the skies to create his own dark constellation.

name: Despair
description: Pick a unit to strike your Nexus, then kill it.
flavourText: "I have given everything to find her, and yet it is not enough." - Viego

name: Symmetry In Stars
description: Kill an ally to deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Now you'll truly shine!" - Astral Fox

name: Soulspinner
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 and Fearsome if an ally died this round.
flavourText: "Once there was a hapless young man who thought to court a spider, never once suspecting he would end up in her web..."

name: Mask Mother
description: Play: Kill an ally to grant me its stats and keywords.
flavourText: They say the Mask Mother created Kindred, just as she created all the incarnations of death. But from whom did she receive her mask, if she didn't craft it herself?

name: The Second Death
description: Kill an ally to kill an enemy.
flavourText: "Eventually all will be forgotten." - The Etherfiend

name: Crawling Viperwyrm
description: To play me, I strike an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
flavourText: At first, the Demacian soldiers thought they heard dozens of claws skittering across the square's tile. It wasn't until it breached the watchtower that they realized those many limbs belonged to a single creature.

name: Spirit Journey
description: Kill a unit, then revive it.
flavourText: "This is only an interlude." - Lamb

name: Invasive Hydravine
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Summon an Encroaching Mist.
flavourText: Maokai worked tirelessly to cultivate life in the Shadow Isles. The Mist's ambivalence makes its ironies no less cruel.

name: Fading Icon
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Prey.
flavourText: Who could forget their own god of death, other than those cursed with immortality? And what greater fear can a god of death have, other than being forgotten?

name: Prey
flavourText: "They flicker through the dark forest, dotting the treeline like stars in the night sky, unaware of their pursuers." - Lamb

name: Camavoran Dragon
description:
To play me, I strike an ally or deal 3 to your Nexus.
When I kill another unit, drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: For centuries, the Black Mist has sought out creatures all over the world, twisting and warping them; turning them into nightmarish versions of their past selves.

name: Eye of the Ra-Horak
description:
Countdown 1: Stun the 2 weakest enemies.
Daybreak: Summon a copy of me with Countdown 2.
flavourText: "Let the sun shed Her light upon us. Those who are weak and unworthy will cower before Her gaze!" - Solari Priestess

name: Malphite
description: Play: Stun an enemy.
flavourText:
"And here's da last stop on da Chip tour of Targon! It's PAPA! He's da BIGGEST of da Targon giants, an' sings a mean song, too, lemme tell ya. Just don't try to climb him! Da spikes tickle him, and you dun want him sneezin' when you're halfway up no sah!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 6

name: Malphite
description:
Play: Stun an enemy.
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create an Unstoppable Force in hand.
flavourText: "Boom boom boom!"

name: Unstoppable Force
description: Stun all enemies.
flavourText: "ROCK. SOLID." - Malphite

name: Malphite's Ground Slam
description:
Stun an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
Create a Malphite in your deck.
flavourText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip

name: Rockslide
description: Stun an enemy.
flavourText: "Only place to go is down!" - Malphite

name: Startipped Peak
description: Countdown 2: Create 2 random Celestial cards that cost 3 or less in hand.
flavourText: Those who set off to climb Mount Targon are soon rewarded with some of Runeterra's most glorious views. And as the climb steepens, so do its rewards.

name: Chip
description: Once you've summoned a landmark this game, grant me +2|+2.
flavourText:
"Okay so hello I'm Chip an' I'm here to show you Targon! It's wowow big an' tall so I hope you got good shoes for da walkin'! Let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 1

name: Spiral Stairs
description: Countdown 3: Create a Seed of Strength in hand.
flavourText:
"Here's da first stop on da tour! I call this da leg wobbler because WOWEE are dere a lot steps! Pretty cool view too, an' dat's one of the best things in Targon. Okay let's GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2

name: Seed of Strength
description: Grant an ally +3|+2 and Overwhelm.
flavourText:
"OH I FORGOT. Okay so you're probabab... probababer... problee thinkin' dat your legs are like WOWOW tired right now, but I seen the people who walk around here a lot, an' sooner or later dey get ALL KINDSA muscles! So keep at it, and let's GO! AGAIN!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 2.1

name: Rockfall Path
description: Countdown 2: Obliterate the weakest enemy.
flavourText:
"Okay so EV-ER-EE-BODY watch out here cuz dis is a BIG DROP an' I've fallen down here a few times and LEMME TELL YOU it's a long way down! An' I'm made of wok so I just bounce, but dat's not true for you guys... so be caref--ooh dere's Cliff! Let's go say hi!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 3

name: Frightened Ibex
description: When I'm supported, give me and my supporting ally +1|+1 this round.
flavourText:
"Don't be afraid of the howling gale
As it blows 'cross the mountain and through the dale
Never you worry, you have nothing to fear
My darling, rest, mother is near." - Targonian lullaby

name: Blue Sentinel
description: Last Breath: Summon a Crest of Insight.
flavourText:
"Okay EV-ER-EE-ONE say "HI BLU!" HI BLU! Okay one time I thought he was like "HI BLU!" back, but now dat I think about it might have been my voice bouncin' off da walls. OH WELL he's all magical and stuff and also blue so if you ask me he doesn't even NEED to speak! OKAY BYE BLUE LET'S GO!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 5

name: Solari Sunhawk
description: Daybreak: Stun the strongest enemy.
flavourText: The Solari believe that it was Targon's sunhawks--brilliant as they are--who caught the Immortal Fire's attention, and who subsequently inspired her cycle of death and rebirth.

name: Earth Elemental
description: Once you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, grant me +3|+0.
flavourText:
"Okay, so dis is CLIFF! He's a big ol' fella who's been aroun' da block QUITE A FEW times let me tell you. An' I know dat he looks cool and I know dat he seems like a nice guy, but he's got a lotta heavy stuff on his back, and sometimes it falls on people so BE CAREFUL okay? Thank you moving on!"
- Adventures with Chip, part 4

name: Crest of Insight
description: Countdown 1: Get an extra mana gem this round.
flavourText: "Dis is Blu's faaaaaavorite place inna whole wide world! He says it's SUPER magical! Oooh, ahhh!" - Chip

name: Stonebreaker
description: Play: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: From time to time, the great colossi of Targon awaken from their slumber and trek to new grounds atop the great mountain. These events are never quiet, and seldom safe.

name: Starlit Epiphany
description:
Invoke.
If you have a Celestial ally, replace your deck with 20 copies of Behold the Infinite.
flavourText: "Look, Kulun! The stars have so many stories to tell! Which should we read tonight, hmm?" - Moondreamer

name: Destiny's Call
description: Grant an ally in hand +8|+8.
flavourText: "Embrace your destiny, and shine more brilliantly than anyone could have ever known." - Taric

name: Ground Slam
description: Stun an enemy. Deal 3 to it if you've summoned a landmark this game.
flavourText: "Oop yep dat's just da ground shakin' and not papa doin' nothin' with his hands NOPE OKAY onwards annn' UPWARDS!" - Chip

name: Blinding Crest
description: Stun the Strongest enemy.
flavourText: Some Solari claim the sunhawk's brilliant gleam is the bird trying to send a signal to The Immortal Fire herself.

name: Shaken Ground
description: If you've summoned 4+ landmarks this game, deal 4 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Spike is not a morning person..." - Malphite

name: Heavens Aligned
description:
Daybreak: Create a random Nightfall card in hand.
Nightfall: Create a random Daybreak card in hand.
flavourText: So goes the cycle of night and day, one always following the other.

name: Ardent Tracker
description: When you summon an Elite, reduce my cost by 1.
flavourText: Though the Noxians had laid their trap well, still no-one knew the woods better than Demacia's scouts. Every snapped branch, every footprint was a clue that led them closer to their prince.

name: Dragon Chow
description: When you play a Dragon, it strikes me and you draw 1.
flavourText: "That shriek you hear from way up high? That's no bird, my boy. That's the cry of a hunting dragon." - Demacian farmer

name: Honored Lord
description: The first time I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavourText: After learning of his son's disappearance, King Jarvan III tasked his trusted friend Lord Barrett Buvelle with organizing a search party. The prince returned safe and well. Lord Buvelle, to the king's eternal regret, did not.

name: Field Promotion
description: The next time you play a unit this round, grant it Scout. It's now an Elite.
flavourText: When Demacians' mettle is tested, they rise to the occasion.

name: Cataclysm
description: An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
flavourText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV

name: Golden Aegis
description:
Give an ally Barrier this round.
Rally.
flavourText: "Once more, soldier of Demacia!" - Jarvan IV

name: Battlefield Prowess
description: Grant an ally +1|+1.
flavourText: "I could teach you a thing or two." - Lord Buvelle

name: Tattered Banner
description: The next time you summon an ally this round, grant it Challenger.
flavourText: "Form up, on me!" - Silverwing Vanguard

name: Jarvan IV
description: When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
flavourText: The Noxians knew where Prince Jarvan's hunt would take him. They knew how many Demacians would be by his side, and they knew that his honor wouldn't permit him to flee. The trap was set.

name: Jarvan IV
description:
When you attack, pay my cost to summon me Challenging the strongest enemy.
Round Start: Create a Fleeting Cataclysm in hand.
When I Challenge an enemy, give me Barrier this round.
flavourText: But the Noxians did fail to account for the young prince's sheer strength and uncompromising will. They paid for this miscalculation in blood.

name: Jarvan IV's Cataclysm
description:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging an enemy.
Create a Jarvan IV in your deck.
flavourText: "For the king!" - Jarvan IV

name: Cithria, Lady of Clouds
description: When I'm summoned, double other allies' Power and Health and grant them Challenger.
flavourText: "Who else could Demacia send to save her prince than the Lady of Clouds herself?" - King Jarvan III

name: Ruined Dragonguard
description: When an ally with Fury kills a unit, grant it an additional +1|+1.
flavourText: The Mist warped Gregem's mind, forcing him to relive Wrenwall, over and over. Stoked by long-buried bitterness and rage, he turned against the comrades who once stood with him.

name: King Jarvan III
description:
When I'm summoned, draw Jarvan IV. 
If he's already in play, instead give allies Challenger and Scout this round.
flavourText: "What, pray tell, would a father sacrifice to save his son? Better yet, what would a king?" - LeBlanc

name: Kadregrin the Ruined
description: Play: Grant an ally Challenger and +1|+1.
flavourText: Kadregrin sowed chaos and fear long before the Black Mist reached Demacia. Under Viego's command, however, his skills would bolster all of the Ruined King's forces.

name: Towering Stonehorn
description: I don't take damage from enemy spells or Skills.
flavourText: The great Stonehorns are reputed to have come from the time the petricite forest was young, their spreading antlers made of a material similar to those now-ancient trees.

name: Swiftwing Flight
description:
Play: Create a Silverwing Vanguard, Blinding Assault, or Fleetfeather Tracker in hand.
Attack: Give other Challenging allies +1|+1 this round.
flavourText: The very sight of the Swiftwing flight inspires Demacian soldiers on fields far below. Upon seeing them descend through the clouds, those on the ground are reinvigorated, and ready to continue the fight.

name: Penitent Squire
description: When I'm summoned, if you Behold an Elite, create a Tattered Banner in hand.
flavourText: Only when she reached the city's walls did her legs finally give way. The Dauntless Vanguard would carry her message to the king, and the king would save the prince. Thus would her wrong be righted, and her honor preserved.

name: Gallant Rider
description: The first time I Challenge an enemy, transform me into Vanguard Cavalry.
flavourText: Once the call was made, every Demacian soldier was summoned to aid in the search for the prince. Expediency, more than anything, was key.

name: Kennen
description: When I'm summoned, create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
flavourText: Kennen had heard it too, the roar of some unseen... something. Man or monster, it did not matter. The Kinkou would protect their land at any cost.

name: Shark Trainer
description: When allies attack, summon an attacking Short Tooth.
flavourText: The Trainer's routine is the same each night. Fish 'n ale for supper, a quick puff of his bubblepipe, followed by kisses on snouts and a story for his sharks before bedtime.

name: Wizened Wizard
description: Round Start: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavourText: If there is no greater pain than the papercut, then there is no one who better understands pain than the librarian.

name: Spirit Portal
description: To play, discard 1. Grant all allies Spirit.
flavourText: "I can never remember how these things work." - Poppy

name: Short Tooth
flavourText:
"They say don't bite the hand that feeds--but by Bandle--they bit my hand AND anything else they could reach!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Note, Day 13

name: Swole Scout
description: When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+1 for each other Yordle ally you have.
flavourText: "What's my secret? You'll have to ask the biceps. They do all the talking."

name: Tristana
description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
flavourText: "Okay, Plan A: We blast our way in and start shooting. If that doesn't work, we go to Plan B: Blast our way out and keep shooting. Then, we'll regroup and go to Plan C, which is basically Plan A again..."

name: Tristana's Buster Shot
description:
I cost 2 less if you have a Tristana or if you've played cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
Create a Tristana in your deck.
flavourText: In every ka-blam there's a ka-boom waiting to be born.

name: Tristana
description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant me and it +1|+0 and Impact.
flavourText: "...and whatever happens... JUST. KEEP. SHOOTING."

name: Minitee
description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Megatee.
flavourText: Things minitees like: napping on the warm summerstones beside the Nakotak tribal lands. Things minitees do not like: being shoved off said summerstones by cheeky yordles...

name: Megatee
description: Round Start: Transform the strongest enemy into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it. It can't block.
flavourText: ...but, as they say, yordles gonna yordle!

name: Yuumi
description: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me +1|+1 instead.
flavourText: Yuumi did have to admit that for all her fussing, she did like Book quite a lot. She liked its smell. She liked its illustrations. She even liked jumping through its portals! ...but nothing was as good as just having Norra back home, safe and sound.

name: Electro Harpoon
description: To play, discard 1. Deal 2 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Let's give 'em a show!" - Rumble

name: Grumbleslug
flavourText:
"Though quite small, the grumbleslug has a large appetite and possesses what I can only describe as a 'real attitude problem.'" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 17

name: Gnar
description: Strike: Create a Pokey Stick in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost by 2.
flavourText: Long ago, Gnar and his kin thrived in the Nakotak Valley. It was an innocent place, untouched by modern trappings. How unfortunate that the passing of time took this place from Gnar. But how fortunate that time doesn't exactly function as expected in Bandle City.

name: Gnar's Wallop
description:
Deal 1 to an enemy and Stun it. 
Create a Gnar in your deck.
flavourText: "Ahanga!" - Gnar

name: Mega Gnar
description:
When I level up, grant the strongest enemy Vulnerable.
Round End: If I've seen you start the round with the attack token, transform me back into Gnar.
flavourText: The yordles sat on their tree branch and cheered for Gnar as he duked it out with another passing monster. These were rare events, but always awesome to spectate!

name: Earthshaker
description: Attack: Double my Power and Impact.
flavourText:
"They say I'm a joke. That I've got dirt for brains. That I'm all tremble and no quake. Well I've just got one thing to say to my opponents...  I'm gonna rock your world!" 
- Pre-match interview

name: Inventive Chemist
description: When I’m summoned, summon a Scrappy Bomb.
flavourText: Giselle was one of Professor Heimerdinger's best students until she heard of Ziggs' strange experiments down in Zaun. Then it was all "hexplosives" this and "could you recommend me for an internship" that.

name: Gruff Grenadier
description: Allegiance: Summon another Yordle follower that costs 3 or less.
flavourText: "Alice here holds two shots: one's a greeting, the other's a farewell. You two wanna meet?"

name: Furious Faefolk
description: When I'm summoned, if you've dealt damage to the enemy Nexus 4+ times this game, grant me 4 Impact.
flavourText: Chewy outside, tough and gritty center.

name: Yuumi
description: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to SpellShield and +1|+1. Otherwise, grant me SpellShield and +1|+1 instead.
flavourText: Yet with each new portal came new adventures, and with each new adventure came a chance to make new friends!

name: Yuumi's Prowling Projectile
description:
Grant an ally +1|+0. Deal 1 to an enemy.
Create a Yuumi in your deck.
flavourText: "Zoooooom!" - Yuumi

name: Yuumi
description: Round Start: Grant me +1|+1.
flavourText: Yuumi did have to admit that for all her fussing, she did like Book quite a lot. She liked its smell. She liked its illustrations. She even liked jumping through its portals! ...but nothing was as good as just having Norra back home, safe and sound.

name: Yuumi
description: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to SpellShield and +1|+1.
flavourText: "I go where you go!" - Yuumi

name: Yuumi
description: Round Start: Grant me SpellShield and +1|+1.
flavourText: Yet with each new portal came new adventures, and with each new adventure came a chance to make new friends!

name: Yuumi
description: Round Start: Grant the unit I'm Attached to +1|+1.
flavourText: "I'm sticking with you!" - Yuumi

name: Salty Spinner
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Grant me +0|+2 for each card you discarded last round, then shuffle my stats.
flavourText: For obvious reasons, "paddlemarpower" never really took off as a unit of measurement.

name: Minion
description: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in hand at the next Round Start.
flavourText:
"A true supervillain can never have enough minions! Short little fellows who know their place, obey your every word, and always come back for further instruction."
- Excerpt from Ch. 2 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar

name: Rainbowfish
flavourText: The Rainbowfish was glad to do some aerial reconnaissance, even if it meant taking a bigger leap than she ever had before. She would take any reprieve, however slight, from Yuumi's hungry stare.

name: Rainbowfish
description: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm Attached. When that ally leaves play, Recall me.
flavourText: "Help 'em out, Rainbowfish!" - Yuumi

name: Rainbowfish
flavourText: The Rainbowfish was glad to do some aerial reconnaissance, even if it meant taking a bigger leap than she ever had before. She would take any reprieve, however slight, from Yuumi's hungry stare.

name: Veigar
description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
flavourText:
"This world will fear me. It will wear my scars for all eternity. It will ache under the weight of my power. It will shudder under the shadow of my enormity!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 1 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar

name: Veigar's Event Horizon
description:
Stun an enemy and stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
Create a Veigar in your deck.
flavourText: "Just... stay right there..." - Veigar

name: Grand Overseer Veigar
description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
When you play Darkness, it can target anything.
flavourText:
"Aha. Muaha. Ahahaha. AHAHA. AHAHAHAHAHA! MUAHAHAHA! MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 12 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar

name: Stone Stackers
flavourText: Yordles haven't quite figured out gravity yet, but then, gravity hasn't quite figured out Bandle City, either.

name: Friendship!
description: Give an ally Barrier or SpellShield this round.
flavourText: "I'll protect you with my wild and furious... meow!" - Yuumi

name: Shell Game
description: Refill your spell mana. Give an ally Elusive and +1|+1 this round.
flavourText:
"I SEE them enter the left shell, yet when I CHOOSE that shell, it's empty. I'm beginning to suspect this game might be rigged..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 14

name: Tenor of Terror
description: When I'm summoned, if you've played a created card or killed a unit with a spell this game, summon a Bass of Burden.
flavourText: If Veigar needed help tipping the scales of justice, then none were better suited to the job than these two. They knew all of them. Except the mixolydian one.

name: Bass of Burden
flavourText: "The show had already run into a number of mishaps by the third piece, when the larger of the two singers--I use the term loosely--either delved into the world of the true avant-garde, or choked on a hairball. I am, even at the time of writing, unsure which." - Max Bliff, Gatekeeper

name: Rumble
description: Play: Discard up to 3 cards to grant allied Rumbles everywhere Impact for the first, Quick Attack for the second, and SpellShield for the third.
flavourText:
"Annnnd that oughta do 'er."
"ERROR."
"WHAT? I just fixed that!"
"SYSTEM FAILURE IMMINENT."
"Turn it off. TURN IT OFF!"
- Rumble and Tristy

name: Rumble
description: When you deal damage to the enemy Nexus, create a random Mecha Yordle in hand or if you have one, grant all Mecha Yordles in hand +1|+1 and reduce their cost by 1.
flavourText: "I mean, I know Tristy's already got the flamethrower, the electro-drill, and the giant freakin' mace, but c'mon... I wasn't NOT gonna add rockets. Heh heh."

name: Rumble's Flamespitter
description:
Grant an ally +2|+0 and Impact.
Create a Rumble in your deck.
flavourText: "If they ain't howlin', it ain't hot enough! Heh heh." - Rumble

name: Gust Monk
description: When I'm summoned, create a Cloud Stance in hand.
flavourText: "It is from control of breath that our school's technique is derived. Just as it is from wind that a tempest is born."

name: Arena Mechacaster
description: Attack: Give other attacking allies +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: "How do I do it? Screamin' matches night after night? Gargle engine oil. Five minutes in the mornin', five at night."

name: Purpleberry Shake
description: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
flavourText:
"I used to be like you–couldn't even lift a puffcap. But then, I found "Shake: by Purpleberry." It's got all the right stuff a yordle needs to go from zero to hero. So when you've had a hard workout, fuel up with 'Shake,' and become the buffest of bros, like me!" 
- Printed Advertisement

name: Event Horizon
description: Stun an enemy and stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavourText: "Just... stay right there..." - Veigar

name: Entrapment
description: Pick 1 of 3 units or spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavourText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"

name: Entrapment
description: Pick 1 of 3 spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavourText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"

name: Entrapment
description: Pick 1 of 3 units from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavourText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"

name: Kennen's Lightning Rush
description:
Recall an ally to deal 2 to anything.
Create a Kennen in your deck.
flavourText: "First the crack, then the boom!" - Kennen

name: Mark of the Storm
description: Grant an enemy Mark of the Storm. If they already have it, remove the mark to Stun and deal 2 to them instead.
flavourText: The storm approaches.

name: Kennen
description: When I'm summoned, blocked, or Attack: Create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
flavourText: "We are wind and thunder! We are rain and lightning! This is... TEMPEST!"

name: Arena Promoter
description: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha Yordle and reduce its cost by 1.
flavourText: "TICKETS! GET YER TICKETS! NOWWWW HALF OFF! Oh, biscuits, if I don't sell these tickets, the boss'll kill me... literally."

name: Best Pals
description: Give an ally SpellShield this round.
flavourText: "When my friends are happy, I'M happy!" - Yuumi

name: Best Buddies
description: Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavourText: "Look, Book! Friends!" - Yuumi

name: Professor Von Mech
description: When I'm summoned, create a random 1, 2, and 3 cost follower in hand.
flavourText: "Somebody get these freakin' hairballs off my desk!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin

name: Ziggs
description: Attack: I deal 1 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText:
"It's IMPORTANT we make a good impression. The new safety inspector is stopping by, and you know what that means!"
"No more explosions?"
"WHAT?! No! It means explode things where he can't see 'em! 'No more explosions'... are you crazy?!" - Ziggs and Otto

name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb
description:
Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavourText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs

name: Short Fuse
description: Deal 1 to Ziggs' blocker and to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Boom!" - Ziggs

name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb
description:
Deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavourText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs

name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb
description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavourText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs

name: Ziggs
description:
Attack: I deal 2 damage to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
When you destroy an allied landmark, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText:
"We passed?! WE PASSED!"
"Heh, well, 'passed' is a strong word... but hoo-wee, if you didn't put on a heck of a show!" - Ziggs and Wilfred, Safety Inspector

name: Short Fuse
description: Deal 2 to Ziggs' blocker and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Boom!" - Ziggs

name: Mirror Mage
description: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavourText: "Oh yes, she's quite the mirror master. She makes my designs look even more sublime, and with a small trick of the light, even manages to lend a certain someone a touch of much needed verticality..." - Stilted Robemaker

name: Hexplosive Minefield
description: When I’m summoned or you destroy me, Stun the strongest enemy.
flavourText: "What do you mean, 'this doesn't look safe'?" - Ziggs

name: Yordle Portal
description: To play, discard 1. Manifest a Yordle that costs 3 or less and summon it.
flavourText: "Never leave a gunner behind!" - Tristana

name: Bouncing Bomb
description: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
flavourText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs

name: Bandle Commando
description: Nexus Strike: Create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
flavourText: "Gunnin' in the streets and tuckin' kiddos into sheets!"

name: Yordle Ranger
description: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +0|+1.
flavourText:
"Poppy! Excellent execution of our latest tactic. What do you think of calling it 'Peanut Petalstorm'?"
"I, uh, kinda just hit the baddie with my hammer. Can't we just call this one 'Hammer'?"
"That's what we called the last three!" - Kip and Poppy

name: Mega Inferno Bomb
description: Deal 1 to all enemies, then do it again.
flavourText: "Bring out... 'The Big One'!" - Ziggs

name: Mushroom Ring
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Give me Power this round equal to the number of other Fae allies in play or Attached.
flavourText: The little pinheads are rather cute, and by themselves, have mushroom to grow.

name: Poppy
description: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
flavourText: Humility is a mark of heroism, but many historians would agree that Poppy is kind of pushing it.

name: Prowling Projectile
description: Grant an ally +1|+0. Deal 1 to an enemy.
flavourText: "Zoooooom!" - Yuumi

name: Bandle Gunners
description:
I cost 1 less for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When I'm summoned, grant me 3 Impact.
flavourText: Squad goals.

name: Quick Quill
flavourText: "W... h... e... r... e... s... N... o... r... r... a...? Oh dear, what should I tell it?" - Mouse steward

name: Papercraft Dragon
flavourText:
"One more fold, and see? This one is a giraffe! His name is Socks." 
"Why 'Socks'?" 
"Norra loves socks, so she'll love him, too!" - Mouse stewards

name: Papercraft Dragon
flavourText:
"One more fold, and see? This one is a giraffe! His name is Socks." 
"Why 'Socks'?" 
"Norra loves socks, so she'll love him, too!" - Mouse stewards

name: Papercraft Dragon
description: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm Attached. When that ally leaves play, Recall me.
flavourText: "Help out a friend, won'tcha, little guy?" - Yuumi

name: Scrapheap
description:
To play, discard 1.
Manifest a Mecha Yordle.
flavourText: "Junk. Crap. Garbage... Hey, now THIS is what I'm freakin' talkin' about!" - Rumble

name: Poison Dart
description: Deal 1 to anything and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavourText: "Haha! Bullseye!" - Teemo

name: The Bandle Tree
description: Round Start: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Then, if I've seen allies from 10 regions, win the game.
flavourText: Stretching an unknowable distance into the heavens above, The Bandle Tree is an impossible fixture at the heart of the city. Under its great, gnarled branches, some yordles see a beacon of hope and friendship while others see an ominous, riddle-filled monolith. All agree that to gaze upon the Bandle Tree is to glance into the soul of something very old and very powerful.

name: Rissu, The Silent Storm
description: When I'm summoned, summon a Stormcloud.
flavourText: Weaving a Stormcloud took time. Time Rissu didn't have. Her hands worked furiously as the Aberration closed in. A bit of cloud here, some lightning there. Then... CRACK! BOOM! She had done it, but would it be enough?

name: Stormcloud
description: When I'm summoned, grant me 3 Impact.
flavourText: The Stormcloud crashed into the Aberration in a crackling tangle of mist and lightning. The beast howled as it fell to the ground, its monstrous eye rolling into the back of its head. Kennen gingerly approached through the Stormcloud's dissipating haze. The Kinkou had won, but it would be short-lived. There would always be another threat. Another monster. But they would be ready.

name: Prank
description: Pick 1 of 2 non-champion cards from the enemy hand or deck and Prank it.
flavourText: "Gotcha!" - Fizz

name: Yordle Contraption
description: Destroy a landmark or create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
flavourText: "Hang on - we're rollin'!" - Bomber Twins

name: Yordle Contraption
description: Destroy a landmark.
flavourText: "Hang on - we're rollin'!" - Bomber Twins

name: Yordle Contraption
description: Create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
flavourText: "Hang on - we're rollin'!" - Bomber Twins

name: Safety Inspector
description: Round Start: Create a Inspection Passed! in hand.
flavourText: Wilfred was originally skeptical. He was skeptical throughout, too. In fact, he was skeptical 'til the very end - but Ziggs and the other hexplosive experts proved they knew how to put on a real humdinger of a fireworks show.

name: Inspection Passed!
description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 3 to anything.
flavourText: "... turns out, HE was a huge hexplosives fan, too!" - Ziggs

name: Heroic Refrain
description: Give 2 allies +2|+1 this round.
flavourText:
"'There the heroes stood, back to back--'"
"--Butt to butt! Hehehehehe!"
"N-no! Peppy, if you must interject, please do so during less dramatic moments!" 
- Tales told 'round the yordle campfire

name: Stress Defense
description: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
flavourText: The Bawkatrice is a loyal, steadfast mount under normal circumstances. However, when put under too much stress they are known to react in... unusual ways.

name: Flamespitter
description: Grant an ally +2|+0 and Impact.
flavourText: "If they ain't howlin', it ain't hot enough! Heh heh." - Rumble

name: Dunehopper Mech
description: Attack: Summon 2 attacking Sand Soldiers.
flavourText: "Ya see? It gets everywhere! I DON'T LIKE SAND! The cleanup's gonna cost me a fortune!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin

name: Tricksy Tentacles
description: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
flavourText:
"Note to self: On next expedition, keep all valuables in my FRONT pockets." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 19

name: Puffcap Pup
description: Strike: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck.
flavourText: "What's that, boy? Two of the recruits were scouting in the woods and stumbled across a scary grass monster, and now they might die a long and painful death? Lead the way!" - Teemo

name: Twisted Catalyzer
description: Strike: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
flavourText: Darkness comes in all shapes and sizes. Some of them SURPRISINGLY adorable.

name: Yordle Newbie
description: When you summon another Yordle, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: "Giantus grassicus. These terrifying creatures camouflage themselves by laying like ordinary grass and attack any unfortunate enough to walk over them. If encountered, run away forever!" - Ava Achiever

name: Yordle Captain
description: When you summon another ally with equal or less Power than me, grant it +1|+1.
flavourText: "Adventuring means finding baddies, and turning them into friends!"

name: Thunder Fist
description: When I’m summoned, if you’ve summoned a Thunder Fist this game, transform me into Masa, Crashing Thunder.
flavourText: As Masa struck the training dummy, a flash of lightning erupted from the fist, splitting the wood in two and singeing the hair on his hands. He pulled on the rope, reeling in the bronze hand and reflecting on his training—he was finally ready. Suddenly, a monstrous roar echoed in the distance.

name: Pompous Cavalier
flavourText: "Nine hundred ninety-eight... nine hundred ninety-nine... one thousand! There we are, Bawky, you look impeccable as ever. Okay, now do mine!"

name: Poppy
description: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +2|+2 and Impact.
flavourText: Power is a famously corrupting influence, but Poppy proves that its corruption is no match for a good heart and stubborn, steadfast obliviousness.

name: Poppy's Keeper's Verdict
description: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck. Create a Poppy in your deck.
flavourText: "And don't come back!" - Poppy

name: Buster Shot
description:
I cost 2 less if you have a Tristana or if you've played cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavourText: In every ka-blam there's a ka-boom waiting to be born.

name: Spotted Toad
description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Giga Gromp.
flavourText: The yordles of Nakotak Valley had tried for several generations to understand their gromp neighbors. First, Chief Hegabo had tried poking them with a stick. Next, Chief Babobu tried poking them with a stick. Chief Nakotak had a brand new plan: he was going to poke them with a stick.

name: Furyhorn Crasher
description: Attack: Grant the top 3 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavourText: Mess with the mech, you get the horns.

name: Teenydactyl
description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Terrordactyl.
flavourText: The creatures of Nakotak Valley are as varied and lively as the land they inhabit... and just as likely to explode.

name: Fix-Em-Uppers
description: The first time you discard a card or damage the enemy Nexus, grant me +2|+1.
flavourText: "Alright, good fight. Good show everyone. Now clean up this crap, and uh, you know the drill: anything salvageable... fix it up, put it in the shop, and we'll just sell it right back to 'em! AHAHAHA!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin

name: Group Shot
description: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have 4+ allies, deal 2 instead.
flavourText: "Okay, this one's for the newsletter. And remember to smile this time! One... two... three...!" - Tristana

name: Cloud Stance
description: Give an ally +2|+0 and "Round End: Recall me" this round.
flavourText: "Return to breath, and find your strength!" - Gust Monk

name: Proto Poro
flavourText: The poros of yesteryear had much thicker heads than their contemporary kin, making them a little bit dumber, and a whole lot headbuttier.

name: Kelp Maidens
description: Nexus Strike: Create a Prank in hand.
flavourText:
"Dear me, I've just had the oddest dream. One moment, I'm scrambling through the kelp, looking for my shell hat, when suddenly I hear the most wonderful melody. Next thing I know, I'm seated here, pen in hand, writing these words. I don't recall sitting down for a nap..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 22

name: Lil Dipper
description:
To play me, discard a unit.
Last Breath: Summon an exact copy of the discarded unit.
flavourText: "You thought I kept my money buried beneath the arena? HAH! What am I, a pirate? Now go fill that hole before the next match! ... ... Tim, we gotta move the money again." - Karl, Arena Kingpin

name: Assistant Librarian
description: Nexus Strike: Draw a spell that costs 3 or less.
flavourText: "Jelly's my BEST FRIEND! I mean, after you, Book. And Norra. Okay, Jelly's my THIRD-BEST FRIEND. That's still pretty good though, right?!" - Yuumi

name: Conchologist
description: Play: Manifest a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
flavourText:
"Today is indeed a red letter day! An exploration into the deep! I expect things to proceed quite... swimmingly! Ho ho!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 1

name: Masa, Crashing Thunder
flavourText: Masa attacked with a loud cry. There was a sizzle, then a crack, followed by a howl. Enraged, The Aberration fixed its massive eye on the still-smoking bronze fists, unaware of the encroaching Stormcloud. Masa steeled himself as a monstrous hand fast-approached and prayed he'd bought them enough time.

name: Minimorph
description: Transform a unit into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it.
flavourText: "Oh-ho! How cute! How adorable! How TINY!" - Veigar

name: Bouncer & Bolt
flavourText: "That hole you put in the ceiling during the last match? It's comin' outta your next paycheck!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin

name: Hungry Owlcat
flavourText:
"...But one day he arrived, empty-handed,
And one by one, the greedy birds landed.
They pecked and scratched and mauled
'Til there was nothing left of him at all!"
- Bandle City tall tale

name: Hidden Pathways
description: I cost 2 less if you've created 2+ cards this game. Draw 2.
flavourText: Very few outsiders know the way to Bandle City, but strange markings in the rocks and trees of Runeterra offer hints to those who know what to look for.

name: Aloof Travelers
description: When I’m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
flavourText: "Worst. Trip. Ever." - Elle

name: Ava Achiever
description:
When I'm summoned or Round End: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck. 
Traps on enemy cards are doubled when activated.
flavourText: "Rule 378: A good scout is always brave, always prepared, and always daring!"

name: Bitsy Lizard
description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Lava Lizard.
flavourText: "Eat the pepper!" barked Nakotak, probably. "No, YOU eat the pepper!" replied Jojo, also probably. As they argued, a small lizard scuttled by, chasing a smaller fly. The two yordles looked at the lizard, then the pepper, then each other. If lightbulbs existed, one would've gone off.

name: Yordle Squire
description: Play: Create a Tiny Spear or a Tiny Shield in hand.
flavourText: "My spear used to belong to a great hero, too... I made Poppy hold it for a minute!"

name: Lava Lizard
flavourText: Jojo and Nakotak screamed out giggles and giggled out screams as they fled. The Lava Lizard's flames had already singed their back fur, consumed trees, and was now starting to melt the delicate snowdrift. It was AWESOME.

name: Poro Sled
description: Attack: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
flavourText: "An' den DAT Bobjim da poro was like "DAT WAY!" an' so off dey went into da horizahn, with da other poros scamperin' behind, tryin' their bestest to keep up!" - Ingvar the Younger

name: Arena Kingpin
flavourText: "There's a sucker born every minute, and I'm gonna take 'em for all they got... this mech arena's gonna be a GOLD MINE."

name: Otterpus
description: When I'm summoned, create a Prank in hand.
flavourText:
"Curious and playful, the otterpus are an immensely cheery bunch. Or is it otterpi? Say, didn't I pack a third sandwich?" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 7

name: Ember Monk
description: When you summon another ally, grant me +1|+0.
flavourText: "Small sparks become a raging blaze. We are the embers of your destruction!"

name: Primal Strength
description: Grant an ally +2|+2 and Impact.
flavourText: Yes, he's very cute. Yes, he has a temper. No, you don't want to see it.

name: Scrappy Bomb
description: Countdown 3 or when you destroy me: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "It's a real work of art, isn't it!" - Giselle, Inventive Chemist

name: Fae Aid
description: Create a Hungry Owlcat in hand, then grant Fae allies in hand +1|+1.
flavourText: "Who keeps feeding these things?" - Poppy

name: Giga Gromp
description: When I transform, deal 1 to all enemies.
flavourText: So, it turns out that poking Nakotak Valley gromps with a stick causes them to react very... expansively! If only those yordles had known this through extensive, generational testing. If. Only.

name: Quick Quill
description: Attach me to an ally to give it my stats and keywords while I'm Attached. When that ally leaves play, Recall me.
flavourText: "Show 'em what you can do, quills!" - Yuumi

name: Quick Quill
flavourText: "W... h... e... r... e... s... N... o... r... r... a...? Oh dear, what should I tell it?" - Mouse steward

name: Bomber Twins
description: When I'm summoned, create a random landmark that costs 2 or less in hand.
flavourText: The Fussyfoot Bomberator-X did precisely what it was meant to do: sow chaos. Plus, it was easy to parallel park.

name: Shadowtech Walker
flavourText: Now you see him. Now you don't. And now you're dead.

name: Chief Nakotak
description: When an ally transforms, fully heal it and grant it +1|+1 and Impact.
flavourText: Chief Nakotak declared himself leader of the tribe after finding a large dinosaur bone in the snowdrifts surrounding their lands. None of the others were aware that dinosaur bones equated to tribe leadership, but also none of the others were really all that bothered. So Nakotak it was.

name: Gleaming Lantern
description: Each round, the first Fae you play costs 2 less.
flavourText: "Lantern follows Norra, moon moths follow Lantern, mouses follow moon moths! Follow, follow!"

name: Pokey Stick
description: Deal 1 to anything. Draw 1.
flavourText: The first rule of experimentation: poke it, and see what happens.

name: The Arsenal
description:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. 
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
flavourText: Wherever Ziggs went, Arnie followed, his serene demeanor a natural foil to Ziggs' chaotic zeal. His duties ranged from making sure the munitions were stocked, to putting out fires, to clapping his hands over Ziggs' ears when Ziggs (inevitably) forgot hearing protection.

name: Scholarly Climber
flavourText: "Yes, yes, you've told me all about how much she likes tea, socks, you, buttons, and collecting little bits and bobs, but you still haven't told me anything about what she LOOKS like!"

name: Tornado Warrior
description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 and a random keyword.
I keep these stat buffs and keywords when I'm Recalled.
flavourText: The Tornado maintains her calm with breathing exercises... and by channeling her inner turmoil into a vicious hurricane of deadly blades.

name: Fae Sprout
description: Manifest a Fae and grant it +1|+1.
flavourText: Every living thing requires sustenance. The fae are no different, though it can be hard to tell how exactly they use it.

name: Quicken
description: Recall a unit with 3 or less Power.
flavourText: "We are quick! We are the wind!" - Kennen

name: Trinket Trade
description: Manifest an Otterpus or one of 2 spells from your regions that cost 3 or less.
flavourText: "Unhand my sandwich this instant!" - Conchologist

name: Wallop
description: Deal 1 to an enemy and Stun it.
flavourText: "Ahanga!" - Gnar

name: Heroic Charge
description: An ally strikes an enemy. If it survives, Stun it.
flavourText: "Move it!" - Poppy

name: Bilgerat Rascal
description: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha Yordle and grant it SpellShield.
flavourText: "Turn it down, will ya?! I can barely hear myself counting all this money!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin

name: Blastcone Seedling
description: Play: Give me Barrier this round or grant me Impact.
flavourText: The Blastcone Seedlings are shy creatures, and while they will retreat first and foremost, if threatened...

name: Double Tap
description: An ally strikes an enemy. If the ally is multi-region, it strikes the enemy again.
flavourText: "The Acorn M1-85: a fully-automatic, oak caliber rifle with a bandlewood scope, and a purpleberry finish. Yeah, mama's cookin' up something good tonight!" - Bandle Commando

name: Squeaker
description: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha Yordle.
flavourText: Small stature, BIG personality.

name: Geode Mechaforcer
description: Support: Give my supported ally SpellShield and +2|+2 this round.
flavourText: Powered by gems mined from the caves beneath Bandle City, the Mechaforcer emits a defensive shield that can withstand even the strongest of weapons. It's pretty to look at too.

name: Babbling Balladeers
description: When I'm summoned, create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
flavourText:
"This is a song
About Poppy the strong!
Poppy the mightiest, frightiest... sprong!" 
- Scratched-out lyrics from the 'Songbook of Reginaldactyl and Faltimisquee, Bards Extraordinaire'

name: Smash & Dash
description: When I'm summoned, grant me 2 Impact.
flavourText:
"I didn't choose the smash life, the smash life chose ME!"
- Post-match interview

name: Bandle City Mayor
description:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
Play: Manifest a multi-region follower.
flavourText: It's unclear whether Bandle City ever really elected a mayor, but an enormous mustache would almost certainly be a prerequisite.

name: Yordles in Arms
description: Give allies +2|+2 this round. If you've played cards from 4+ regions, give allies +3|+3 instead.
flavourText: "We... look so cool right now." - Tristana

name: Tiny Shield
description: Grant an ally +0|+1.
flavourText: "I found it! But you can use it!!" - Yordle Squire

name: Tiny Spear
description: Grant an ally +1|+0.
flavourText: "A small spear is still a spear." - Yordle saying, probably

name: Transposition
description: Recall an ally. The next ally you play this round with equal or less cost, costs 0 instead.
flavourText: "Speed of body, speed of mind!" - Kennen

name: Hothead
description: Attack: Grant the top champion in your deck +1|+1 and a random keyword.
flavourText: Otto's summer barbecues had something of a reputation. While enthusiastic about grilling, he left his guests few choices for the steaks other than "well done" or "extremely well done".

name: Keeper's Verdict
description: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck.
flavourText: "And don't come back!" - Poppy

name: Blastcone Seedling
description: Play: Give me Barrier this round.
flavourText: ... some will stand their ground!

name: Blastcone Seedling
description: Play: Grant me Impact.
flavourText: ... some will attack!

name: Treasured Trash
description: Fill your hand with random cards. They cost 0 and areFleeting. You can only play 3 more cards this round.
flavourText: One mortal's trash is another yordle's giant pile of scrap parts.

name: Trumpetecher
description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+1.
flavourText: The mechs and yordles were bruised, battered, beaten. Then a clarion call sounded, granting them new steam, new life: Doot doot!

name: Benemone
description: When I'm summoned, create 2 Pranks in hand.
flavourText:
"Those who are prone to nausea should approach this gentle giant with EXTREME caution. Your insides will thank you... On a related note, I really shouldn't have eaten that second mushroom sandwich..." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 3

name: Bouncing Bomb
description: Deal 2 to a unit.
flavourText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs

name: Bouncing Bomb
description: Deal 1 to two enemies.
flavourText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs

name: Darkbulb Acolyte
description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
flavourText: "Yes, I'm quite sure the fellow up on the roof has many stories to tell. We all know he has lots to say. We just don't have any idea exactly WHAT it is he's saying." - Stilted Robemaker

name: Mini-Minitee
flavourText: Oh, the wee minitee!

name: Terrordactyl
description: Round Start: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Once enraged, the Terrordactyls tear erratically through the skies, leaving mayhem and enraptured yordles in their colorful wake.

name: Bandle Painter
description: Play: Discard 1 to create a multi-region follower in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
flavourText: "Painting's not about copying what you see, it's about expressing how YOU see the world. And right now, I'm seeing that you moved again. Hold still please!"

name: Yordle Smith
description: Attack: Give all allies with equal or less Power than me Quick Attack this round.
flavourText: "Poppy never listens t'me, so you better: It's not about the hammer, it's about the yordle who swings it."

name: Loping Telescope
description: Play: Manifest a Celestial that costs 3 or less, Epic, or multi-region follower.
flavourText: The strangest part wasn't that the telescope got up, stretched, and started walking around, but that it insisted on dressing for the weather, so it had to find a suitably comfortable scarf.

name: Lightning Rush
description: Recall an ally to deal 2 to anything.
flavourText: "First the crack, then the boom!" - Kennen

name: Lecturing Yordle
description: Attack: Create a Fleeting Poison Dart in hand.
flavourText: Don't get him started.

name: Stilted Robemaker
description: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of your Darkness everywhere by 1.
flavourText:
"It is important, when assembling one's cabal, that each maniacal member brings something unique to the supervillain table. One of my fellows, for instance, has a lethal sense of style..."
- Excerpt from Ch. 4 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar

name: Yordle Explorer
description: When you summon another Yordle, grant it +1|+0.
flavourText: "Priceless is the glory of exploration, but the greatest discoveries are always... ahem... profitable."

name: Grandfather Fae
description:
When I'm summoned, create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
When you summon another Fae, grant it +1|+0.
flavourText:
"Gather 'round, hear what I say,
The sad tale of Grandfather Fae.
Each day he'd feed the hungry birds,
An odd mixture of seed and curds..."
- Bandle City Tall Tale

name: Curious Shellfolk
description: When you pick a non-champion card from randomly selected options, create a copy in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
flavourText: Famously shy, the elusive shellfolk are known to hide in their shells until their curiosity gets the better of them. Once emerged, their playful personalities become fully engaged, including a propensity to play tricks by expertly mimicking the sound of other sea life.

name: Murkwolf Shaman
description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Murkwolf Rager.
flavourText: "We do not die as cowards! Instead, we fall with claws drawn and teeth bared. In doing so, we honor The Wolf." - Hyara Allseer

name: Murkwolf Rager
description: When I transform, draw a unit.
flavourText: A shaman of the Murkwolf never truly dies alone. In death, they are joined by the spirits of other fallen shaman and begin their journey through the Great Beyond as a new pack.

name: Mammoth Shaman
description: Round End: If you've damaged the enemy Nexus this round, transform me into Mammoth Rager.
flavourText: When faced with predators, mammoth herds will surround their young calves and pregnant cows. And so the shamans of the great mammoth spirit call not just upon their spirit's physical strength but also upon the strength of unity with which it protects its family.

name: Mammoth Rager
description: Round Start: Grant me +2|+2.
flavourText: Few Freljodian beasts are as fearsome as a mammoth protecting its herd.

name: Udyr
description: When I'm summoned or strike: Create a Stance Swap in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost to 0.
flavourText: "The Spirits shape our world just as we and our world shapes the Spirits. By drawing power from them we take power from within ourselves."

name: Udyr's Spirits Unleashed
description:
Grant allies everywhere +1|+1. Then deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
Create an Udyr in your deck.
flavourText:
"Ancient ones, bolster our strength against the encroaching cold, and drive away our foes with storms of wind and ice. For we have not forgotten you or the honors you are due."
- Murkwolf Shaman's Benediction

name: Udyr
description:
When I'm summoned or strike: Create a Stance Swap in hand or, if you have one, reduce its cost to 0. 
I have +1|+1 for each stance you've played this game.
flavourText: "We are united as one, heart and Spirit! Together, we will drive our foes into the cold, eternal night!"

name: Shaman's Call
description: Create 2 Fleeting 0 cost Stance Swaps in hand.
flavourText: "You will see them... great Spirits of teeth and claw, scale and feather. And in that moment, you will tremble in fear and awe, and you will know that the Old Gods have not forgotten us." - Hyara Allseer

name: Hyara Allseer
description:
When I'm summoned, create a Stance Swap in hand. 
The first Stance Swap you play each round costs 0.
flavourText: Revered by all, the great shaman, Hyara Allseer, lost her sight long ago and now sees through the eyes of the hawks and eagles that nest on her mountaintop home. Now, troublesome tidings have brought her down from the mountain... she hopes the omens remain but mere visions.

name: Wrath of the Freljord
description:
Play:Frostbite an enemy.
Enemies with 3 or less Power can't block.
flavourText: "I was there, years ago... first came the cold, biting and unrelenting. Then a storm, angry and uncaring. Last came a roar, so sharp it cut me to the bone. I fell to my knees and prayed we hadn't made a grave mistake. To call upon a great spirit is to ask for its vengeance... and its mercy." - Hyara Allseer

name: Stance Swap
description: Grant a Stance to an ally.
flavourText: "Spirits, I call upon you!" - Udyr

name: Ram Stance
description: Pick an ally. Deal 1 to EVERYTHING else.
flavourText: "Against the freezing night you warm us. Against our foes you bring protective flame...  Spirit of fire, AID US!" - Udyr

name: Wildclaw Stance
description: Grant an ally +2|+0 and Overwhelm.
flavourText: "Claws and TEETH!" - Udyr

name: Boar Stance
description: Grant an ally +0|+2 and Regeneration.
flavourText: "It is not the absence of pain I seek. It is the tenacity to fight through it." - Hyara Allseer

name: Bear Stance
description: Grant an ally +2|+2.
flavourText: "The Great Bear is indomitable, and in taking it's blessing, we shall know no fear... or mercy." - Hyara Allseer

name: Inner Beast
description: Give an ally +1|+1 this round. Create a Stance Swap in hand.
flavourText: "Gather, spirits, gather..." - Udyr

name: Tusk Speaker
description: Play: Deal 1 to ALL Nexuses.
flavourText: Few shaman families have served the Winter's Claw tribe as long as Chuluun's. As a shaman of great walrus, he heralds and portends the sea's bounty... and its dangers.

name: Spirits Unleashed
description: Grant allies everywhere +1|+1. Then deal 1 to EVERYTHING.
flavourText:
"Ancient ones, bolster our strength against the encroaching cold, and drive away our foes with storms of wind and ice. For we have not forgotten you or the honors you are due."
- Murkwolf Shaman's Prayer

name: Bone Scryer
description: When I survive damage, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
