flavourText: Few scry the future as well as the shamans serving the Elk of Bones. Fewer still can stomach seeing the looming death of any who come seeking their foresight.

name: Vulpine Wanderer
description: When I'm summoned, create a Stance Swap in hand.
flavourText: "Eager and cautious. Quick and quiet. The way of the fox is the joy of seeing but not being seen. In travel and war, a wise leader honors those who follow the fox spirit. For no battle is won without pathfinders and scouts." - Scarmother Vrynna

name: Dance of Tusks
description: Deal 1 to ALL Nexuses.
flavourText: "Many songs can touch your heart. My songs shake the heavens." - Chuluun

name: Pathless Ancient
description: I cost 2 less for each unit you've Recalled this round.
flavourText:
"Himon'she, it is an honor to travel with you. The others tell me you are wise beyond measure. Where are we heading?"
"Oh dear. I was following you!" - Ahri and the Pathless Ancient

name: Ahri
description: Attack: The first time I attack strike, swap me with the ally to my right, then Recall it.
flavourText: She searched for herself in other peoples' secrets. Saw herself through the eyes of so many. As she approached the forest, she wondered if it would be just another lens--or if, just this once, she'd found a mirror.

name: Ahri
description:
When you Recall an ally, reduce its cost by 1.
Attack: Each time I attack strike, swap me with the ally to my right, then Recall it.
flavourText: "I can remember a thousand memories I've never had. From now on, I'll make my own." - Ahri

name: Ahri's Charm
description:
Recall an ally to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create an Ahri in your deck.
flavourText: "Tell me a secret." - Ahri

name: Charm
description: Recall an ally to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavourText: "Tell me a secret." - Ahri

name: Windsinger
description: Play: Recall a unit.
flavourText: Chaos gives claws to the meek. A wolf hounds its prey and is stalled by a felled branch. A hawk dives and tumbles amidst a sudden gale. We are the branch. We are the wind.

name: Gust
description: Recall a unit.
flavourText: The wind moves all, in its own time.

name: Sai'nen Thousand-Tailed
description: When I'm summoned, draw 2 and give other allies +1|+1 this round.
flavourText: The forest offers its secrets freely... but few bear the courage to ask questions of it.

name: God-Willow Seedling
description:
Play: Recall an ally to summon an Ephemeral copy of it.
Countdown 3: Summon another Ephemeral copy of it.
flavourText: Once, the God-Willow grew within Omikayalan. What springs forth from that place now may be stronger, may be weaker. What matters is that it is new.

name: Children of the Forest
description: Recall an ally, or spend 8 mana to summon Ephemeral copies of the 3 strongest followers you've Recalled this game.
flavourText: Memories have fangs.

name: Children of the Forest
description: Recall an ally.
flavourText: Memories have fangs.

name: Children of the Forest
description: Summon Ephemeral copies of the 3 strongest followers you've Recalled this game.
flavourText: Memories have fangs.

name: Woodland Keeper
description: When I’m summoned, give me +1|+0 and Elusive this round.
flavourText: "They say you don't speak to save others from the weight of your knowledge. Hmm... I bet you just got tired of answering questions." - Ahri

name: Tail-Cloak Matriarch
description: Each round, the first time you Recall a follower, summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
flavourText: Mystery is a greater thing than its conclusion.

name: The Mourned
description: Nexus Strike: Recall me.
flavourText: If one is to venerate the hunt, one must pause to weep for the hunted.

name: Nine Lives
description: Summon a Liminal Guardian.
flavourText: The forest needed a guardian, someone who could stand sentry at its borders for years, maybe centuries, without moving. Gai'sh was an eager volunteer and promptly proved his dedication with a ten-year nap.

name: Liminal Guardian
description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower from your regions.
When I'm Recalled, transform me into Nine Lives.
flavourText: "My best quality? I sleep like a rock."

name: Memory's Cloak
description: Pick an ally being targeted by enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills with only 1 allied target. Stop them.
flavourText: An arrow knows neither the intent of the hunter, nor the worth of its prey.

name: Xerath
description: When you destroy an allied landmark, deal 1 to the weakest enemy.
flavourText:
"The two were once friends, but time and affinity made them into brothers. Certainly Azir could not have achieved all that he was able without Xerath by his side." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane
description:
Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
Create a Xerath in your deck.
flavourText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath

name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane
description: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavourText: "Pitiful." - Xerath

name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane
description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
flavourText: "Pitiful." - Xerath

name: Xerath
description: When you destroy an allied landmark, deal 3 to the weakest enemy.
flavourText:
"If only Xerath had known that Azir planned to free him of his bondage, it might have prevented Shurima's demise... but some part of a mortal's humanity is lost when they Ascend, and any forgiveness or leniency was quickly erased from Xerath's mind." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Xerath
description:
When you destroy an allied landmark or Round Start: Deal 5 to the weakest enemy or the enemy Nexus if there are none.
If an enemy unit would die, Obliterate it instead.
flavourText:
"For years he sowed seeds of revenge, plotting against Azir in the dark of the Emperor's Tomb. Xerath would see a new Shurima made in his own image, gathering the acolytes who had studied his arcane magics to serve as his army. Now, he marches on Shurima just as Azir has revived it." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host

name: Herald of the Magus
description: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions everywhere +2|+2 and Overwhelm.
flavourText: The Herald spread her arms wide as she lifted her face to the sun, which hung bloody and red above Shurima. "Hail, the Magus Ascendant," she breathed beatifically, her voice echoing off the ring of ruined columns. "Hail, Xerath!"

name: Endless Devout
description: Last Breath: Summon a Sarcophagus.
flavourText: As richly appointed as the tomb was, it did little good for the banished and the dead.

name: Restored Devout
flavourText: Xerath's new army would make better use of the tomb's many artifacts, turning useless extravagance into a powerful conduit for the Magus Ascendant's magic.

name: Sarcophagus
description: Countdown 3 or when you destroy me: summon a Restored Devout.
flavourText: The Tomb of Emperors is no less lavish for serving as Xerath's prison. Indeed, the beauty of the place and its trappings is nothing if not a reminder of the inhabitants' fall from grace - a gilded prison.

name: Desert Duel
description: Give an enemy -2|-0 this round. An ally and that enemy strike each other.
flavourText: "A traveler who does not fear the desert, does not know the desert." - Shuriman adage

name: Obelisk of Power
description: Countdown 3 or when I'm summoned or you destroy me: Grant the strongest ally +2|+0.
flavourText: Sparking, crackling pillars rose from the sands, subverted places of power that would reinforce Xerath's already powerful army.

name: Ruinous Acolyte
description: Play: Destroy an allied landmark to grant allied Ruinous Acolytes everywhere +1|+1.
flavourText: All of Xerath's acolytes gave something of themselves in exchange for power, but his most powerful devotees were hardly more than husks of their former selves, serving as both conduit and power source for their new emperor's energy.

name: Servitude of Desolation
description: Summon a Stasis Statue to store all allied units and landmarks that died or were destroyed this round inside.
flavourText: Magical energy does not dissipate. It is merely repurposed.

name: Risen Altar
description: Countdown 3 or when you destroy me: Summon a Dami'yin the Unbound.
flavourText: "At each place of power shall an obelisk be raised, an instrument through which the Magus Ascendant may draw the power from beneath the sands." - Herald of the Magus

name: Dami'yin the Unbound
flavourText: "At each place of power shall we draw forth the magical energy of the land, and in so doing, bolster our great emperor's armies!" - Herald of the Magus

name: Construct of Desolation
description: Create a Ruinous Acolyte or an Obelisk of Power in hand.
flavourText: "I will fashion Shurima in MY image." - Xerath

name: Sandseer
description: When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
flavourText: The horizon before her sang with energy. Where others saw sand and silt, she saw the ley lines, blinding lattices of pure energy that were hers for the taking.

name: Unleashed Energy
description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round or destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
flavourText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath

name: Unleashed Energy
description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round.
flavourText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath

name: Unleashed Energy
description: Destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
flavourText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath

name: Waste Walker
description: When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me +1|+1.
flavourText: The acolytes had been accomplished before they sought out Xerath. Now that they had studied what he had once studied himself, they were unstoppable.

name: Rite of the Arcane
description: Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavourText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath

name: Rite of the Arcane
description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
flavourText: "Pitiful." - Xerath

name: Rite of the Arcane
description: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavourText: "Pitiful." - Xerath

name: Lost Soul
description: When I'm summoned or discarded, create a Twinblade Revenant in hand.
flavourText: The Demacians crawled to their ramparts to find death itself descending upon their walls. Though they were able to fell some of the Gray Legion, the dark tide of war soon proved unstoppable.

name: Reborn Grenadier
description:
To play, discard 1.
When I'm discarded, summon an exact copy of me.
flavourText:
"We have an irregularity in our midst. Though most of those we revive abhor their return to life, this fellow seems to both understand his lot, and revels in the subsequent opportunities. Curious."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger

name: Risen Reckoner
description: When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
flavourText:
"It was the good Lady's suggestion that finally woke the creature. A small dose of iodine salt into the bloodstream, lethal to any mortal, but simply agonizing to our patient. To the risen, there is no greater motivator than pain."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger

name: Ancient Warmonger
description: When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally +2|+0.
flavourText: As Lady Noradi's powers grew, she pondered whether her powers would take root in the corpses lining Noxus's oldest tombs. She found the light of life a mere flicker in the husks, but from those wilting flames, the shadows of war still danced.

name: Sion
description:
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
I have +1|+0 for each card you've discarded this game (Max +7|+0).
flavourText: Sion glimpsed fleeting flashes of opaque memories. Legions standing before him. Accolades. Crowns. War. A king's deathrattle. The Great Nothing. Blood. But just as soon as they floated by, they floated past, pale ribbons in the wind.

name: Salt And Stitches
description:
To play, discard a card.
Summon a Reborn Grenadier and give it +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: "Rise again, my child..." - Dr. Esslanger, Pensive Physician

name: Fallen Reckoner
description:
When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
Last Breath: Create a Risen Reckoner in hand.
flavourText:
"The first minotaurs I revived were docile, useless beasts. Neither the thrum of war nor the threat of death could stir their senses."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger

name: For Glory!
description: Reputation: I cost 3 less.  Summon 2 Trifarian Gloryseekers.
flavourText: Those seeking glory will stop at nothing to find it.

name: Fallen Rider
description: When I'm discarded, create a Risen Rider in hand.
flavourText:
"It was only after rubbing the rider's armor with Blackshade leaves that they were spared from the basilisk's viciousness. The plants are native to the hinterlands, just as the beasts, and are as pungent as they are poisonous."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger

name: Risen Rider
flavourText: "Upon the night, death rode." - The Lady of Blood

name: Sion Returned
description: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavourText:
"Though the fog lingers as we first wake Sion, the full spectrum of war stirs a life within him that is both furious and reluctant to end."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger

name: Sion
description:
Last Breath: Summon Sion Returned. 
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
flavourText: Through the din of battle, he remembered. He remembered his life, a proud servant of Noxus. A revered general who gave his life felling Demacia's king. He remembered his death, and the empty expanse that followed. His was a good life, and a good death. But this... this was madness.

name: Sion's Roar of the Slayer
description:
To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
Create a Sion in your deck.
flavourText: "Ally, enemy... I don't care." - Sion

name: Roar of the Slayer
description: To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
flavourText: "Ally, enemy... I don't care." - Sion

name: Weapons of the Lost
description: Deal 3 to a unit and summon a Trifarian Shieldbreaker.
flavourText: "Shieldbreaker!" - Sion

name: Twinblade Revenant
description: Last Breath: Create a Lost Soul in hand.
flavourText:
"The Demacians palpably lost their will to fight upon seeing our fallen--who were so selflessly cut down by those brave Vanguard--rise once more. Victory was never in question."
- Excerpt from the Lady of Blood's field report, recipient unknown

name: Grave Physician
description: Play: Discard 1 to draw a unit.
flavourText: Dr. Esslanger was once a respected and retiring physician who garnered his credible reputation through years of hard work. But it wasn't until a young noblewoman was brought to his study, her blood blackened by betrayal, that he truly began serving Noxus.

name: The Lady of Blood
description: When a non-Fleeting ally in hand is discarded, create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
flavourText: Under cover of night, Lady Faris Noradi led her Gray Legion out of the Noxian capital. It took three hard, bloody weeks, but they finally neared the small Demacian outpost her scouts had identified. It was time for the demonstration.

name: Noble Rebel
description: Grant me +2|+1 once you've discarded 3+ cards this game.
flavourText: "What could better instill loyalty in a would-be traitor than the sight of a butchered conspirator, brought back to fight under the Noxian banner? They will all serve, one way or another." - The Lady of Blood

name: Nami
description: When you play a spell, grant +1|+0 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
flavourText:
"Have you said your goodbyes, young Tidecaller?"
"Yes, greatmother."
"Are you afraid?"
"...Yes, greatmother."
"Good. To be afraid is to be cautious. But trust yourself, as we trust you. Now, go. And may the currents keep you."

name: Nami's Ebb
description:
Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
Create a Nami in your deck.
flavourText: "Heed the tide's temper..." - Nami

name: Nami
description: When you play a spell, grant +2|+1 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
flavourText:
"Do you think she's far along in her journey?"
"We can only hope, Tama."
"I can see her now... Beautiful eyes glowing in the light of the moon, the shine of saltwater glistening on her scales."
"This burden... the fate of our people. It should not be hers alone."
"She is doing her part, as we are doing ours, Loto. All we can do is believe in her, and love her with all our hearts."

name: Ebb
description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
flavourText: "Heed the tide's temper..." - Nami

name: Flow
description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2, and create an Ebb and Flow in hand.
flavourText: "...And cherish the swell's calm." - Nami

name: Ebb and Flow
description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and heal an ally or your Nexus 2.
flavourText: "I decide what the tide will bring." - Nami

name: Journeying Sandhopper
flavourText: "Sure, a few of 'em hunt us, like they hunt everything. But y'know, most landwalkers I meet are just looking to enjoy their time in the big blue, same as us. We're all just people."

name: Abyssal Guard
description: When you play a spell, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavourText: "Many of our tribe find Loto somewhat unnerving. They see only a tireless fighter, and the distance in his troubled gaze. But I know what's truly in his heart--fear that he is not strong enough to save us... and extraordinary love." - Tama, Marai Songstress

name: Fleet Admiral Shelly
description: When you play 2 spells each round, grant other allies +1|+1.
flavourText: "LISTEN HERE, SOWDIER. I'LL HAVE YOU KNOW I HAVE OVA FWEE-HUNDWED CONFIRMED KWILLS AND I'M DA TOP ADMIWAL IN ALL DA MAWINE'S FORCES SO WHEN I SAY SWIM, YOU BETTA SWIM, OKAY? OKAY THANK YOU!"

name: Tidal Wave
description: Deal 1 to two different randomly targeted enemies and create a Crashing Wave in your deck.
flavourText: "Oceans spill forth!" - Nami

name: Crashing Wave
description: Deal 2 to four different randomly targeted enemies and create a Colossal Wave in your deck.
flavourText: "Roiling seas engulf them!" - Nami

name: Colossal Wave
description: Deal 4 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Rolling tides, heed my call!" - Nami

name: Avatar of the Tides
description:
If you would get a mana gem, instead refill your spell mana.
When you play a spell, create in hand a random spell that costs 3 or less and grant it Fleeting.
flavourText: To the Marai, the Leo'lei is a herald of great change. It is said each flourish of its graceful wings influences the flow of the tides.

name: Marai Warden
description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavourText: The Marai rarely desire to venture far from home. But Ai'la was born with curiosity in her heart--and though she is bound by duty to her tribe, she spends each waking moment dreaming of the day she can truly be free.

name: Marai Greatmother
description: When I'm summoned, create 5 random 6+ cost spells in your deck and lower their cost to 3.
flavourText: The Marai's ancestral home is protected by the celestial light of a moonstone. Every hundred years, its light begins to wane, and a new Tidecaller is tasked with finding another--for without it, the Marai people would be plunged into darkness, and fall prey to the horrors that lurk in the depths.

name: Marai Songstress
description: When I'm summoned, if you've played a spell this round, grant me Elusive.
flavourText:
"The ocean believes that the wave will return,
gives trust to the ebb, to the flow, to the churn.
So 'ere the wave crashes against the shore, 
the ocean delights in the crest's bold roar."
- A verse from 'Serenade for the Tidecaller'

name: Justice Rider
description: Whenever your opponent draws, plant 1 Flashbomb Trap in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavourText:
"Officer was witnessed pursuing suspect at a high speed into a trap of her own making. Following the arrest, officer proceeded to submit her own speeding citation and fine, claiming (somewhat dramatically) 'Justice is a two-way street.'" 
- Excerpt from a Warden beat report

name: Station Archivist
description: Play: Pick a spell in the top 5 cards of your deck and create an exact Fleeting copy in hand, then place those top 5 cards into your deck
flavourText: Detectives are nothing without leads. An archivist's job is to collect every scrap of intel and create new possibilities where none previously existed.

name: Assembly Line
description: Summon 2 Forge Workers.
flavourText: "Shift change!" - Forge Chief

name: Most Wanted
description: Pick a player to discard their lowest cost card to draw 3.
flavourText: "Everything has a cost." - Corina Veraza

name: Forge Worker
flavourText: "Yeah so I've been 'elping Jayce an' them lot 'tinker around with this new thing. Powerformative technology, we call it. Truth be told, Jayce said I'll be listed as co-inventor once the documentation's done! Them bigwigs know where the real smarts is, eh?"

name: Albus Ferros
description: When I'm summoned, draw Jayce. Attack: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus. For each 6+ cost spell you've played this game, increase it by 1.
flavourText:
"The magnanimous Albus Ferros has once again THRUST himself into the spotlight, dramatically outbidding Clans Cadwalder and Giopara for the rights to sponsor Jayce's Hexgate research. 'A fine day for Ferros is a fine day for Piltover', as the saying goes, and yesterday was a very fine day for Clan Ferros, indeed!"
- Excerpt from a sponsored spread in the Piltover Daily

name: Ferros' Dividend
description: Deal 3 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "First, the investment. Then, the dividend." - Albus Ferros

name: Shock Blast
description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another.
flavourText: "Firing!" - Jayce

name: Jayce
description: Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
flavourText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."

name: Jayce
description: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavourText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."

name: Jayce
description:
Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavourText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."

name: Jayce's Shock Blast
description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another. Create a Jayce in your deck.
flavourText: "Firing!" - Jayce

name: Jayce
flavourText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."

name: Jayce
flavourText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."

name: Jayce
description: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavourText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."

name: Acceleration Gate
description: Give your allies +2|+0 and Quick Attack this round. If they already have it or Double Attack, give them a random keyword instead.
flavourText: "Gate is a go." - Jayce

name: Sump Fumes
description: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, deal 3 to it instead.
flavourText: "Better let 'em air out a minute. Greenies can't take the smell. But lemme tells ya... once you're accustomed, nothin' like it!" - Puffcap Peddler

name: Piltover Peacemaker
description: Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavourText: "Here's MY calling card." - Caitlyn

name: Ambush
description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, give it Elusive this round.
flavourText: "We'll surround the location while using smokespinners to mask our movements..." - Caitlyn

name: Ferros Financier
description: Play: Manifest a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
flavourText:
"About the only good part of Ferros financing my work was getting to team up with Reggie. Not only is the man one of the most competent people I've ever worked with, he's a heck of a guy, too."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal

name: Advanced Intel
description:
Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
Draw 1.
flavourText: "On my signal." - Caitlyn

name: Corina, Mastermind
description: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck or activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavourText: Corina smiled as the Piltover Wardens burst down her door, as they trampled her precious flowers underfoot, as they sent up clouds of toxic pollen. All as planned.

name: Beguiling Blossom
description: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavourText: "Watch your step..." - Corina Veraza

name: Volatile Bloom
description: Play: Activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavourText: "Right where I want you." - Corina Veraza

name: Insider Knowledge
description: ALL players draw 2.
flavourText: "This a popular case, you know. Just had a chap in here earlier looking at it. Enjoy!" - Station Archivist

name: Flashbomb Trap
description: Deal 1 damage to a random ally.
flavourText: "Boom." - Caitlyn

name: The Forge Of Tomorrow
description: When I am summoned, summon a Forge Worker. When you play a 6+ cost spell, destroy me and refill your spell mana.
flavourText: If Piltover is a city driven by invention, then its forges are its engines.

name: Forge Chief
description: Strike: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavourText: "Takes two things to get an idea off the page and into your hands. Funding's one half of the equation, the other's a good forge. And it's not just the tools or the hardware in the forge; if your chief doesn't have what it takes to run things, well, your idea's staying on paper." - Jayce

name: Caitlyn
description: Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavourText: Caitlyn was always a dogged and thorough investigator, a quality that helped propel her fast through the ranks of Piltover enforcement. But when a case concerning a certain 'C' came along, one that countless other enforcers had abandoned, it seemed almost as though Caitlyn had finally met her match. Almost.

name: Officer Squad
description: When I’m summoned, create a Most Wanted in hand.
flavourText: From unloading silently into the street to prepping the ram, setup didn't take long. It was just a matter of waiting on Caitlyn's cue.

name: Sting Officer
description: Nexus Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavourText: Zayne Asako, like all Zaunite kids, had to grow up fast on those violent and dark understreets. After losing his brother to yet another senseless gang crime, he committed himself to Piltover enforcement, hoping reason and law would make his home finally safe.

name: Coup de Grace
description: Place an enemy follower into the enemy deck, then your opponent draws 1.
flavourText: The grand city of Piltover is home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra. Piltover's jails are also home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra.

name: Hextech Anomaly
description: When you draw or create me in hand or each Round Start: while I'm in hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
flavourText:
"...configuring hextech into a stable state was the most difficult hurdle I faced. Most nights, it felt like the crystals and hexite were actively conspiring to trip me up, and it was only through extensive trial and error that I was able to get the component parts working in harmony..."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal

name: Ferros Skycruiser
description: Grant me +2|+0 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavourText: "The people of this city worship at the feet of 'intelligence'. But what good is the greatest mind without the means to express itself? No. I will show Piltover true greatness. It will tower over them. It will blot out the sun. And it will carry my name." - Albus Ferros

name: Rocket Barrage
description: Deal 4 to an enemy and 1 to all other enemies.
flavourText: "They're supposed to go up, not EVERYWHERE! Oh, my!" - Heimerdinger

name: Stinky Whump
description: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in the enemy deck with 2 Poison Puffcaps attached.
flavourText: The stink of a whump in the height of puffcap season is unlike any other. Imagine an open sewer full of week-old fish and rotten eggs, and you're halfway there.

name: Caitlyn
description: Strike: Plant 4 Flashbomb Traps in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck and deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to the number of your traps activated this round.
flavourText: She burst in, leveled her rifle at the culprit, and looked down the scope. There, smiling through the looking glass, was a familiar face.

name: Caitlyn's Piltover Peacemaker
description:
Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
Create a Caitlyn in your deck.
flavourText: "Here's MY calling card." - Caitlyn

name: Hextech Handler
description: Grant Tech allies everywhere +1|+0 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavourText: The Hextech Handler was initially constructed to transport raw materials through Piltover, but as time went on, the locals apparently developed a soft spot for him. Jayce's forge crew nicknamed him Nugget, a Piltovan lord reportedly donated a hat, and passing kids now adorn him with whatever they have to hand.

name: Catalogue of Regrets
description: Round Start: Create in hand a Fleeting copy of a non-Fleeting spell you played last round.
flavourText: The Blessed Isles forget. The Shadow Isles remember. The Shadow Isles forget. The Blessed Isles remember.

name: Mistkeepers
description: Each round, the first time you kill a unit with a spell, summon an Ephemeral Mistwraith.
flavourText: The Black Mist traps its victims in endless cycles of self-imposed torment. Through the Mistcatchers, Tek and Kana give those souls a chance to break that cycle for themselves.

name: Senna
description: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast.
flavourText: "To be a Sentinel is to fight. To lose yourself or to lose the ones you love. But more than that? It means to live. For yourself... and for the ones you love."

name: Dawning Shadow
description: Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna

name: Watcher on the Isles
description: Each round, the first time you kill a unit with a spell, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Pups is pups." - Wisdom scrawled upon the soul

name: Solari Sentinel
description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
flavourText: "I can feel the sun no longer. Even so, I wield its memory--and that is enough."

name: Ixtali Sentinel
description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. When you play your next Darkness this round, copy it targeting the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "You asked me, Senna, what brought me to this fight. I have lost nothing to the Mist, it does not threaten my home. It exists, and it should not. I am here to discover why. Do I need sentiment to join your cause?"

name: Piercing Darkness
description: Drain 5 from a unit.
flavourText: "Death is drawn to life." - Senna

name: Darkness
description: Deal 2 to an enemy.
flavourText: There is a little of fear in everything. It lays quietly at the heart of mystery. It is the spark of joy in awe and wonder. It grants life its purpose - death, its power. It is everything. It is nothing.

name: Dess & Ada
description: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your next Darkness this round costs 0 and gains “I deal damage to all enemy targets.”
flavourText:
"Another nightmare?"
"Wasn't all bad. You weren't there."
"Dolt. What was the bad part?"
"You weren't there."

name: Senna
description: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast and cost 1 less.
flavourText: "We were wrong. The Black Mist isn't heartless. It's not random. It has a goal. But that means we can track it. Means it can bleed."

name: Senna's Dawning Shadow
description:
Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
Create a Senna in your deck.
flavourText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna

name: Burgeoning Sentinel
description: The first time you kill a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
flavourText: What must the Mist see when it looks upon Maeve? Exuberance, confidence--irrepressible optimism. How it must long to snuff that taunting flame. For what can death fear, but life?

name: Buhru Sentinel
description: The first time you kill a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
flavourText: The Buhru and Sentinel philosophy align on a single crucial point: all things must end, and some must be made to end.

name: Camphor, the Doubt
description: When I'm summoned, if you've targeted allies in 4 different rounds, grant me Spellshield, Overwhelm, and Challenger.
flavourText: For centuries, the demon Camphor stalked the lands of Targon, pulling from her victims the very strengths that defined them. From the mighty, she would take strength; from the wise, wisdom. But she had no interest in these boons. Instead, she feasted on the suffering, doubt, and misery she inflicted. Camphor was a monster in every sense of the word.

name: Wounded Whiteflame
flavourText: "Targonians need no further proof of the gods' cruelty. Look at what they have done to us. Look at what they have done to our most cherished companions." - Pantheon

name: Shield Vault
description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
flavourText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.

name: Celestial Wonder
description: Stun two enemies.
flavourText: "Targon's night sky is a wondrous thing of unimaginable beauty. It is all too easy to lose oneself gazing at that expanse, not knowing how far the stars stretch, and what manner of being might be looking back..." - Targonian climber

name: Pantheon
flavourText: Here stands Atreus, who had his freedoms stripped from him by the very Aspects he revered. Here stands the embers of War, who left Atreus with gifts few mortals can comprehend. Here stands a man, ready to fight and die for those he cherishes.

name: Iula
description: Play: Grant an ally Spellshield or Overwhelm. If you don't, grant it to me.
flavourText: Iula still remembers the burning grief that coursed through her after she learned of her husband's death. When Pantheon came to her, asking if she would help him destroy a creature that feasted on this very pain, her answer was swift.

name: Iula
description: Play: Grant an ally Overwhelm. If you don't, grant it to me.

name: Iula
description: Play: Grant an ally Spellshield. If you don't, grant it to me.

name: Battle Bonds
description: Grant 2 allies +2|+2.
flavourText: Warring against the gods seemed a fool's errand, but through the scars and through the screams, those brave few learned lessons. The gods thought singularly, selfishly, and had lost the gift of camaraderie. This would be their weapon. This would be their armor.

name: Pantheon
description: Once a Pantheon has leveled up, grant me a random keyword for each round you've targeted allies this game.
flavourText: Here stands Pantheon, who took up his spear and swore to drive all gods and demons from this land we call home.

name: Pantheon's Shield Vault
description:
Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
Create a Pantheon in your deck.
flavourText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.

name: Blinded Mystic
description: Play: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Silence an enemy follower.
flavourText: Eshiyme was once a revered oracle who used her Sight to guide those in need. But this gift was stolen from her by Camphor, who intended to feast on her inevitable anguish. How sorely the demon underestimated brave Eshiyme.

name: We Stand Together
description: Give 2 allies +1|+2 this round.
flavourText: "It is in the bonds of kinship that we must find our strength." - Pantheon

name: Freed Colossus
description: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Gem in hand.
flavourText: The colossi are ancient and venerated protectors of Targon's most revered sites. To harm them is to insult the mountain itself. To torture them is a crime no Targonian can forgive.

name: Against the Odds
description: If your opponent has more units than you, grant an ally +1|+1 for each extra unit they have.
flavourText: These brave few knew they were stepping into warfare with beings of unimaginable power. They knew death was likely. But still, they stepped.

name: Saga Seeker
flavourText: Tor felt his life fading with every heartbeat, but in that grave and looming darkness, where he was expected to embrace dread, he instead found purpose. He would not only face death willingly, but would bring with him the very demon who had dared to cut his life short. This is how he would be remembered. This would be Tor's saga.

name: Gorlith the Unscalable
description:
When I'm summoned, swap my Health and your Nexus' Health. 
I can't be blocked by enemies with less Health than me.
flavourText:
"An honorable tribute to those gone, but never forgotten: When the people of Demacia see the sun's rays shining off his form, they will know hope, and the indomitable spirit that inspired his construction will live on through him." 
- Durand workshop plaque

name: Galio
description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3.
flavourText: For many years after his creation, Galio lay dormant, unfeeling, unknowing. It wasn't until magic brought him to life and he experienced the resulting thrill of battle that he knew the joy of being among the living. Now, when he slept, he missed such wonderful things!

name: Galio's Shield of Durand
description: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next Round Start, grant it +0|+2. Create a Galio in your deck.
flavourText: Even the sight of Galio is enough to inspire the noble hearts of Demacians.

name: Galio
description:
When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3. 
Each round, the first time an ally takes damage, Rally.
flavourText: When he awoke, Galio was overjoyed to find a whole family had been crafted for him, a facsimile of the same family that would carry on the legacy of his maker for years to come. They were just like him - they wouldn't break.

name: Shield of Durand
description: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next Round Start, grant it +0|+2.
flavourText: Even the sight of Galio is enough to inspire the noble hearts of Demacians.

name: Might of the Vanguard
description: To play, spend all of your mana. Summon a Dauntless Vanguard and grow its stats to that amount. If 9+ mana was spent, grant other Elite allies +2|+2.
flavourText: When it seems all hope is lost, the soldiers of Demacia look to the Vanguard.

name: Winds of War
description: Fully heal an ally. Then, that ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavourText: "Let's crack on, then!" - Galio

name: Durand Sculptor
description: When you summon another ally, grant it +0|+1.
flavourText: "It may not be evident to the untrained, but the work of a great artist is in one chip of the chisel to the next."

name: Petricite Stag
description: Support: I take all damage for my supported ally this round.
flavourText: Following the stag-mounted Ranger's lead, the petricite guardian dwarfed the very creature that had inspired its elegant design.

name: Mountain Drake
description: Fury grants me +0|+2 instead of +1|+1.
flavourText: The placid mountain drakes are slow to anger despite their appearance, and their stoicism around other mountain beasts makes them natural protectors of otherwise vulnerable flocks.

name: Durand Architect
description: Support: Give my supported ally +0|+2 and Formidable this round.
flavourText: "The Ranger Elmheart has brought us grim news," the architect said calmly, focusing on rerolling the parchment to hide how his hands shook. He turned to the waiting sculptors and gave them a stiff nod. "It seems the time has come for Demacia's unseen protectors to come out of hiding."

name: Durand Protege
description: Play: Grant an ally +0|+1 and Tough.
flavourText: Shireen looked up from her work at the sound of pounding hoofbeats. The ranger's haste left her uneasy, but curious. She urged her petricite bird to take flight, and followed in the ranger's wake.

name: Petricite Broadwing
description: When you summon another ally, grant me Challenger.
flavourText: As the Broadwing passed overhead, the battered Demacian soldiers below let out a cheer, inspired by its enduring form.

name: Petricite Hound
flavourText: "It's always a joy to see them come to life. You forget how distinct each is, their personalities reflections of the artist who made them." - Durand Sculptor

name: Lord Broadmane
description:
Play: Deal 2 to an enemy.
Your Fast spells, Slow spells, and Skills have "When I damage a Stunned or damaged enemy, kill it."
flavourText: "Act Two: A duplicitous lord with little to his name but a pilfered Kashuri gauntlet charms an audience of Ionians. However, his mask is crude, and easily seen through. He begs for his life, claiming ignorance. The iron hand he sought to rule with lies empty."

name: Strategic Execution
description: Stun 2 enemies or spend 6 mana to summon a Legion General.
flavourText: Assignment is one of the first great decisions that lies before every battle. A good commander knows that the key to victory...

name: Strategic Execution
description: Summon a Legion General.
flavourText: ... is a good offense.

name: Strategic Execution
description: Stun 2 enemies.
flavourText: ... is a good defense.

name: Annie
description: Attack: I deal 2 to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, I deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: Over a decade ago, Amoline Kiosar fled the Ravenbloom Conservatory with an invaluable and incandescent asset in her control. Ravenbloom's scouts searched for her in every corner of the empire, but none of the rumors they heard led them to Amoline. And so, years later, when news arrived of a lost girl burning with rage in the northern Ironspike Mountains, Fynn Retrick reluctantly gathered his things and left to investigate. He expected to find nothing. How wrong he was.

name: Annie's Disintegrate
description:
Pick a unit. The next time it takes 1 or more damage this round, kill it.
Create an Annie in your deck.
flavourText: Headmistress Telsi spoke at length about the Noxian tenets, leaving the children before her increasingly bored and restless. But, while most students largely contained their outbursts, Annie acted. First with smoke, then with fire.

name: Molten Shield
description: Deal 2 to Annie's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: "Do you wanna play, too?" - Annie

name: Annie
description: Attack: I deal 3 to my blocker and Stun it. If it's dead or gone, I deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText:
"I've found her. She's Amoline's, no doubt. Same eyes, same giggle. I'll bring her back within the fortnight. Having spoken to the girl, I ask that you be kind to her. I believe there's good in there, along with the dark."
- Excerpt of a letter from Fynn Retrick

name: Pyroclastic Arrival
description: Stun an enemy, then deal 2 to all Stunned or damaged enemies.
flavourText: "TIBBERS!" - Annie

name: Tibbers
description: Play: Stun an enemy, then deal 2 to all Stunned or damaged enemies.
flavourText: The demon Tybaulk had infested the minds of countless victims over the centuries. Slowly, inexorably, he would lead them to the fire, and watch his flames feast on scorched flesh. But in young Annie, Tybaulk found a will completely indomitable, and a talent for magic that rivaled even his own.

name: Molten Shield
description: Deal 3 and Stun Annie's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: "It'll be fun..." - Annie

name: The Gray Apothecary
description: When an ally with 5+ Power dies, create a random follower with 5+ Power in hand.
flavourText:
"Today I found myself thinking back to my small infirmary in Penrose Hill, and the years I spent there trying to unlock the secrets of physiology. Years! I've now been in Lady Noradi's employ for just a few short months, but I know now that I learned nothing. How simple I was. How fortunate."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger

name: Obedient Drakehound
description: When an ally attacks, I attack with it.
flavourText: "Drakehounds are a delight, aren't they? So eager to please. So malleable. If only my enemies held the same qualities." - Thorn of the Rose

name: Legion Deserter
description: I gain all allied everywhere buffs.
flavourText: "Act One: An ex-soldier, having abandoned his post following the theft of an ancient Kashuri artifact, hides at a Qayanvi bar, full of arrogance and too much drink. Little does he know, his stolen treasure whispers of all it sees to its true owner! His life pours away like so much wine, Noxian crimson on Ionian gold."

name: Spell Slinger
description: Play: Stun an enemy or if it's already Stunned deal 2 to it instead.
flavourText:
"Student: Sydell Kythera
Teacher: J. Willough
Report: I am spiderbit on left forearm. Sydell claims a misunderstanding, but his smirk belies his innocence. He is ordered to two weeks additional chores (refectory)."
- Ravenbloom discipline card

name: Trifarian Training Pits
description: Each round, the first time an ally with 5+ Power attacks, Rally.
flavourText: "At my command, you will fight! If you kill your sparring partner, find another! If you fall, then die knowing your death made Noxus stronger! Trifarian soldiers... begin!" - Trifarian Assessor

name: Ravenbloom Conservatory
description:
Countdown 11: Create a Tybaulk in hand.
I advance 1 round for each Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill you've played this game.
flavourText:
"...by now, word has no doubt reached you of the Roseguard Academy's dismal failure. I expect you will learn from your sister school's failings. I expect you will manage your facility in a manner that benefits the empire."
- A scorched letter found in the conservatory's rubble

name: Tybaulk
description: When I'm summoned, grant allies everywhere +1|+0 and for the rest of the game, all of your spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavourText:
"...it burns in me. This dark presence. It whispers to me. Fire. FIRE. In the flames, I see its eyes. Black and unblinking. Staring. Smiling. Urging me to step in. Urging me to join the rest. Silhouettes in the inferno. Reaching out. Come home. Come home."
- Remains of a decrepit Nockmirchian diary

name: Disintegrate
description: Pick a unit. The next time it takes 1 or more damage this round, kill it.
flavourText: Headmistress Telsi spoke at length about the Noxian tenets, leaving the children before her increasingly bored and restless. But, while most students largely contained their outbursts, Annie acted. First with smoke, then with fire.

name: Captive Yeti
description: Reputation: I cost 4 less.
flavourText: The crowd gasped as the two shackled yetis were brought into the Bordent's legendary fighting pit. No one thought the beasts strong enough to break their chains, because none of them had ever faced a yeti's might before.

name: Captive Greyback
description: Attack: I deal 3 damage to my blocker. If it's dead or gone, I deal 3 damage to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: "Act Three: A cruel keeper and her pet. The greyback is innocent even in grisly purpose - the artifact it bears forces subservience. The keeper refuses to scream as she is fed to her pet. If only all Noxians were so noble in their demise."

name: Obeyed Order
description: Deal 3 to Captive Greyback's blocker. If it's dead or gone, deal 3 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: "Let that be a lesson. Subjugators live only until the first revolt." - Jhin

name: Manasoul Student
description: Each round, the first time you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, I play Magic Embers.
flavourText: "First time I met Daani must've been a couple years ago. Lovely lad. Lovely family, too. Then, on my last trip, I stopped by his village and found poor Daani sat in the square, alone. Said he was waiting for his family to come home. Poor lad must've been sat there months. Didn't have the heart to tell him what I'd seen down the way..." - Fynn Retrick

name: Noxian Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting Sharpened Resolve, Whirling Death, or Weapons of the Lost in hand.
flavourText: "Clara darling, you have to clean the blood from the tokens." - Ophelia Noradi, Crimson Aristocrat

name: Magic Embers
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Whoa... I can SEE the magic!" - Manasoul Student

name: The Prefect
description: When you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, grant me +1|+0.
flavourText: "Many of the children are of an age where their natural inclinations lead them to rebel against formal direction. Fortunate, then, that the eldest of them is both favored by the rest, and malleable to our cause. If the students choose to ignore our lessons, then we will teach through her." - Headmistress Telsi

name: Stiffened Sinews
description: Stun an enemy or if it's already Stunned deal 2 to it instead.
flavourText: "Fang's turn..." - Spell Slinger

name: Kashuri Gauntlet
description: Deal 2 to an enemy.
flavourText: Fine tools are wasted on the unsophisticated craftsman.

name: Solari Stellacorn
description: Daybreak: Give other allies +0|+2 this round.
flavourText: Stellacorns are born of stars, with some burning hotter than others.

name: Consult the Heavens
description: Fully heal all allies, then grow their Power to equal their Health.
flavourText: "We must show ourselves compassion first of all. The rest will follow." - Soraka

name: Dragon Roost
description: Countdown 3: Summon Inviolus Vox.
flavourText: "It is said the celestial dragons are born from the nebulae themselves, springing forth fully formed from hazy cosmic dust. But how would we mere mortals know? From far away, all we see is their light." - Herald of Dragons

name: Celestial Trifecta
description: Invoke a low, medium, and high cost Celestial card.
flavourText: "The stars, they are foretelling great potential. Something is coming. What shape will they take? It is not for me to know! What do you think, Kulun?" - Moondreamer

name: Targonian Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting Behold the Infinite, Hush, or Blessing of Targon in hand.
flavourText: "It's the strangest thing, Shorin... Even without turning the stone over, I know exactly what constellation is painted on it." - Tyari the Traveler

name: Esmus, Breath of the World
description:
When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck.
Support: Grant my supported ally +1|+1.
flavourText:
"...but I heard Esmus was created by the Caretaker himself, and with her birth, sound came to the world!"
"I say lies! It is known that Esmus bears the face of an old singer who had the heart of an angel but the voice of the dead... until Bard himself granted her a voice of pure beauty!"
"I say lies! Esmus is..."
- An instance of the Birth of Esmus, a popular bard's game

name: The Winding Light
description: Nightfall: Give other allies +2|+1 and Overwhelm this round.
flavourText:
"Mother Moon, lend us your strength,
Though darkness surrounds us,
With your light, we shall overcome."
- Lunari prayer

name: Mystic Vortex
description: When I'm summoned or when I count down, plant 3 Chimes in your deck. Countdown 2: Draw 1.
flavourText: "Then I seen it--thousands of 'em, all singin' and dancin' this way and that-un. Next thing I know, I seen a flash o' light, and they’re all gone, the temple with 'em–not a stone to see. And in me hands? Well Old Gaff was left there holdin' a chime." - Old Gaff’s tale, part 3

name: Starhound Pack
description: My Fated buffs are granted to allied Starhound Packs everywhere.
flavourText: The starhounds could not be beckoned or persuaded by climbers on their journey. They were aloof, seemingly inured to the mountain's magics.

name: Mikhael's Blessing
description: Grant an ally +1|+2 and remove all negative keywords from it.
flavourText: Those that hear the bell ring are struck by the purity of its tone.

name: Evelynn
description:
Origin: Agony's Embrace.
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
flavourText: The priestess' pupils were blown wide, and her hand trembled with nervous excitement. She was ready. This was the single moment Evelynn craved more than any other. She grinned, and slowly shed her visage. Then, as always, the screaming began.

name: Breakneck Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Look me in the eye. Tell me I hurt you." - Solitude

name: Haunted Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Figured you were Vora's type..." - Sultur

name: Agony's Embrace
description: You may put any cards that summon Husks into your deck during deckbuilding.
flavourText: "I'll eat anything..." - Evelynn

name: Evelynn
description:
When you or an ally kill an allied Husk, give me its positive keywords this round.
Round End: Summon a random Husk. If fewer than 6 allies have died this game, transform me back into Evelynn.
flavourText: As Evelynn stalked Runeterra, she attracted the attentions of lesser demons, each hoping to destroy the Widowmaker and feast on her power. She butchered most, of course, but a few talented individuals caught her eye. Today, they live on, bound to their mistress, and when the mood strikes, Evelynn lets them out to play.

name: Warded Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Look at you. You are a pathetic, useless worm." - Domination

name: Fading Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Feed. FEED." - Vora

name: Thrashing Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Stings good, doesn't it?" - Steem

name: Scattered Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Oh, the look on your face!" - Solitude

name: Desperate Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Not enough! More." - Vora

name: Enraged Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "I wore you out? Already? Shame." - Evelynn

name: Hardy Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Told you it'd be a good time. Didn't say whose." - Sultur

name: Stubborn Husk
description: When you play an ally, kill me to grant it my stats and positive keywords.
flavourText: "Flesh. Bone. Screams. I want it all." - Vora

name: Evelynn's Last Caress
description:
Stop all enemy spells and skills targeting Evelynn and she strikes an enemy.
Create an Evelynn in your deck.
flavourText: "We're playing by my rules." - Evelynn

name: Bard
description:
Origin: The Wandering Caretaker.
Attack: Plant 3 Chimes in your deck.
flavourText: "Aye, Old Gaff's seen his share o' strange! First time was the Caretaker 'imself, I reckon. Like a star streamin' 'cross the sky, he was. Felt like the whole world stopped a minute, and it was just me 'n' him…" - Old Gaff’s tale, part 1

name: Bard's Traveler's Call
description:
Draw a follower, then activate the effects of all boons in the top 3 cards of your deck.
Create a Bard in your deck.
flavourText: Songs tell of Bard hiding chimes amongst the towns of Runeterra, said to raise spirits and inspire spontaneous bouts of joyful dance.

name: Bard
description:
Attack: Plant 6 Chimes in your deck.
When you activate a Chime, grant +1|+1 to a random ally in play.
flavourText:
"Sound the horn for the young and old
Sound it loud for all to behold. 
Kings bow down and sing their praise
To The Caretaker and his curious ways." - Runeterran Ballad

name: The Wandering Caretaker
description:
You may put any cards that plant Chimes into your deck during deckbuilding. 
Round Start: If you have 3+ mana gems, plant a Chime in your deck for each Bard that started the game in your deck.
flavourText: A mysterious traveler from beyond the cosmos, Bard is a being of harmony and balance, whose ear is attuned to the symphony of creation and the discord within. Surrounded by a choir of peculiar creatures, known as meeps, the Wandering Caretaker's curious works are celebrated in songs and stories across Runeterra.

name: Chime
description: Grant a random ally in hand +1|+1.
flavourText: On still windless nights, cast your eyes to the heavens and listen for the soft symphony of tinkling chimes. In that moment you will know that He is watching.

name: Jhin
description:
Origin: The Virtuoso. 
Attack: Deal 2 to all Stunned enemies.
flavourText: "Overture: We open on the city of Qayanvi, where an old master summons a young pupil. He is tasked with disposing a group of nefarious villains and recovering stolen sacred artifacts. The actor is keen, but he does not as yet take his place. For now he simply prepares, waiting in the wings."

name: Second Bounce
description: Deal 4 to a unit.
flavourText: "...then, the response." - Jhin

name: Jhin
description: Attack: Deal 4 to all Stunned enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "And then: the finale."

name: The Virtuoso
description:
If a Jhin started in your deck, for every 3 Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills you play while you Behold Jhin, play Lotus Trap.
You may put any follower that has a Skill into your deck during deckbuilding.
flavourText: "The gun, my instrument; the bullet, my song." - Jhin

name: Curtain Call
description: Deal 4 to all Stunned enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Your final scene begins." - Jhin

name: Deadly Flourish
description: Deal 2 to all Stunned enemies.
flavourText: "I like a violent composition." - Jhin

name: Lotus Trap
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. If Jhin is in play, Stun the weakest enemy.
flavourText: "Smile! Everyone is watching!" - Jhin

name: Jhin's Dancing Grenade
description:
Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Second Bounce in hand at the next Round Start.
Create a Jhin in your deck.
flavourText: "First, the call..." - Jhin

name: Dancing Grenade
description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Second Bounce in hand at the next Round Start.
flavourText: "First, the call..." - Jhin

name: Last Caress
description: Stop all enemy spells and skills targeting Evelynn and she strikes an enemy.
flavourText: "We're playing by my rules." - Evelynn

name: Traveler's Call
description: Draw a follower, then activate the effects of all boons in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavourText: Songs tell of Bard hiding chimes amongst the towns of Runeterra, said to raise spirits and inspire spontaneous bouts of joyful dance.

name: Frozen in Fear
description: Frostbite an enemy and summon a Rimefang Pack.
flavourText: With the cold, so too come the rimefangs, and they don't have to outpace their prey... merely outwait them.

name: Hunting Boar
description: Last Breath: Get an empty mana gem.
flavourText: The cycle of life and death looks different in the Freljord. The harsh environment ensures that little goes to waste.

name: Wings of the Cryophoenix
description:
Deal 3 to ALL units.
Enlightened: Instead, deal 3 to all enemies and heal your Nexus 3.
flavourText: In the shadow of the great Cryophoenix's wings, her followers rejoiced, and her enemies shuddered.

name: Harbinger of Thralls
description: Play: Summon a Frozen Thrall or advance all your Frozen Thralls 1 round.
flavourText: The strange, whistling cry of the creature overhead was barely audible, but as it rung off the ravine's stone walls, the scouts felt it vibrate along their bones. Before their very eyes, cracks rapidly formed along the surface of the ice, disproportionate and quick.

name: Wildclaw's Ferocity
description: Transform an allied follower into an Alpha Wildclaw.
flavourText: "Great wildclaw spirit, grant us your power!" - Udyr

name: Revna, the Lorekeeper
description: When I'm summoned, grant units in your deck my stats, then draw a unit with 5+ Power.
flavourText: Avarosan lorekeepers are often seasoned elders of the tribe, protectors of the people and seasoned storytellers. They keep the tradition of both the hunt and fight alive through story and song.

name: Harbinger of Thralls
description: Play: Summon a Frozen Thrall.
flavourText:
The ice grows thin at daylight break,
And with the thaw, Her servants wake.

name: Harbinger of Thralls
description: Play: Advance all your Frozen Thralls 1 round.
flavourText:
The ice grows thin at daylight break,
And with the thaw, Her servants wake.

name: Cracking Ice
description: Grant an enemy "Frostbite me at the next Round Start."
flavourText: One must always test the ice before stepping onto it, no matter how thick it may look.

name: Sneezy Biggledust!
description: Give allies +1|+1 this round. If they're created, give them +2|+2 instead.
flavourText: "HELLO. I MUSHROOM I TALKING I DON'T KNOW WHY OR HOW OR WHAT IS HAPPEN PLEASE LET ME BE MUSHROOM. PLEASE. THANK. BYE." - Mushroom

name: Paparo the Great
description:
Play: Manifest a Yordle.
Attack: Grant Yordle allies +1|+0.
flavourText: "EVERYONE loves Paparo! Every summer, he brings us trinkets from all across the world, and they're always either tasty, pretty, or topsy-turvy! Sometimes, all three!" - Ava Achiever

name: Bandle Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting Electro Harpoon, Heroic Refrain, or Yordle Contraption in hand.
flavourText: Yordles are always down for a game... but don't be surprised if the rules change in the middle of one!

name: Drop the Bomb
description: Deal 2 to a unit and summon a Scrappy Bomb.
flavourText: "Well, that's not good," Giselle said quietly, ducking behind cover.

name: Cosmic Binding
description: Deal 2 to an enemy and Stun another. Plant 6 Chimes in your deck.
flavourText:
"Mama, where does the Caretaker go?"
"He goes everywhere, love. As far as the eye can reach."
"Why?"
"Ah, my sweet. Do not think on why. Not even our wisest elders can understand the Caretaker's ways..."
- A mother and child

name: Byrd, The Bellringer
description: When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck.
flavourText: "..second time was the big 'un. I was sweepin' the floors, when all a sudden I spot me dinner spilt on the table and me pots 'n' pans waddlin' on two legs, hurryin’ out the door! I followed fast as these knees’d go, and I found ‘em at that temple, rummagin’ through the shelves like they was lookin’ for somethin’.” - Old Gaff’s tale, part 2

name: Proximity Puffcap
description: Deal 1 to a unit. If one of your traps or boons activated this round, deal 3 to it instead.
flavourText: "If it starts to glow, it's gonna blow!" - Bandle Scout rule number 463

name: Maduli, The Gatekeeper
description: When I'm summoned, plant a Chime on the top card of your deck, then double the boons in your deck.
flavourText:
"Gave me a right fright, it did. Arms sproutin' all over. Teeth big as boulders. Oh, and when that creature ran that mallet 'cross its teeth, made a song so eerie, thought I'd die. Ran for my life, I did. But not before I seen it... holes in the sky! Musta been hundreds of 'em!"
- Old Gaff’s tale, part 4

name: The Papertree
description: When an ally with an attachment attacks, grant that attachment +1|+0.
flavourText: The leaves of the papertree shimmer with the same fae magic that created the tree itself. And, just like the birds that inspired their form, they find the allure of shiny things impossible to resist.

name: Gruesome Theater
description: Recall a unit with 3 or less Health.
flavourText: "Artistry cannot be rushed." - Jhin

name: Moral Support
description: I cost 2 less if you've supported an ally this game.Give an ally Barrier this round.
flavourText: "Trust the balance. Walk the divide." - Shen

name: Kinkou's Call
description: Summon a Keeper of Masks now or at the next Round Start. Draw 1.
flavourText:
"Old masks let young eyes see clearly."
- Keeper of Masks

name: Dragon Ambush
description: Start a free attack with 2 Dragonlings.
flavourText:
"Desire made manifest."
- The Dragonmaster

name: Storm of Blades
description:
For the rest of the game, when you Blade Dance, summon another attacking Blade.
Blade Dance 1.
flavourText: "Lead the dance, and I'll follow!" - Ribbon Dancer

name: The Maker
description: Play: Recall a unit with less Power than me.
flavourText: "An extraordinary creator, The Maker. A legendary artisan! Her art, peerless! Her execution, flawless! It is a great honor to be in her presence, let alone wield an instrument of her making." - Kashuri Witness

name: Windswept Hillock
description:
When I'm summoned, draw a Yasuo and Stun the strongest enemy.
When you gain the attack token, Stun the strongest enemy.
flavourText: For most, peace is a happy home and the warm quiet found in a loved one's hold. For Yasuo, it is that rare moment when the winds calm and offer promise instead of remembrance.

name: Ionian Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting Gruesome Theater, Ritual of Renewal, or Stand United in hand.
flavourText: "Learning to read your opponent is an essential skill, even outside of a fight. But most importantly, the purpose of a game is to have fun. Now, fetch me my footbath!" - Inspiring Mentor

name: Kinkou's Call
description: Summon a Keeper of Masks at the next Round Start. Draw 1.
flavourText:
"Old masks let young eyes see clearly."
- Keeper of Masks

name: Kinkou's Call
description: Summon a Keeper of Masks. Draw 1.
flavourText:
"Old masks let young eyes see clearly."
- Keeper of Masks

name: The Stagehand
description: Play: Stun an enemy.
flavourText: "Act Four: A young priestess enters our story. Her tale is one of tragedy, conveyed on the pale lips of those she betrayed. Desperate to repent for her transgression, she carries in her arms a great burden, a gilded gift for the Noxians she welcomed to her land. We are left to wonder: was it sorrow or the bullet that broke her heart?"

name: Stunning Performance
description: Stun an enemy.
flavourText: "An actor must not shy from the spotlight." - Jhin

name: Peerless Artistry
description: Recall a unit with less Power than me.
flavourText: "Training is a path, and at its end lies perfection." - The Maker

name: Kinkou Student
description: When another ally gets Barrier, give me Barrier this round if I don't have it.
flavourText: "Embrace the Balance on every level. Mind, body, spirit. Resist the impetuous urges of youth. Elevate your perspective." - Shen

name: Sputtering Songspinner
description: Pick one of two new 2 cost spells to create in hand and set its cost to 0 this round. Repeat two more times.
flavourText: Zaun's first songspinner was surprisingly reliable. The only downside was that nobody could figure out how to control the volume.

name: Evil Imperfectionist
description: Play: Pick a card in hand. Create 4 exact copies of it in your deck and reduce their costs by 1.
flavourText:
"Well, all I'm gonna say about today is that things could have gone better. Gonna leave it at that. Future me... you know what we did."
- Kay's diary

name: Solitude
description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it a random keyword.
flavourText:
"On my walk home from the Entresol, I saw again that poor vagabond sobbing in a small alleyway. That so many veer around her so pointedly breaks my heart as much as her own palpable dismay. So, tomorrow, should we cross paths again, I will endeavor to help her in any way I can."
- Notes from Lady Sempescu's diary

name: Piltovan Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting Aftershock, Hextech Transmogulator, or Progress Day! in hand.
flavourText: "You won't find a finer set of pieces anywhere in the world, good sir. My daughter put her heart into every last detail." - Corin Reveck

name: Discreet Invitation
description: Create a Fleeting Shady Character or Chempunk Shredder in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
flavourText: Zaun's best night life is invite-only. If you're not in the band, you've gotta really be somebody to snag a spot. Or find a ticket on the ground.

name: Scavenged Camocloaker
description: Grant an ally Elusive and "Nexus Strike: Draw 1."
flavourText: "You guys won't BELIEVE what I found today!" - Sumpsnipe Scavenger

name: Salvaged Scrap
description: To play, discard up to 2 cards. Create that many followers from your regions that cost 1 more and reduce their costs by 1.
flavourText: Down in the depths of Zaun, the locals are forced to turn the scraps and the dregs they salvage into workable material. After decades of practice, they've become rather good at it.

name: Illaoi
description: Attack: Spawn 1, then I gain Power equal to your strongest Tentacle's Power this round.
flavourText: The "Eye of Nagakabouros" is merely a name, but Illaoi takes it as a challenge to live as if her god is a constant--and easily-bored--companion.

name: Illaoi
description:
When you Spawn, increase its value by 1.
Attack: Spawn 1, then fully heal your strongest Tentacle and I gain stats equal to its stats this round.
flavourText: A life lesson: If ever you have the chance to leap from the rigging of a fine ship and crash like thunderous repentance upon your foes, do so. It is most invigorating.

name: Illaoi's Tentacle Smash
description:
Spawn 2, then your strongest Tentacle and an enemy strike each other.
Create an Illaoi in your deck.
flavourText: "Life is a test. And pain is the teacher more often than we might like." - Illaoi

name: Tentacle
flavourText: There is no greater symbol of what lurks below. Whether it means you harm or not is irrelevant to the fear--the panic that rises in your chest. Nature supplies spectacle, but your mind supplies intent.

name: Wharf Rat
description: I have +1|+0 for each different round you've damaged the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Ain't no place bloodier in Bilgewater than the bay. Just look at them rats. Reared on blood, they are. Can't get enough o' the stuff. Creepy little scrits." - Jagged Butcher

name: Megatusk
description: Once you're Deep, heal your allies and Nexus 3.
flavourText:
"What does it want?!"
"It... it's after the oranges!"
"By the Bearded Lady, JUST GIVE IT THE WHOLE BUSHEL!" - Unlucky sailors

name: Eye of Nagakabouros
description:
Spawn 2.
Draw 2.
flavourText: Nagakabouros is a god of providence--provided one survives the act of worship.

name: Nagakabouros
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Spawn 2. Then, if your strongest Tentacle has 12+ Power, create a Nagakabouros' Tantrum in hand.
flavourText: "The Mother Serpent. The Great Kraken. The Bearded Lady. Nagakabouros cares little for names, and less for the restless dead." - Illaoi

name: Nagakabouros' Tantrum
description: Nagakabouros starts a free attack with 4 Nagakabouros' Tentacle.
flavourText: It is a common Buhru story that the land was once whole, and Nagakabouros shattered it into islands to provide greater challenge for navigators. It's a story, of course. Nagakabouros didn't shatter the land. Nobody questions, however, whether she could if she felt like it.

name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle
description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
flavourText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess

name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle
description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
flavourText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess

name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle
description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
flavourText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess

name: Nagakabouros' Tentacle
description: When I'm summoned, grow my stats to that of your strongest Tentacle and grant me its keywords.
flavourText: "To say you've witnessed Nagakabouros after seeing her tendrils is to say you know the sun after witnessing daylight. Nagakabouros is more than enormous. Nagakabouros is unending." - Falaweh, Buhru Priestess

name: Riptide Sermon
description:
Deal 3 to an enemy unit.
Spawn 3.
Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "We learn as children to ride the dangerous waters. To struggle is to die. It is natural that the first trial a priestess must overcome is forgetting this lesson; to battle the undertow with all her might. For a Truth Bearer is not the swimmer--she is the current." - Illaoi

name: Blood in the Water
description: Deal 1 to anything, then Rally.
flavourText: Not much keeps the circling sharks of Ripper's Bay away. Once they've had a taste of blood, they're eager for more.

name: Tentacle Smash
description: Spawn 2, then your strongest Tentacle and an enemy strike each other.
flavourText: "Life is a test. And pain is the teacher more often than we might like." - Illaoi

name: The Sea's Voice
description: Attack: Spawn 1 and give your strongest Tentacle Overwhelm this round.
flavourText: Summoning Nagakabouros involves little in the way of ritual or rite. She answers the call of those whose soul can rise to match the ocean's, every swell, every thrash. It is a battle few can withstand.

name: Answered Prayer
description: Spawn 2, or spend 5 mana to Spawn 4 instead.
flavourText: Prayer to Nagakabouros is not about supplication, nor about asking and receiving. Hers is a blessing not unlike life: strive, struggle, push, and occasionally, reward will find you.

name: Watchful Idol
description: Round Start: Deal 2 to me and Spawn 1.
flavourText: When terrors swarm out from the Shadow Isles, the idol glows bright--a blazing beacon on the horizon.

name: Ransom Riches
description: Manifest a follower you can afford.
flavourText:
"Alright, Baz. You sure you wanna try again?"
"Third time's a charm, Gav. Besides, I reckon we've fought everything this stinkin' city's got goin' for it."
"Fought, and lost, Baz." - Baz and Gav, aspiring bounty hunters

name: Swindle
description: Pick 1 of 2 non-champion cards from the enemy hand and create a copy in your hand. Plunder: I cost 1 less.
flavourText: "FIVE aces? Looks like I win again!" - Pool Shark

name: Buhru Lookout
description: When I'm summoned, Spawn 3.
flavourText: Life is sweetest in simplicity. Salt spray in your face, birdsong in your ears... and an uncomplicated foe on the horizon.

name: Buhru Leader
description: Play: A 1 cost ally starts a free attack.
flavourText: "Recall the ocean's wisdom! If you do not move, you will be moved! Follow my voice if you've lost your way--for your foe surely knows their own."

name: Bilgewater Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting More Powder!, Playful Trickster, or Chum the Waters in hand.
flavourText: "Don't try to catch someone bluffin' in a match of 'stones. Bilgewater's full of good liars. If you really wanna win, you gotta watch the hands." - Twisted Fate

name: Steem
description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant the strongest enemy Vulnerable.
flavourText: Evelynn's first encounter with Steem was a violent, thrilling affair. Evelynn remembered how he smiled with unbridled pleasure as she flayed him, and how he returned the suffering just as eagerly when it was his turn. After finally overpowering Steem, Evelynn chose then not to destroy the lesser demon, but to bind him to her forever. Perhaps, she thought, they could share their mutual love for butchery with the world.

name: Answered Prayer
description: Spawn 2.
flavourText: Prayer to Nagakabouros is not about supplication, nor about asking and receiving. Hers is a blessing not unlike life: strive, struggle, push, and occasionally, reward will find you.

name: Answered Prayer
description: Spawn 4.
flavourText: Prayer to Nagakabouros is not about supplication, nor about asking and receiving. Hers is a blessing not unlike life: strive, struggle, push, and occasionally, reward will find you.

name: Void Abomination
description:
When I'm summoned, grant me all positive keywords allies have had this game.
When an ally has a new positive keyword, grant it to me.
flavourText: "We had heard tales of Void breaches before, and the devastation that came with them. But to see it myself... I don't know that I will ever rid my eyes of that sight, or my heart of that horror." - Belveth survivor

name: Hive Herald
description: Play: Grant a unit and me each other's positive keywords.
flavourText: "It spoke to me as... as if it knew me. Like it wanted me to meet... something..." - Kai'Sa

name: Kai'Sa
description: When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Second Skin in hand.
flavourText: Just a few days prior, Kai'Sa noticed her second skin bristling with new excitement, pulling her with ever-increasing vigor toward the Shuriman coast. Something was wrong, and as Kai'Sa neared Belveth, she soon realized the scale of the horror unfolding before her.

name: Rite of Passage
description: Manifest an allied landmark that has been destroyed this game and summon it.
flavourText: “A moment in time, preserved.” - Zilean

name: Baccai Witherclaw
description:
Play: Grant an enemy Vulnerable.
When an enemy is Challenged, give it -2|-0 this round.
flavourText: Their sanity withered away like dunes in the wind--and in its place, a seed of anger flourished into a fury no desert waters could quench.

name: Belvethi Elder
flavourText: Shalatai reeled at the horror before her. There lay Ferai, the kind butcher's daughter, crushed to death. Beside her was Gorrub, the fisherman's son, still reaching toward his love with lifeless hands. So many memories gone. So many lives lost.
