With a grimace, Shalatai turned to the evil, ready to give her life to save the rest of her people.

name: Shuriman Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting Ruthless Predator, Weight of Judgment, or Spirit Fire in hand.
flavourText: "A game of Tellstones is never about who wins--it's about how great you look while playing!" - Akshan

name: Icathian Rain
description: Deal 1 for each positive keyword Kai'Sa has to enemies or the enemy Nexus  (lowest health first).
flavourText: "Hit and move!" - Kai'Sa

name: Kai'Sa
description:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: If you have the attack token, create a Second Skin in hand.
Attack: Deal 1 for each positive keyword I have to enemies or the enemy Nexus (lowest health first).
flavourText: Kai'Sa worked as fast as she could. Another salvo tore through another abomination, sending it crashing to the ground. She had learned how to fight the Void long ago, but these creatures... they were different.

name: Second Skin
description: Grant allied Kai'Sas everywhere another ally's positive keywords.
flavourText: "I'm learning." - Kai'Sa

name: Kai'Sa's Supercharge
description:
Grant an ally Overwhelm and SpellShield.
Create a Kai'Sa in your deck.
flavourText: "I'll show you how to fight." - Kai'Sa

name: Sands of Time
description: Give enemies -2|-0 this round. Create a Fleeting Instant Century in hand.
flavourText: The sands of time flow without thought or consideration. Theirs is a scheme of cruel indifference, but not all are slave to its callous machinations...

name: Glory's Call
description:
I cost 2 less for each different Ascended ally you've summoned this game.
Manifest a card from the Emperor's Deck with cost 9 or less.
flavourText: “Look upon our work--look what we have built!” - Azir

name: Chamber of Renewal
description: When you summon a champion, destroy me to grant it +2|+1 and SpellShield.
flavourText: Nasus emerged from the sarcophagus, his mind clear and his wounds fully healed. He scribbled a few notes and peered at the sarcophagi hanging high above, pondering the mental state of the beastly aberrations resting within. Time would tell if this magic could bring the baccai back from their insanity, a magic the other Ascended had once protested. But they were gone now and Renekton and his madness were not. Nasus scribbled a few more words, hoping he had finally found a way to save his brother.

name: Supercharge
description: Grant an ally Overwhelm and SpellShield.
flavourText: "I'll show you how to fight." - Kai'Sa

name: Void Seeker
description: Deal 1 to a follower. If you've Evolved, deal  3 to a unit instead.
flavourText: "Hurts, doesn't it?" - Kai'Sa

name: Voidling
description: While in hand, I have a random keyword that changes each round. When I'm summoned, grant me this keyword.
flavourText: Dharna remembered throwing open the windows that morning and smelling the freshly baked loaves. Down the way, fishermen had already began hauling the day's catch up to the noon markets. She remembered smiling, thinking it would be a fine day.

name: Void Blaster
flavourText: The Void eruption in the city of Belveth was both sudden and terrifying. Most of the civilians were terrified by the chaos that quickly enveloped the city, and fled for safety as fast as they were able. Most, but not Koyemi.

name: Domination
description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
When you summon a 1 cost ally, grant it +1|+0.
flavourText: Sometimes, all the powerful want is to feel powerless.

name: Inspiring Light
description: Grant allies Spirit.
flavourText: "No more hiding! Step into the light, and shine brightly with me!" - Lux

name: Lord Eldred, Mageseeker Leader
description:
Other allies and your Nexus have Tough.
When an ally survives damage, grant it +1|+1.
flavourText: "I couldn't help but overhear your fervent whispering, dear wife. I advise you to exercise more caution when discussing family matters in so public a place. You can never be certain who might be listening."

name: Royal Decree
description: Give an ally +2|+2 and Challenger this round or summon an Honored Lord.
flavourText: "At once, King Jarvan. We shall see it done at any cost." - Barrett Buvelle, Honored Lord

name: Petricite Pillar
description:
ALL spells cost 2 more.
Countdown 2.
flavourText: Mageseekers place towering petricite obelisks throughout their compounds, ensuring that even the strongest mages are rendered completely powerless.

name: Demacian Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting Prismatic Barrier, Detain, or For Demacia! in hand.
flavourText: "Why do they call it 'King's Gambit'? Queens take risks, too!" - Cithria of Cloudfield

name: Protective Broodfather
description: Attack: Draw a unit. If it's a Dragon, summon it attacking.
flavourText: "Luckily, my research suggests that broodfathers spend most of their time hunting a good distance from their young. It goes without saying that if the male should return, we would all be dragon food! Ha ha!" - Anden Mayne, Egghead Researcher

name: Royal Decree
description: Give an ally +2|+2 and Challenger this round.
flavourText: "At once, King Jarvan. We shall see it done at any cost." - Barrett Buvelle, Honored Lord

name: Royal Decree
description: Summon an Honored Lord.
flavourText: "At once, King Jarvan. We shall see it done at any cost." - Barrett Buvelle, Honored Lord

name: Allure
description: Summon a random Husk and grant it +1|+0.
flavourText: "Closer, love..." - Evelynn

name: Gwen
description: Attack: When another ally gains Power from Hallowed, so do I. Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Gwen snip-snip-snipped her way through the Black Mist, thinking it strange how completely it enveloped the area, and once she had, the enchanted manse stood out amongst the bleak woods like a beacon. Little wonder Gwen was drawn to it. How curious it was--but also, how grand!

name: Snip Snip!
description: Drain 2 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "To pieces!" - Gwen

name: Snip Snip Snip!
description: Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus one time for every 2 power Gwen has. (max 50 times, min 2 times)
flavourText: "To pieces!" - Gwen

name: Gwen's Thread the Needle
description:
Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to an enemy.
Create a Gwen in your deck.
flavourText: "Needles out!" - Gwen

name: Gwen
description: Attack:  When another ally gains Power from Hallowed, so do I. Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus one time for every 2 Power I have.
flavourText: She knew that the Black Mist must be driven back from wherever it had spread to, and the joy and light these spirits lent her efforts cut through it readily. If she could help their celebration in the meantime, all the better!

name: Hate Spike
description: Kill an ally to deal 3 to a unit and if Evelynn started in your deck, summon a random Husk.
flavourText: "Be as loud as you like." - Evelynn

name: Eternal Dancers
description: Attack: Revive an attacking Ephemeral copy of the  strongest dead ally other than Eternal Dancers with my power or less.
flavourText: It's always easier to join someone on the dance floor than be the first person on it. The twins, however, are always delighted to show others how it's done.

name: Shadow Isles Tellstones
description: Create a Fleeting Mark of the Isles, Spirit Journey, or Crumble in hand.
flavourText: "Polished... decorations. Tokens... learn rules. Curious game. Breathtaking... unparalleled craftsmanship... unforgettable." - Recovered journal

name: Harrowing Return
description: Revive the strongest dead allied follower and grant it  Ephemeral and Fearsome. Give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavourText: Spirits can be banished for a time, but they always return.

name: Ghastly Band
flavourText: Their repertoire was impressive, from minuets and waltzes to ballads and folk songs, but truth be told, the party's guests were dying for something new.

name: Thread the Needle
description: Kill an ally to deal damage equal to its Power to an enemy.
flavourText: "Needles out!" - Gwen

name: Vora
description: When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
flavourText: Unlike other demons, who lure their victims in with false pretenses, Vora is too single-minded in her craving, too overwhelmed by desire. Rather than a predator who stalks her food, she is a wild beast who must be fed.

name: Strike Up The Band
description: Summon two Ghastly Bands.
flavourText: "Keep it lively! Double-time!" - Conductor of the Mists

name: Formal Invitation
description: Create copies in hand of 2 allied followers that have died this game.
flavourText: "Here we are, dear. I hear tonight will be quite a splendid affair, and I suspect we'll see many familiar faces!" - Ghostly Reveler

name: Conductor Of The Mists
description: Last Breath: Create a Ghastly Band in hand.
flavourText: "Play on, my friends! We will have a livelier concert than ever before!"

name: Haunted Tomb
description: Countdown 2: Revive the strongest dead ally.
flavourText: The sound of sword on shield was like a death knell, and it drew forth spirits whose tethers to the world had not quite been cut, whose will could not be quelled even in death.

name: Boisterous Host
flavourText:
"We CORDIALLY INVITE you to the party of a lifetime at THE MIDNIGHT REVEL. Join us in celebration at PORCELAIN MANSE for drink, dance, and delight! (Celebrations to end promptly at the 13th hour)" 
- An invitation written in elegant cursive

name: Phantom Butler
flavourText: What would a fancy party be without fancy refreshments?

name: Undergrowth
description:
Toss 3.
Drain 2 from a unit.
flavourText: Even in the Shadow Isles, old growth still finds new purpose.

name: Ghostly Paramour
flavourText: Whether he was a ghost, a memory, or a dream, something about him was familiar...

name: Sultur
description: When I'm summoned, summon a random Husk.
flavourText:
"Beware those who smile on these haunted isles. Perhaps they are too newly arrived to understand the brutality of this place. Perhaps they are crazed. Perhaps they are something else entirely. But beware."
- Notes from Jens Tommen

name: Augmented Clockling
description: Play: Predict, then draw 1 and reduce its cost by 1.
flavourText: “This little guy just needed a bit of tinkering. Fresh gears here, a new arm there, and they get a new lease on life. Time’s a gift everyone should get a little more of, I say.” - Ekko

name: Flashbomb Peddler
description: When you play a spell, plant 1 Flashbomb Trap in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavourText: "...And you know what else makes these babies better than mushrooms? You decide when they explode! How's THAT for value?"

name: Blowback
description: Deal 1 to an enemy and the enemy Nexus. Discard up to 2 to increase the damage by 1 for each card discarded.
flavourText: “Okay, okay, this may only work once, but trust me, it’s gonna be a blast!” - Jinx

name: Stylish Shot
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. The next time an ally strikes the Nexus this round, create an Stylish Shot in hand.
flavourText: “Nobody could keep up with me even if all I had were sticks and stones. With my kit? Don’t even try.” - Samira

name: Elegant Edge
description: Plunder: Grant me +2|+0.
flavourText: “My fee is steep, and I don’t work for just anybody. If you’re lucky enough to hire me, you get grace, poise, and blades that never miss their mark. But most of all, style. Because who doesn’t love killing with a flourish?”

name: Pirouette
description:
Plunder: I cost 2 less.
Deal 1 to anything and Stun an enemy.
flavourText: “What? I was stretching. Don’t tell me you died to me stretching.” - Elegant Edge

name: Samira
description: Plunder or strike: Create a Flair in hand if you don't already have one.
flavourText: “I'm always running down some mark who ran up debts he couldn’t pay. And running from those debts makes you the wrong kind of enemies--the ones who call me.”

name: Flair
description: Give an allied Samira Challenger this round or deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: “Get too close, you’ll get the steel. Stray too far, you get the lead.” -Samira

name: Flair
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: “Get too close, you’ll get the steel. Stray too far, you get the lead.” -Samira

name: Flair
description: Give an allied Samira Challenger this round.
flavourText: “Get too close, you’ll get the steel. Stray too far, you get the lead.” -Samira

name: Samira's All Out
description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Plunder: Give it +2|+1 instead.
Create a Samira in your deck.
flavourText: “Indari’s pulled some strings to get us in without a fuss. Here’s hoping there’ll be time for me to make one on our way out.” - Samira

name: Samira
description:
Plunder or strike: Create a Flair in hand if you don't already have one.
When you play 6 cards, Rally. Resets when you start a round with the attack token.
flavourText: “Had a feeling there was more going on here than a little debt evader.  Indari calls these ‘complications.’ I call them flavor.”

name: Dashing Dandy
description: Plunder: Double my power.
flavourText: “Look, normally I like to set down some rules--like "paws off the hair and face", but who am I kidding? You won’t lay a finger on me.”

name: Dame the Despoiler
description: Plunder: Grant all allies +1|+0.
flavourText: “Ah, Dame. She has a flair for the dramatic, that one. Some might turn their nose up at a little pageantry, but when she’s in her element, we’re all getting paid.” - Elegant Edge

name: All Out
description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Plunder: Give it +2|+1 instead.
flavourText: “Indari’s pulled some strings to get us in without a fuss. Here’s hoping there’ll be time for me to make one on our way out.” - Samira

name: Adroit Artificer
description: When I'm summoned, activate all ally Plunder effects.
flavourText: “Setting up shop can be tricky in some places, but with one look at my and Lani’s wares, the coin was flying. Didn’t see our mark among those perusing, but plenty others with violence on their minds tonight. After all, finding out who wants to kill who is a decent way to get the lay of the land.” - Miel

name: Daring Demolisher
description: Play: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus or activate an ally's Plunder effect.
flavourText: “Being in the weapons business means having a healthy relationship with data. Concept, test, rebuild, modify: all that takes information. There’s nothing like a little field testing to create a healthy sample size, and a few craters!” - Lani

name: Daring Demolisher
description: Play: Activate an ally's Plunder effect.
flavourText: “Being in the weapons business means having a healthy relationship with data. Concept, test, rebuild, modify: all that takes information. There’s nothing like a little field testing to create a healthy sample size, and a few craters!” - Lani

name: Daring Demolisher
description: Play: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: “Being in the weapons business means having a healthy relationship with data. Concept, test, rebuild, modify: all that takes information. There’s nothing like a little field testing to create a healthy sample size, and a few craters!” - Lani

name: Captain Indari
description:
When I'm summoned, I Improvise.
Plunder: Forge other allies.
flavourText: “I’ve worked with many operatives before. Some were easy, some a challenge... and then there’s Samira. I made peace with the fact that I can’t reign her in--instead, I direct the bedlam, aim it--and occasionally, join in here and there.”

name: Mad Ol' Babs
description: When you refill mana, grant me +1|+0 for each mana refilled.
flavourText: "Little Jack darling, see here! I find something that interest you, yes?"

name: Brazen Buccaneer
description: Plunder: Summon a random 1 cost follower and grant it Brash.
flavourText: “I’d steer clear of her if I were you. She’s got a real nasty habit of making her problems other people’s.” - Samira

name: Jack
description:
Strike: Create a Coin in hand.
When you refill mana, heal me 1 for each mana refilled.
flavourText: "You've got to be brave or dumb to stand against me, but either way, the outcome's the same. My advice: worry about making it out alive."

name: Jack
description:
Strike: Create 2 Coins in hand.
When you refill mana, grant me +1|+0 and heal me 1 for each mana refilled.
flavourText: “Jack ain’t all bad. In fact, the few who’ve earned his respect might even call him charming, almost decent. But once he gets that blood smell in his nose, well... I don't think there's a more dangerous man alive.” - Bull

name: Jack's Risky Venture
description:
Deal 3 to a unit. If this kills it, create 2 Coins in hand.
Create a Jack in your deck.
flavourText: “Nothing ventured, nothing gained--and these jaws are built for ventures.” - Jack

name: Nukkle
description: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Mako in hand.
flavourText: “Little nick ‘ere, little slice there, all in good fun. Bit ‘o blood in the water never hurt anybody. Well, not me anyways.” - Nukkle

name: Perfidious Promoter
description: When you refill mana, create a Fleeting random follower in hand you can exactly afford.
flavourText: “If you want the crimson, then you want Jack. You wanna know the where, the when, the who, and  how much? You talk to me.”

name: Mako
description: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Bull in hand.
flavourText: “You’re a small fish. I’d keep swimming.”

name: Bull
description: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavourText: His body a tapestry of scars and ink telling his brutal legend, Bull now serves as mentor and sparring partner to Jack. He's saving that last bit of fighting spirit for an opponent worthy enough to merit one last scrap.

name: Pocket Picker
description: Last Breath: Create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: "Oi, get back here, slimeball! That's my potato money!" - Angel

name: Five-Punch Pablo
description: When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Prize Fight in hand.
flavourText: “That’s the way, Jackie Boy! Keep dolin’ out the ol' Bilgewater charm, and I’ll keep ye fightin' fit. Ahh, this reminds me of my golden days, when they used to call me 'Pretty-As-A-Picture Pablo'... They didnae, ye say? They did, too! That knock to yer head must've fouled yer memory.” - Five-Punch Pablo

name: Angel
description: Plunder: Create 3 Coins in hand.
flavourText: "That the best you got? Cute. Now it's my turn."

name: Risky Venture
description: Deal 3 to a unit. If this kills it, create 2 Coins in hand.
flavourText: “Nothing ventured, nothing gained--and these jaws are built for ventures.” - Jack

name: Barbed Chain
description:
Plunder: I cost 2 less.
Draw 2 at the next Round Start and grant them Fleeting.
flavourText: By the time you hear the rattling, it’s already too late to run.

name: Father Fury
description: Plunder: Refill 1 spell mana and create a random 1 cost spell from your regions in hand.
flavourText: Father Fury's origins are as thick as a thundercloud, and even when they've asked, no one's ever heard a straight answer--at least, not one they could hear over the din of his destruction.

name: Prize Fight
description: An ally and an enemy strike each other. They can't drop below 1 Health from this strike.
flavourText: Sometimes you trade in coin and lamp oil, and sometimes you trade in knuckles and teeth. That’s just the way it is, but an even exchange? That’s good business!

name: Barknuckles
description: Strike: Create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: “Hmmm, now I know they’re not the most traditional piece of kit, yeah I’ll grant you that. But do give ‘em a try, they really grow on ya.” - Bull

name: The King's Court
description:
When I'm summoned, draw a Jack.
When you summon an ally, create a Fleeting Prize Fight in hand.
When an ally survives damage, grant it Brash.
flavourText: Jack’s personal vessel has borne him and his ilk across Runeterra's waters, from Bilgewater to Ionia. How it travels underneath the water without sinking is anyone’s guess, but it’s been said that beneath the surface is where the real danger lies...

name: Inferna
description: When you activate Plunder, draw 1 and grant it Fleeting.
flavourText: “There are certain advantages to being a pyromaniac at sea. Water  doesn’t let a flame get outta hand, and it never asks for a cut.”

name: Tag Out!
description: Recall an ally and create a Coin in hand, or spend 5 mana to Recall an enemy and create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional

name: Master Bingwen, the Sieve
description: Play: The next time you play a unit this round, summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
flavourText: Bingwen the Bird was once a fighter, so called for his cranelike stance and agility. Since retiring, he has taken up the mantle of a trainer--using his keen eye and firm hand to separate the fine talent from the coarse.

name: The Old Timer
description: Play: Recall the strongest enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, Recall all enemies instead.
flavourText: "The mask's not comin' off, girl. And unless you wanna end up looking like this thing, don't ask again."

name: Sett
description: The first time I would drop below 1 Health while attacking, give me Barrier instead.
flavourText: Basking in the roar of the crowd packed into his exclusive underground arena, Sett indulges in a rare moment of introspection. He remembers all he fought for, and what might yet come his way. He knows one thing for certain, though: It’s good to be the Boss.

name: Sett
description:
While I'm attacking, I can't take damage or die.
Each round, create a Show Stopper in hand once you've spent 12+ mana that round.
flavourText: “Problem with bein’ the boss is, for most, ya get soft. Your own callouses start healing, and before long you’re what you swore you’d never be. So I'm grateful for all this chaos. Finally, someone’s bringing the beast outta me!”

name: Coin
description:
Coins stack.
Refill 1 mana.
flavourText: "What can I say? I'm a generous guy." - Sett

name: Show Stopper
description: Obliterate an enemy. Deal 1 to all other enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "For one moment, just before I shatter your spine to splinters, I'm gonna make you immortal.” - Sett

name: Sett's Facebreaker
description:
Stun 2 enemies and create a Coin in hand.
Create a Sett in your deck.
flavourText: “What? He said he’d take it on the chin--he didn't say whose!” - Sett

name: Royal Shimmerwing
description: Other Bird allies have +1|+0 and Quick Attack.
flavourText: "In these jungles, I've consistently found the most beautiful specimens to be the deadliest predators." - Anura

name: Attentive Accountant
description: Nexus Strike: Create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: Amid ambitious anglers and self-interested schemers, Lise has the one quality Sett prizes above all: reliability. She is never off, never short, and has never given Sett cause to wonder. This has granted Lise his backing and a warning to any seeking to stir up trouble: Bet against the House, and lose.

name: Smooth Mixologist
description: Play: Heal an ally or your Nexus 3 and create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: "First round is about saying hello, and the second gets them cozy. Problems come out by the third, and from the fourth on, the lips get real loose--you wouldn't believe the kind of things I hear!"

name: Place Your Bets
description: Draw 2 and create 2 Coins in hand.
flavourText: “They give us real money, and we give them a chance. Heh… and some really wonder how the House always wins.”

name: Beguiling Cobra
description: Each round, the first time you play another follower, summon an exact copy of it. If your board is full, grant its stats and keywords to me instead.
flavourText: "Think these flowers are worth anything? And don't call me crazy, but do they look like they're... dancing?" - Piltovan Poacher

name: More Than You Can Chew
description: Recall the strongest enemy. If you've spent 16+ mana this round, Recall all enemies instead.
flavourText: “You need this lesson, make no mistake⁠--but you ain’t gonna like it.” - The Old Timer

name: Pit Professional
description: When I'm summoned, create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: “Some are in it for the coin, others the blood, and some for the roar of the crowd. Me? Never could choose just one. I need it all, and I have everything here in spades.”

name: Tag Out!
description: Recall an ally and create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional

name: Tag Out!
description: Recall an enemy and create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: “I’ll only come in under two conditions. First, if your opponent is havin’ too much fun wreckin’ ya. Second, you’re the one havin’ too much fun, and I want my piece too!” - Pit Professional

name: Bout Security
description:
When I'm summoned, create a Fleeting Bout Security in hand and grant other Bout Security +1|+1.
Empowered 5: Quick Attack.
flavourText: “If they think you’re thick, go on and let ‘em. Let the bad apples think they’re safe to run their games--there ain’t a thing in life better than the look in their eyes when they realize they underestimated you.” - Sett

name: Facebreaker
description: Stun 2 enemies and create a Coin in hand.
flavourText: “What? He said he’d take it on the chin--he didn't say whose!” - Sett

name: Fallen Sands General
description: I have +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally you've summoned this game.
flavourText: “Though you may be naught but grains of sand to this foe, I see you. I feel your presence in the dunes. Lend your strength to me, and we shall bring our enemies low together!”

name: Secret Keeper
description: When I'm summoned, create at the bottom of your deck two random level 2 champions that aren't in your hand, deck, or play.
flavourText: He knew not fully what he saw, what shape the calamity might take, or when--but he knows this world and its people. They are not ready. They may never be.

name: Pack Attack
description: Start a free attack with an exact Ephemeral copy of each Cat ally.
flavourText: A lone huntress is fearsome enough--but a pack is truly ferocious.

name: Frostcoat Cub
description: Spend 6 mana to play me as Frostcoat Mother instead.
flavourText: There are many dangers in the Freljord, especially for those yet to learn its cold truths.

name: Innovative Blacksmith
description:
When I'm summoned, I Improvise.
Each round, the first time you Forge or Equip an ally, heal your Nexus 1.
flavourText: "The little fuzzball may not be helping me work faster, but he does put a smile on my face. That's help enough." - Innovative Blacksmith

name: Frostcoat Cub
flavourText: There are many dangers in the Freljord, especially for those yet to learn its cold truths.

name: Frostcoat Mother
flavourText: Luckily for some in the Freljord, they have guardians who see fit that they learn the path of survival, and are not made lessons themselves.

name: Thrall Bulwark
description: I don't take damage from allied spells or Skills.
flavourText: “The avalanche, once begun, cannot be stopped.” - Lissandra

name: Soul Harvest
description: Kill a follower with 3 or less Power, or spend 3 mana to kill a champion with 3 or less Power.
flavourText: It is but a whisper upon the air, barely heard but sorely felt, that trades one life for another.

name: Soul Harvest
description: Kill a champion with 3 or less Power.
flavourText: It is but a whisper upon the air, barely heard but sorely felt, that trades one life for another.

name: Soul Harvest
description: Kill a follower with 3 or less Power.
flavourText: It is but a whisper upon the air, barely heard but sorely felt, that trades one life for another.

name: Eradication
description: Kill ALL units with 3 or less Power.
flavourText: Whoever looks upon me shall know oblivion’s touch, and they shall never be free of it.

name: Grave Companion
description: Each round, the first time another ally dies, draw 1.
flavourText: "I just taught him a new trick! Wanna see it?" - Phantom Prankster

name: Cosmic Youngling
description: Round Start: Heal me and your Nexus 1.
flavourText: Like the tear of an aurora they trace the heavens, their radiant gaze bringing calm, soothing wounds and mending what is broken.

name: Falling Star
description: Deal 4 to an enemy that attacked this round or is Stunned.
flavourText: The stars look down upon our acts, be they good or ill. The righteous are lifted up, while the wicked suffer judgment.

name: Sacrificial Scholar
description: Last Breath: Create in hand copies of the first 3 spells you played on me.
flavourText: "Camphor has taken too much, from too many. When it is your time to die, make sure it is on your own terms. Do not give her the satisfaction." - Pantheon

name: Carved Bladetwirler
flavourText: "Well, that's new." - Fae Bladetwirler

name: Pie Toss
description: Deal 1 to a unit. Create a Perilous Pastry in hand.
flavourText: Brace yourself.

name: Perilous Pastry
description: Deal 1 to anything.
flavourText: It tastes better than it feels.

name: Condense
description: Pick a follower. Create a 1 cost copy of it in hand and set its stats to 1|1.
flavourText: "Hmm... I guess smaller doesn't always mean cuter!" - Lulu

name: Search Warrant
description: An ally with 4+ Power Captures a unit or an ally Captures a landmark.
flavourText: “Remain still and silent. Any resistance would be unwise.” - Mageseeker Inspector

name: Form Up!
description: Give an ally +2|+2 this round.
flavourText: “Stand strong! You are bent, not broken!” - Dauntless Vanguard

name: Search Warrant
description: An ally Captures a landmark.
flavourText: “Remain still and silent. Any resistance would be unwise.” - Mageseeker Inspector

name: Search Warrant
description: An ally with 4+ Power Captures a unit.
flavourText: “Remain still and silent. Any resistance would be unwise.” - Mageseeker Inspector

name: Altar to Unity
description:
When I'm summoned, draw a unit.
When you summon an ally, grow its stats to equal its cost.
flavourText: The first time she saw the Altar, Cithria found herself at a loss for words. For a while, she could only stand in awe of the majesty of those honored heroes. Would she ever be bold enough to stand by their side?

name: Mordekaiser
description:
Play: Kill up to 2 allies.
When you slay another ally, revive it.
flavourText: Bound to his armor kept in the heart of the Immortal Bastion, Mordekaiser has forged a throne of his own making in the Grey Realm. For every one who would seek to destroy him, there are more who will serve him in both life and death.

name: Mordekaiser's Realm of Death
description:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging the Strongest enemy.
Kill ALL other units.
Create a Mordekaiser in your deck.
flavourText: "Death is my dominion." - Mordekaiser

name: Mordekaiser
description:
Play: Kill up to 2 allies.
When you slay another ally, revive it.
Attack: For the rest of the game, when you slay a unit, Drain 1 from the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "Serve me! Relinquish your pitiful souls. I will give them iron everlasting. I am oblivion inevitable!"

name: Erastin, the Disgraced
description:
When I'm summoned, grant me Deathless.
Attack: Give enemies -1|-0 this round.
flavourText: Camavor's dragons were once magnificent and respected--but even they were not safe from the all-consuming corruption of the Ruination. Erastin is no exception, his long-lost regality now twisted into the garish appearance of the deathless.

name: Legion of the Severed
description: Play: Grant Deathless to an ally in hand.
flavourText: It matters not what form souls took before their imprisonment in the Grey Realm. There, individuality has little value. Faceless and fearless, the Legion serves the Iron Revenant all the better for its uniformity.

name: Shackled Ghasts
description: Last Breath: The next time you revive an ally, create a copy of me in hand.
flavourText: "It was long ago that we were chained. Soon you too will know our suffering, and we will all suffer, forever and ever, until we are granted oblivion at Master's hand..."

name: Lonely Chimeslime
description: When another ally dies, or Last Breath: Plant 4 Chimes in your deck.
flavourText: Don't worry about that ominous ringing--it's just old Chimeslime making his rounds. He's always happy to see new arrivals--but they sure aren't happy to see him.

name: Watery Grave
description: Obliterate 6 cards from the bottom of the enemy deck.
flavourText: For some of Runeterra's deepest sea monsters, a jaull-ship is a light snack.

name: Thousand-Clawed Deathwinder
flavourText: The skitter of a thousand iron-clawed hands and the gnashing of spectral teeth promise a nasty end to any who refuse to serve.

name: Spectral Ironhound
description:
To play me, kill an ally.
When I'm summoned, summon a Thousand-Clawed Deathwinder.
flavourText: These hounds never forget the scent of one who tried to flee--and when the hounds corner their prey, a deathwinder is never far behind.

name: Death's Grasp
description: Kill an ally to deal 5 to a unit.
flavourText: "Darkness is destiny for all but me." - Mordekaiser

name: Threshold of the Grey
description:
Play: Curse an enemy with Terror.
When you summon a Titanic ally, destroy me to draw 2.
flavourText: "These souls, we offer you. This road, we pave in bone before you. These realms, we rend asunder, to make way for your army of iron everlasting." - Deathgrasp Cultist

name: Realm of Death
description:
An ally starts a free attack Challenging the Strongest enemy.
Kill ALL other units.
flavourText: "Death is my dominion." - Mordekaiser

name: Deathgrasp Cultist
description: When I'm summoned or you summon a Titanic ally, Curse the strongest enemy with Terror.
flavourText: In the eyes of his followers, the Iron Revenant is the only hope for those who seek oblivion. Peace through domination--these cultists welcome it with open arms.

name: Terror
description: While I'm in hand, the cursed unit has  -3|-0.
flavourText: You feel an overwhelming sense of dread.

name: Spectral Surveyor
description: Play: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
flavourText: "The terrain is inscrutable. The visibility, close to none. I have encountered enemies at every turn--but strangely, unexpected allies too." - From the expedition records of the Explorer's Guild Far Reaches Division, allocation: Shadow Isles

name: Amalgamation Of Vile Rites
description:
To play me, kill an ally.
Last Breath: Heal your Nexus 2.
flavourText: Beasts of war have  value to any army. In the Grey Realm, they are the tortured amalgamations of souls, each one violently consumptive in its insentience.

name: Nilah
description: Attack: Create a Slipstream in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavourText: In the north, a new challenger awaits Nilah and her monster-hunting crew: a creature called the Volibear, who threatens to destroy the Freljord that once worshipped him. For Nilah, the chance to test her skills against a monster others call a god is the opportunity of a lifetime. Not to mention the lesser monstrosities she will add to her list of accomplishments along the way.

name: Slipstream
description: Draw 2 and grant them Fleeting.
flavourText: "Unfettered exultation!" - Nilah

name: Nilah
description: Attack: Create a Slipstream in the top 6 cards of your deck and deal 2 damage to all enemies and the enemy Nexus. They cannot drop below 1 Health from this damage.
flavourText: "Monster! I am called Nilah of the Seventh Layer! It is my name, not yours, which will be remembered by history."

name: Nilah's Formless Blade
description:
Deal 2 damage to a unit. It can't drop below 1 Health from this damage.
Create a Nilah in your deck.
flavourText: "By my blade, rejoice!" - Nilah

name: Joy Unending
description: Give allies +1|+0 this round and heal damaged allies 2.
flavourText: "Joy, overflowing and everlasting!" - Nilah

name: Chakram Dancer
description:
Play: Deal 1 to anything.
Your Skills Drain.
flavourText: She moves in a dance of water and blades, pulling steel from the roil of foam and spray. She need not see to feel the flow of her weapons--they are water animate, and to water they must always return.

name: The Tidedancer
description:
When I'm summoned, draw a Nilah.
Each round, when you play your third card, give other allies +2|+0 and Brash this round. 
When I would gain Fleeting, reveal me instead.
flavourText: "I hear that strange-shaped ship is the fastest Bilgewater's seen. Nimble, too. Got a peculiar captain, but seemed to me like she knows what she's about. Maybe we could stand to learn a thing or two." - Bilgewater bartender

name: Formless Blade
description: Deal 2 damage to a unit. It can't drop below 1 Health from this damage.
flavourText: "Monsters who call themselves gods have a long way to fall, no matter the land." - Nilah

name: Master Lookout
description: Once you've drawn 3+ cards in a round this game, grant me +1|+1 and Brash.
flavourText: "Hey, bud, what's all the fuss about? Relax! There's nothing in the water we can't handle!" - Dedicant of the Challenge

name: Dedicant of the Challenge
description: When I'm summoned, Updraft your hand to grant me +1|+1 for each card Updrafted and draw 2.
flavourText: "Oh, c'mon, are you even trying? I feel like I gotta hold back, and man, I hate that!"

name: Octo Adventurer
description: Play: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
flavourText: "Odd specimen. Very blue. Eyes quite large. Uncomfortably large. Will acquire for further study." - From the expedition records of the Explorer's Guild Far Reaches Division, allocation: Piltover

name: Explorer's Refreshments
description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2.
flavourText: "Get me some of that, uh... chocolatey stuff you make. Best chocolatey stuff within two days' travel. Oh, and extra hot, please." - Scholarly Pioneer

name: Explorer's Blunder
description: Disable an enemy's positive keywords this round and again at next Round Start.
flavourText: "Was little crack. Became big one. Now very dried out." - Octo Adventurer

name: Explorer's Malfunction
description: Destroy a unit's equipment.
flavourText: "It seems the Isles have come to enjoy my company." - Spectral Surveyor

name: Explorer's Excavation
description: Destroy a landmark.
flavourText: "A little damage to the artifacts is no problem. Makes 'em seem more authentic." - Armed Acquisitioner

name: Flowing Chakram
description: Deal 1 to anything.
flavourText: "Water takes shapes myriad and wonderful." - Chakram Dancer

name: Wizened Helmsman
description: Play: Manifest two different Elemental spells you've played this game. They cost 0 this round.
flavourText: "The mind is a river. Over time, the dedication of its flow carves the faces of the mountains. And like the mind, with momentum, it may grow ever wider and touch new shores."

name: Deluge
description: For the rest of the game, all of your Elemental spells and Skills deal 1 extra damage.
flavourText: "In the hands of the wise, water shapes all." - Dedicant of Wisdom

name: Sefirsa, Scourge of the Deep
description: When you spend mana to play another unit, create a random card in hand of equal cost. It costs 0 and is Fleeting.
flavourText: Despite its appetite for even the strangest sea-beasts, there are some monsters even Bilgewater's most experienced captains won't hunt. They speak of Sefirsa in whispered tones, as a hypnotic light moving deep beneath the waves; a monster perched upon a mass grave of sunken ships and drowned men.

name: Honest Croupier
description: When you play a card with cost equal to my Power, grant me +1|+1.
flavourText: "Say, uh, dontcha want to put some more down? No risk, no reward, ya know. This is a lucky table tonight, I'll tell ya. And the house deals fair at this fine establishment--swear it on my mama's tongue."

name: Marai Reef Spire
description: When you spend mana to play a unit, refill 1 spell mana.
flavourText: "The reef has long been both shelter and ally. It cares for us, as we care for it, so that neither will fall to the darkness of the Murk." - Marai Greatmother

name: Vikrash the Exuberant
description: When I'm summoned, create a Slipstream in the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavourText: "Look, my friends, at how the whole world moves with us! The waves dance beneath the hull, the wind in the sails, the birds upon the breeze. Join me in our highest calling, and rejoice!"

name: Galesong Flock
description:
Summon a Galesong Swallow and grant it +1|+1 for each other Elemental spell and Skill you've played this game. 
Draw 1.
flavourText: When galesong swallows gather in numbers, a storm is never far off.

name: Shady Spectacles
description: Pick an allied follower. Transform my bearer into an exact copy of it while I'm equipped.
flavourText: Don't ask how these work.

name: Prototype Porobot
description: Last Breath: Grant a random 6+ cost spell in hand "When I'm played, summon a Prototype Porobot."
flavourText: "It's just a prototype," the apprentice cried as flames engulfed the lab. "I didn't program it to eat every gear in sight! I don't even know where all that metal is GOING!"

name: Eye Of The Storm
description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Draw 2.
flavourText: "Be at peace! The storm may rage around you, but it shall not harm you." - Janna

name: Divine Whirlwind
description:
If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
Deal 3 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "The tempest is at my command." - Janna

name: Chemtech Drake
description: When you play a spell, draw 1. When you draw while you have a full hand, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Zaun demands adaptation--and the chemtech drake is no exception, cast in the sickly green light of augmentation as it clings to the underbelly of the city. The twin shadows of the drake's ruined wings loom along darkened passageways, harbingers of a fury born from anguish at its own corruption.

name: Janna
description:
Play: Updraft 2 to draw 2 at the next Round Start.
Each round, the first 3 times you draw a card, reduce its cost by 1 this round.
flavourText: "Zaun is closer to Janna than pretty much anywhere else. After all, she's the one who saved the poor souls Piltover left to die. Yeah--if there's answers to be had, I'll get 'em here." - Windborne Mariner

name: Janna
description:
Round Start: Draw 1.
When you draw a card, reduce its cost by 1 this round.
flavourText: "Go no further! Violate my protection and you shall see the breath torn from your lungs, and your very self scattered by the winds!"

name: Janna's Eye Of The Storm
description:
Give an ally +2|+0 this round.
Draw 2.
Create a Janna in your deck.
flavourText: "Be at peace! The storm may rage around you, but it shall not harm you." - Janna

name: Galesong Call
description: Summon a Galesong Swallow.
flavourText: "All children of the wind answer my call." - Janna

name: Iascylla, Figurehead of the Deep
description: When you play an Elemental spell or Skill, copy it with the same targets.
flavourText: "Come, Iascylla! You are old indeed, if Ashlesh knows your name. But old or young, pretty or ugly, no matter. There is no higher honor for any monster than to fall to my blade upon the open sea." - Nilah

name: Windborne Mariner
description: If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
flavourText: "Yeah, I had what I wanted. But I got it all by taking, and taking leaves a man empty. First thing I found to follow was the wind, so now I'm here, hoping she'll push me onto a better path."

name: Maryam, Temple Caretaker
description: Play: Updraft 1 to either draw 1 or refill your spell mana.
flavourText: Convinced that she was saved by the wind spirit as a young girl, Maryam has preached Janna's virtues from her home country of Shurima all the way to Zaun. Now serving as the Zaun temple matriarch, she is dedicated to passing forward Janna's kindness to the young and downtrodden.

name: Galesong Swallow
flavourText: "These galesong swallows are flighty creatures. Half the time they seem to be made up entirely of water! Still, I've learned the hard way to avoid upsetting them..." - Intrepid Mariner

name: Sunken Temple
description:
Round End: Updraft your hand. 
Round Start: Draw that many cards plus 1.
flavourText: Much was lost in the disastrous collapse that ultimately delineated Zaun from Piltover. Janna may have lost her temple to the waves, but she saved the people who worshipped in it.

name: Howling Gale
description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Increase my damage by 1 for each other card you've played this round, up to 3 times.
flavourText: "My fury upon howling winds!" - Janna

name: Maryam, Temple Caretaker
description: Play: Updraft 1 to refill your spell mana.
flavourText: Convinced that she was saved by the wind spirit as a young girl, Maryam has preached Janna's virtues from her home country of Shurima all the way to Zaun. Now serving as the Zaun temple matriarch, she is dedicated to passing forward Janna's kindness to the young and downtrodden.

name: Maryam, Temple Caretaker
description: Play: Updraft 1 to draw 1.
flavourText: Convinced that she was saved by the wind spirit as a young girl, Maryam has preached Janna's virtues from her home country of Shurima all the way to Zaun. Now serving as the Zaun temple matriarch, she is dedicated to passing forward Janna's kindness to the young and downtrodden.

name: Charlatan Fishmonger
description: Round Start: ALL players draw 1, then grant your opponent's card Fleeting.
flavourText: "It's two for one today, and today only! Fresh fish, caught just this...uh, month? Two for one! What do you mean you don't want the second one? It's free!"

name: Exalted Cloudwinder
description:
If you've drawn 3+ cards this round, I cost 2 less.
When I'm summoned, draw 2 at the next Round Start.
flavourText: "My dear Zephyr. Come down from your clouds and perch on my shoulder awhile, won't you?" - Janna

name: Invocation Of Thunder
description:
Draw 1.
Summon a Sigil of the Storm.
flavourText: "In the name of Valhir, we make this offering..." - Valhir's Prophet

name: Bladebound Berserker
description: When you play a Slow spell that targets a single ally, copy it onto me.
flavourText: "You think an arrow or two will stop me? Hah! Whatever you throw at me becomes a weapon in my arsenal. Whatever is lost I will reforge in ice!"

name: Sky Splitter
description: Give an ally +1|+3 this round.
flavourText: Cloaked in clouds and wreathed in lightning, the god-bear stands untouchable at the heart of the storm.

name: Volibear
description: Play: Play Relentless Storm 3 times. Each one targets a different random enemy or the enemy Nexus if none.
flavourText: "Kneel to me, mortal, and I may spare you! Your power is feeble, but perhaps worthy enough to serve mine. Kneel, or be swept from the earth!"

name: Relentless Storm
description: Deal 4 to a unit. If it's dead or gone, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavourText: "With these claws, I carve the very world!" - Volibear

name: Volibear's Stormbringer
description:
Deal 4 to ALL units except Titanic allies.
Create a Volibear in your deck.
flavourText: "Let the tundra run red!" - Volibear

name: Volibear
description:
Play or Attack: Play Relentless Storm 3 times. Each one targets a different random enemy or the enemy Nexus if none.
Other allies have Overwhelm.
flavourText: "You dare to insult me with a challenge? Puny girl from lands far away. I am the heart of the tundra! I am the storm, and to you I promise a forgettable death!"

name: Clash of Giants
description:
Summon 2 random Titanic followers.
I cost 1 less for each Elemental spell or Skill you've played this game (max 10).
flavourText: "With his body, I sculpted the mountains. With the fire of his maw, I carved a thousand fjords." - Volibear

name: Flamecaller Caprine
description: When you play an Elemental spell or Skill, Forge me.
flavourText: "The Forgelord promised change and hammered out the chains of inaction instead. Those who worship a weak god are weak themselves. Only by Valhir's might will we be delivered to the glory of old!"

name: Stormbringer
description: Deal 4 to ALL units except Titanic allies.
flavourText: "Let the tundra run red!" - Volibear

name: Yadulski Snowdog
description: Attack: Grant the top 2 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavourText: Though they originating from Yadulsk, these pups have been domesticated by a number of Freljordian tribes for tracking, hunting, and avalanche recovery. With a hearty constitution and a healthy appetite for fun, they are beloved from tundra to taiga.

name: Rhond, the Magma Serpent
description: Play: Summon 3 Sigils of the Storm.
flavourText: Though few still worship him, all Freljordians know the tale of the Volibear's great battle with Rhond. Long before any mortal stepped foot in the frozen north, this earth-shattering struggle formed the ridges and rivers of the tundra itself.

name: Boadir of Blackened Ice
description: When I'm summoned, summon 2 Frozen Thralls and advance them to 2.
flavourText: "She was v-vicious! Thralls burnt to black ice, avalanches beneath her claws, a roar that knocked snow off the mountains! A warrior queen, I tell you! K-killing thralls is the work of a warrior queen." - Babbling Bjerg

name: Valhir's Prophet
description: When I'm summoned, summon an Sigil of the Storm.
flavourText: "I see what the others cannot: the storm which will shatter the mountain, the breaking of the bones of the earth. The Freljord of old will be forged anew in blood--it is only a matter of time."

name: Sigil of the Storm
description:
Sigils of the Storm stack.
Titanic allies cost 1 less. Destroy me when you play a Titanic ally.
flavourText: In a treacherous mountain pass, a sigil hangs suspended, burning into the night. Much blood was offered to reach this point, and in signs like these the Volibear offers both his approval and his desire for more...

name: Handy Harness
description: I have +1|+0 for each different subtype you've summoned this game.
flavourText: "There are beasts up here that even an avalanche won't stop. That's why a good harness is worth every coin." - Avarosan Trapper

name: Berserker Ursine
description: When you play a spell or Skill, summon an Sigil of the Storm.
flavourText: Occasionally, followers of the Volibear lose themselves so totally in their fanaticism that they begin to take on aspects of the bear himself. Nothing will stand in the way of Valhir's will--not even those the Ursine once called countrymen.

name: Elder Dragon
description:
Origin: Aspect of the Dragon. 
I cost 1 less for each different Dragon Boon you've played this game.
Play: Play every Dragon Boon on me.
flavourText: "Legend has it that this dragon is the oldest of all--that he is king of all winged beasts. If we tame him... why, Alatis, what else could possibly stand in our way? The world will finally understand that man and dragon are strongest together." - Volix, Dragon Allegiant

name: Infernal Might
description: Grant +1|+0 and Fearsome.
flavourText: The flames of infernal wrath rise ever higher.

name: Aspect of the Dragon
description: You may put any followers that cost 6+ into your deck during deckbuilding. When you play a unit with 6+ base cost, pick 1 of 2 Dragon Boons to play on it.
flavourText: Dragons bestow blessings both awesome and terrible.

name: Elder Dragon
description: I CANNOT BE STOPPED
flavourText: Heat without equal poured from the Elder Dragon's maw. Alatis leapt into flight. "Stand fast," Volix cried. "Hold your lines! The world will know us as the men who tamed the king of beasts!"

name: Hextech Prowess
description: Grant +1|+0 and 2 Impact.
flavourText: What nature designs, hextech improves.

name: Chemtech Blight
description: Grant Deathless.
flavourText: What some call poison, others call power.

name: Cloudbringer's Grace
description: Grant Challenger.
flavourText: Nimble as the breeze, decisive as the gale.

name: Mountainous Vigor
description: Grant +1|+0 and  Tough.
flavourText: The mountainous hide weathers any storm.

name: Elder Dragon's Primordial Roar
description:
Refill your mana to full. Draw all 6+ cost followers from the top 6 cards of your deck.
Create an Elder Dragon in your deck.
flavourText: "This call--it is primeval. I see a kingdom of clouds. I see an awful winged host." - Ottrani Dragon-Worshiper

name: Oceanic Will
description: Heal allies and your Nexus 2.
flavourText: These wings of water wash all wounds.

name: Primordial Roar
description: Refill your mana to full. Draw all 6+ cost followers from the top 6 cards of your deck.
flavourText: "This call--it is primeval. I see a kingdom of clouds. I see an awful winged host." - Ottrani Dragon-Worshiper

name: Enraged Firespitter
description: Play: Deal 2 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Noxian expansion has claimed many different peoples, settlements, and cultures. Frequently, wild creatures are also at the mercy of the war machine--but in the case of this dragon, each brutal step forward by Noxus is met with an equally brutal inferno of rage.

name: Spitfire
description: Deal 2 to an enemy and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: Wood, steel, flesh--all of it melts in proximity to the firespitter's caustic rage.

name: Iron Legionary
description: Play: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to an enemy.
flavourText: "Tear their souls from the cages of their bodies!" - Mordekaiser

name: Soul Cleaver
description: Deal 3 to an ally to deal 3 to an enemy.
flavourText: "It cuts... it hurts... in this realm and the next... and the next..." - Shackled Ghasts

name: Wildfire
description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus, increased by 1 for each other Wildfire you've played. Create a Wildfire in your deck.
flavourText: "Ashes, ashes..." - Annie

name: Indestructible
description: Grant an ally Deathless.
flavourText: "Eternal iron." - Mordekaiser

name: Red-Barbed Razormace
description: Nexus Strike: Curse your opponent with Ichor.
flavourText: While useful to the Noxian war machine, the razormace is also prized in the capitol's fighting pits. Few opponents--human or animal--are willing to take to the arena against this beast, and so the razormace's rare battles draw crowds from across the city.

name: Ichor
description: While I'm in hand, Round Start: Deal 1 to your Nexus.
flavourText: You're bleeding. It's slow... but it shows no signs of stopping.

name: Headmistress Telsi
description: Allied Attack and Support effects activate an additional time.
flavourText: Headmistress Telsi's class on personal discipline is rife with arduous assignments, wrist-slapping, and detention slips. It has always been mandatory for students at the Ravenbloom Conservatory--otherwise, nobody would enroll.

name: Armed Acquisitioner
description: Play: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
flavourText: "You'd think it would be easier to dig in the desert--but no! Given enough time, sand readily turns to stone. Once again requesting funding for replacement tools." - From the expedition records of the Explorer's Guild Far Reaches Division, allocation: Shurima

name: Kashuri Swipe
description: Kill a unit if it's damaged, otherwise deal 2 to it instead.
flavourText: "This is in your best interest. Trust me." - Lord Broadmane

name: Lord Mallat
flavourText: "It took centuries of planning to seal away that dreadful warmonger--and your pathetic friends intend to defeat him with 'joy'? You foolish girl. You will do nothing but incur the Revenant's wrath--and in doing, risk us all."

name: Bladepierced Revenant
description: When an ally is revived, grant it Challenger.
flavourText: "You smile, but I know the truth of your traitorous heart! They smiled to my face and ate from my table, even as they meant to put a sword through my back. I won't be taken for a fool again. You will die like the rest of them: screaming your apology!"

name: Ancient Malediction
description: Curse an enemy with Terror.
flavourText: Some things are best left beneath the sands.

name: Horned Swarmcaller
description: Play: Grant two enemies -1|-0 and disable their positive keywords.
flavourText: Despite its intimidating size, this swarmcaller is rarely violent. When its swarm nears a Shuriman settlement, villagers will leave offerings of soft fruit in the nearby desert to distract their visitors from more important crops.

name: General of the Dunes
description: Daybreak or when you activate another Daybreak: Grant the weakest enemy Vulnerable.
flavourText: The vast armies of Shurima stand ready to prove the might of the desert. When the order is given, they advance without hesitation.

name: Defenders of the Sun Disc
description: Daybreak: Draw a Defenders of the Sun Disc.
flavourText: "We are the keepers of the everlasting desert, the living history, the walkers of the path of radiance. We kneel before the Sun Disc and naught else, so that the world will kneel before Shurima's glory." - Azir

name: Tomb-Raider Barbara
description: Each round, the first time another ally dies, or Last Breath: Create a Lucky Find in hand.
flavourText: "That's a real haul, Barb. Knew I could count on you. Wait--what do you mean they saw you?!" - Vekauran Bruiser

name: Dune Swallower
description: To play me, kill an ally or one of your mana gems 3 times.
flavourText: The duneswallower slumbers at much larger depths than its smaller xer'sai cousins. Known to make an easy meal out of other xer'sai predators, it is rarely documented--likely for the fact that it can swallow entire dunes (and any witnesses) whole.

name: Morgana
description: Play: Curse an enemy with Shackles twice.
flavourText: "You come to me bruised and bleeding, and yet I've never seen a countenance so jubilant. You are a strange woman indeed--but you are safe here. Please rest, and when you're feeling better, I'd be keen to hear your story."

name: Morgana
description:
Play: Curse an enemy with Shackles twice.
Attack: Curse the strongest enemy that isn't Cursed with Shackles and deal 3 to Cursed enemies and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "You will regret this transgression! Be assured of this if nothing else: you will feel the suffering you have inflicted on others as a vise around your very soul. You will admit your sins, or be suffocated by them."

name: Morgana's Dark Binding
description:
Stun an enemy and Curse it with Shackles.
Create a Morgana in your deck.
flavourText: "Suffer, as you've made them suffer!" - Morgana

name: Shackles
description: While I'm in hand, the cursed unit is Immobile.
flavourText: "Bound by truth!" - Morgana

name: Soul Shackles
description: Deal 3 to Cursed enemies and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavourText: "I am your torment, reflected a thousandfold!" - Morgana

name: Mihira, Aspect Ascendant
description: Play: Curse 2 enemies with Shackles twice.
flavourText: "It was in the names of my daughters that I embraced divinity. It was for my family that I forsook my own humanity, so that by this flaming sword I could forge anew a world of truth and justice."

name: Sinner's Vise
description:
Curse an enemy with Shackles.
Increase the cost of enemy Curses everywhere by 1.
flavourText: "To find your freedom, admit the darkness within." - Morgana

name: Ruby-Eyed Conjurer
description: Play: Grant SpellShield or Overwhelm to an ally in hand.
flavourText: "Do not be afraid! Go on, and do not look back! We made this journey once, too. Now it is our duty to protect yours. Go quickly to her sanctuary, and the Veiled One will grant you the protection you seek."

name: Chained Caster
description: Play: Curse me with Shackles.
flavourText: The Mageseekers excelled at breaking people. They had bound his hands and his magic. They had taken his voice. But he had survived them before--and this time, he had the Veiled Lady on his side.

name: Ruby-Eyed Conjurer
description: Play: Grant Overwhelm to an ally in hand.
flavourText: "Do not be afraid! Go on, and do not look back! We made this journey once, too. Now it is our duty to protect yours. Go quickly to her sanctuary, and the Veiled One will grant you the protection you seek."

name: Ruby-Eyed Conjurer
description: Play: Grant SpellShield to an ally in hand.
flavourText: "Do not be afraid! Go on, and do not look back! We made this journey once, too. Now it is our duty to protect yours. Go quickly to her sanctuary, and the Veiled One will grant you the protection you seek."

name: Lisa and Dolly
description: Play: Curse an enemy with Shackles.
flavourText: "Look, Dolly! I'm doing it, just like you taught me! Do you think we'll ever get to show mama how much I've learned? You think she already knows? Really?! I hope you're right." - Lisa

name: Gentle Gemdragon
description: When you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, grant other Dragon allies +1|+1.
flavourText: Dragons can vary as greatly in their temperaments as they do in their appearance. For species as prone to all-consuming destruction as infernal drakes, there are those equally protective of their families and environments--like the slow-moving, affectionate gemdragon.

name: Dark Binding
description: Stun an enemy and Curse it with Shackles.
flavourText: "Suffer, as you've made them suffer!" - Morgana

name: Ottrani Dragon-Worshiper
description: When I'm summoned, heal your Nexus 2 and gain an extra mana gem next round.
flavourText: High on the slopes of Targon, a lone Ottrani has dedicated their life to dragons. They adorn themselves in shed scales and old bones, divining their path forward from the scattering of dragon teeth and the curling of smoke as it is carried up the mountain.

name: Veiled Protector
description: When I'm summoned or you summon a Titanic ally, heal your Nexus 3.
flavourText: This veiled protector has not forgotten the blessing that elevated it above a mere beast--and repays this debt by ensuring any who seek a certain sanctuary on the slopes of Targon make the journey unscathed.

name: Black Shield
description: Give an ally Spellshield this round and Curse it with Shackles.
flavourText: "Shielded from persecution!" - Morgana

name: Herald of Celestial Convergence
description:
Play: Activate other allies' Daybreak and Nightfall effects.
Daybreak: Grant me Overwhelm.
Nightfall: Grant me SpellShield.
flavourText: "A ring of fire burns above. In the heralded darkness, we are all the same." - Lunari wanespeaker

name: Seismic Shard
description:
If you Behold a Titanic unit, I cost 3 less.
Deal 7 to a unit.
flavourText: "Oops, uh oh, dontcha worry about dat dere, just a little wipple in the wock, just a accident, not papa NOPE! Movin' on!" - Chip

name: Scholarly Pioneer
description: Play: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
flavourText: "It's cold. I'm cold. Everything is cold, all the time. There are some places people just aren't meant to live. Please send me somewhere warm after this." - From the expedition records of the Explorer's Guild Far Reaches Division, allocation: Freljord

name: Magical Fettering
description: Grant an ally +0|+2. Curse your opponent with Suppression.
flavourText: "Know the weight of your sins!" - Morgana

name: Mageseeker Inquisitor
description: When I'm summoned, Curse your opponent with Suppression.
flavourText: "We cannot allow them to reach the sanctuary of the fallen sister. Her magic is ancient and twisted, far beyond even my ability to suppress. Quickly, take these abominations back to the ship and then up the mountain after the rest of them!"

name: Suppression
description: While I'm in hand, you can't play spells other than curses.
flavourText: No magic moves to your call.

name: Cloud Drake
description: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of all allied units in hand by 1.
flavourText: With thick tufted fur to insulate against the cold, this drake can reach much higher altitudes than most other dragons. Lively yet elusive, the drakes are usually spotted high overhead, wings cutting through the clouds as they jump from gust to gale.

name: Gentlemen's Duel
description:
Give an ally +0|+2 this round.
That ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavourText: "En garde, my friend! Surely you are not coward enough to refuse a gentleman's duel?" - Laurent Chevalier

name: The Kingfisher
description:
When I'm summoned, draw 1 of each champion from your deck.
Each round, the first time you summon a champion, Rally.
flavourText: "You must remember, my son, that the chasing of any horizon must be in service to the home we leave behind." - King Jarvan III

name: Taloned Strike
description: Grant allied Birds everywhere +1|+1. An allied Bird strikes an enemy.
flavourText: The silverwing's screech signals death from above.

name: Alatis the Gallant
description: Your Dragon Boons target all Dragon allies.
flavourText: "To be clear, I was not always a dragon allegiant. Alatis here convinced me, the first time he saved my life. He's taught me a lot, but the most important thing? There's no finer life than serving Demacia from the back of a dragon." - Dragon Allegiant

name: Dragon Allegiant
description: When I'm summoned, draw a Dragon if you Behold a Dragon.
flavourText: "You know it pains me to admit it, old boy, but we can't tame him alone. We've done what we can already. I'll send word to the general, and with the might of Demacia behind us, we're sure to bring that fantastic beast to its knees."

name: Ocean Drake
description: When you play a Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, heal your Nexus 1.
flavourText: "A grand beast you are! There is joy in the skim of your claws over the waves. Should you ever decide to prey on more than fish and seabirds, I would be delighted to face you." - Nilah

name: Heisho, Shell of the World
description: Each round, the first card you play costs 9 less.
flavourText: For the inhabitants of this Ionian village, Heisho is both honored caretaker and friend. Having carried their homes on his back from time immemorial, they can trust their village bearer to seek peaceful shores in times of trouble.

name: Empyrean Dance
description: Stop an enemy Fast spell, Slow spell, or Skill, Recall an enemy, and summon The Empyrean.
flavourText: "This dance is our remembrance." - Irelia

name: Trusty Adnere
description: When I'm summoned, summon Adnere's Aviarists.
flavourText: "This land is full of lessons. Remember always: the passing of each season is to be celebrated, for only in the ending can a new beginning be born."

name: Adnere's Aviarists
description: Support: Grow me to my supported ally's stats this round.
flavourText:
"Look! Papa's birds are hatching again!"
"Whoa! Another one! Why are there so many?"
"You ask that EVERY year, Arya."
"Well nobody ever answers!"
"Shhh, don't scare them. And tell me how many there are, cuz we're gonna have to think of a lotta names."

name: Capsize
description: Recall an enemy to increase the cost of the next unit your opponent plays this round by 2.
flavourText: "Those who mean us harm shall find rest at the bottom of the sea." - Rivershaper

name: Prancing Sea Spirits
description: Play: Summon an exact Ephemeral copy of me.
flavourText: During the right times of year, when the wind blows in over the sea, some Zaunites swear they can see the faint impressions of two huge finned creatures dancing joyously with the ocean tides.

name: Early Bird
description: Your opponent discards their highest cost card.
flavourText: "Imagine being a worm, and the last thing you see before you die are those eyes. Oh, worms can't see? Well, that's probably for the best." - Elle, Aloof Traveler

name: Bursting Backpack
description: For each Bursting Backpack you've played this game, plant 4 Chimes in your deck and 4 Poison Puffcaps in the enemy deck. Create a Bursting Backpack in your deck.
flavourText: "Rule 207: A Scout never carries more than she needs!" - Ava Achiever

name: Sneaky Swap
description: Recall an ally to summon a Hungry Owlcat in its place.
flavourText: "SQWUEA?" - Owlcat

name: Skip, "King of the Reef"
description: Play: Pick 1 of 2 non-champion cards from the enemy hand. I Capture it.
flavourText:
"Yeah, I'm handsome, quick--unflappably cool. Don't you know, old man? I'm the king of this reef, and you're trespassing in my kingdom!"
"W-wait! Come back here this instant! I need that specimen for my research!" - Conchologist

name: Portal Pioneer
description: Play: Pick an Explorer spell to create in hand.
flavourText: "I'm worried about Bunches! Oh, he seems more and more nervous these days. Even a short portal hop worries him! I can't understand why." - From the expedition records of the Explorer's Guild Far Reaches Division, allocation: Bandle City

name: Portia the Peculiar
description: Play: Manifest a Titanic follower and set its stats to 1|1 and cost to 0.
flavourText: "Of course I know old Portia! A bit out-to-lunch, but she can get you a portal to anywhere, in a pinch. A swirl of the tail, and you're off!" - Portal Pioneer

name: Sugary Snare
description: Place an ally on the bottom of your deck to summon the top ally of your deck.
flavourText: "Rule 571: A Scout should always be vigilant. One never knows what might be a tasty treat, and what might be a trap." - Ava Achiever
